children.name: 1. Cohort
VXA_Statin Users
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXA. Those receiving Statins between 2012 and 2017*/
data _null_; run;

/*VXA0. perepared source data*/
%vbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_verif_mort.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_verif_mort.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_cohort.zip),
        srcFile=%str(master_cohort.sas7bdat)
    );
%vbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_mds_ltc.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_mds_ltc.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_hosp.zip),
        srcFile=%str(master_hosp.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_msb.zip),
        srcFile=%str(master_msb.sas7bdat)
);

/*%print(data=master_cohort);*/
/*%nobs(data=master_cohort);*/
/*%minmax(data=master_cohort, var=dqdate, format=date9., target=test1, m=max);*/
/*%minmax(data=master_cohort, var=dqdate, format=date9., target=test2, m=min);*/

/*VXA1_a. keep the relevant cols, the latest entry date is 31dec2017d (so as to allow 365 days follow up)*/
data VXA1_a;
    set master_cohort;
    keep key_hsn dqdate RHA sex_desc mari_stat_desc fam_no birth age fsa nh_name nh_number QAIPPE resitype;
    if dqdate le &EntryEndDate;
    rename dqdate = EntryDate;
    if QAIPPE=. then QAIPPE=9;
run;

/*
The following exclusion has been applied during cohort creation
missing age sex
age < 18 at entry
not continuously covered during washout (5 years) or 1 years follow up
(including those deceased)
Receiving statin within washout (5 years)
*/
/*apply other exclusion criterias
    This part was copied from VZC
*/
/*VXA1. */
%print(data=master_verif_mort);
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXA1_a,
    t2=master_verif_mort,
    target=VXA1a,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.ddt_novit as MortDate),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn
);

data vxa1b;
    set VXA1a;
    Death_Pre365 =0;Death_Post365 =0;
    if MortDate ne . and MortDate < EntryDate then Death_Pre365=1;
    if MortDate ne . and EntryDate <= MortDate < EntryDate + &followdays then Death_Post365=1;
Run;
data localt.vxa1;
    set vxa1b;
    if Death_Pre365 =0 and Death_Post365 =0;
run;


/*VXA2. LTC stay: in LTC from 365*5 days prior through 365 days since entryDate*/
/*VXA2a. from the mds_ltc file, get ltc stay records*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.vxa1,
    t2=master_mds_ltc,
    target= VXA2a,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.entryDate, t2.key_hsn, t2.mds_ab1 as adm_date, t2.mds_r4 as dschg_date ),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);

/*VXA2b. oncatenate the overlaping periods*/
%cleanHospital(
    data=VXA2a,
    target=VXA2b,
    dxCol=,
    mdxCol=,
    intvnCol=,
    startD=,
    endD=,
    inst_num=,
    MaxGap=1,
    incldHN=0,
    keep=EntryDate,
    maxLenD=,
    maxLenM=,
    maxLenI=,
    keepTmp=
);

/*VXA2c. Get a list of distinct patient id of those ever stayed in a LTC facility within the washout , or the follow up period*/
%distinct(data=VXA2b, target=VXA2c, vars=%str(key_hsn),
                    filters=%str(adm_date between entryDate - &washoutdays and entryDate +&followdays-1
                                            or dschg_date between entryDate - &washoutdays and entryDate +&followdays-1
                                        or adm_date < entryDate - &washoutdays and dschg_date > entryDate +&followdays-1
                    ));

/*VXA2D. Link to vax1, indicate those having LTC stay*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.vxa1,
    t2=VXA2c,
    target= VXA2d,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.key_hsn = "", 0, 1) as LTCStay),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*%freq(data=VXA2d, table=LTCStay);*/


/*VXA2E, from above, keep patients not having LTC stays. These are cohort memebers not stayed in a LTC facility within the washout
    or the followup period*/
data localt.VXA2;
    set VXA2d;
    where LTCStay=0;
    drop LTCStay;
run;

/*VXA3. Stayed in an out-province facility (prov_loc_sk = 'N') for acute care during follow -up*/
/*%print(data=master_hosp);*/
/*%freq(data=master_hosp, table=prov_loc_sk*ds_ip);*/

/*VXA3a. From the master hospitalization record, select those events occured in a facility indicated as out-of-province facility (i.e., prov_loc_sk = 'N')*/
data VXA3a;
    set master_hosp;
    where prov_loc_sk = 'N';
    keep key_hsn adm_date dschg_date;
run;
/*VXA3b. From VXA2, and according to VXA3a, get a list of patient who stayed in an out-province acute care facility during follow up*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.VXA2,
    t2=VXA3a,
    target=VXA3b,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn),
    jtype=inner,
    jterm = %str(
        t1.key_hsn = t2.key_hsn and
        (
            t2.adm_date between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate +&followdays-1
            or t2.dschg_date between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate +&followdays-1
            or t2.adm_date < t1.entryDate and t2.dschg_date > t1.entryDate +&followdays-1
        )
    )
);

/*Exclude patients in VXA3b to get the cohort after applying excusion criteria */
%sqljoinv2(
    t1= localt.VXA2,
    target= localt.VXA3,
    vars=*,
    filters=%str(key_hsn not in (select key_hsn from VXA3b))
);


/*VXA4. Need to exclude those preg during runin or follow up!!! (see VXI)*/
/*. pregnancy
pregnancy (Using the CCDSS case definition, which is used for exclusion in definition of CCDSS chronic conditions)
the code of pregancy was from the file A12_CoMorb_ICDDX in the ChronicPop's remoteS folder

('641', '642', '643', '644', '645', '646', '647', '648', '649', '650', '651', '652', '653', '654', '655', '656', '657', '658', '659', '660', '661', '662', '663', '664', '665', '666', '667', '668', '669', '670', '671', '672', '673', '674', '675', '676', 'V27', 'O10', 'O11', 'O12', 'O13', 'O14', 'O15', 'O16', 'O17', 'O18', 'O19', 'O21', 'O22', 'O23', 'O24', 'O25', 'O26', 'O27', 'O28', 'O29', 'O30', 'O31', 'O32', 'O33', 'O34', 'O35', 'O36', 'O37', 'O38', 'O39', 'O40', 'O41', 'O42', 'O43', 'O44', 'O45', 'O46', 'O47', 'O48', 'O49', 'O50', 'O51', 'O52', 'O53', 'O54', 'O55', 'O56', 'O57', 'O58', 'O59', 'O60', 'O61', 'O62', 'O63', 'O64', 'O65', 'O66', 'O67', 'O68', 'O69', 'O70', 'O71', 'O72', 'O73', 'O74', 'O75', 'O76', 'O77', 'O78', 'O79', 'O80', 'O81', 'O82', 'O83', 'O84', 'O85', 'O86', 'O87', 'O88', 'O89', 'O90', 'O91', 'O92', 'O93', 'O94', 'O95', 'O98', 'O99', 'Z37')
*/
%let pregCodes=%str('641', '642', '643', '644', '645', '646', '647', '648', '649', '650', '651', '652', '653', '654',
'655', '656', '657', '658', '659', '660', '661', '662', '663', '664', '665', '666', '667', '668', '669', '670', '671', '672',
'673', '674', '675', '676', 'V27', 'O10', 'O11', 'O12', 'O13', 'O14', 'O15', 'O16', 'O17', 'O18', 'O19', 'O21', 'O22', 'O23',
'O24', 'O25', 'O26', 'O27', 'O28', 'O29', 'O30', 'O31', 'O32', 'O33', 'O34', 'O35', 'O36', 'O37', 'O38', 'O39', 'O40',
'O41', 'O42', 'O43', 'O44', 'O45', 'O46', 'O47', 'O48', 'O49', 'O50', 'O51', 'O52', 'O53', 'O54', 'O55', 'O56', 'O57',
'O58', 'O59', 'O60', 'O61', 'O62', 'O63', 'O64', 'O65', 'O66', 'O67', 'O68', 'O69', 'O70', 'O71', 'O72', 'O73', 'O74', 'O75',
'O76', 'O77', 'O78', 'O79', 'O80', 'O81', 'O82', 'O83', 'O84', 'O85', 'O86', 'O87', 'O88', 'O89', 'O90', 'O91', 'O92', 'O93',
'O94', 'O95', 'O98', 'O99', 'Z37');
/*VXA4a. hospital*/
data VXA4a;
    set master_hosp;
    src='hp';
    array dxs $ dx_code_1 - dx_code_25;
    array cdxs $ conv_dx_code_1 - conv_dx_code_25;
    format type $5.;
    format code $10.;
    do i = 1 to 25;
            if dxs(i) in: (&pregCodes) then do;
                output;
                leave;
            end;
            if cdxs(i) in: (&pregCodes) then do;
                output;
                leave;
            end;
    end;
    keep key_hsn adm_date dschg_date src;
run;
/*VXA4b. MSB*/
data VXA4b;
    set master_msb;
    src='mb';
    adm_date=dos;
    dschg_date=dos;
    if diag in:(&pregCodes) then output;
    keep key_hsn adm_date dschg_date src;
run;
/*VXA4c. merge hospital and msb*/
data VXA4c;
    set VXA4a VXA4b;
run;
/*VXA4d. link to VXA3, indicate those having preg during pre365*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXA4c,
    t2=localt.VXA3,
    target=VXA4d,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, 1 as preg_pre365),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    filters=%str(        t1.adm_date between t2.entryDate -1 and t2.entryDate - &runindays
                                    or
                                    t1.dschg_date between t2.entryDate -1 and t2.entryDate - &runindays
                                    or
                                    (t1.adm_date < t2.entryDate-&runindays and t1.dschg_date > t2.entryDate -1)
            )
);
/*VXA4e. link to VXA3, indicate those having preg during post365*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXA4c,
    t2=localt.VXA3,
    target=VXA4e,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, 1 as preg_post365),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    filters=%str(        
                                    t1.adm_date between t2.entryDate and t2.entryDate + &followdays -1
                                    or
                                    t1.dschg_date between t2.entryDate and t2.entryDate + &followdays -1
                                    or
                                    (t1.adm_date < t2.entryDate and t1.dschg_date > t2.entryDate + &followdays -1)
            )
);
/*VXA4f.link back to VXA3*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.VXA3,
    t2=VXA4d,
    Target=VXA4f,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.key_hsn = "", 0,1) as preg_pre365 ),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*VXA4g. add preg_post365*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXA4f,
    t2=VXA4e,
    Target=VXA4,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.key_hsn = "", 0,1) as preg_post365 ),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
%freq(data=VXA4, table=preg_pre365*preg_post365);

/*VXA5. exclude patients having pregancy events during run-in or follow up*/
data VXA;
    set VXA4;
    if preg_pre365=0 and preg_post365=0;
    drop preg_post365 preg_post365;
run;
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXa.zip,
    srcFile=VXa.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);

%exportvars(data=VXA);



s///
t///

///t

t///

children.name: 2. Determine UCP and CMEP
VXB_Encounter Episodes
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXB, get all encounter episodes, indicated by whether or not being CME, and type of provider (PCP, SCP, OTH)
    1) get patient-physician-date-spec specific encounters
    2) keep encounters with GPs
    3) determine the final cohort (those having encounters with GP during follow up)
            Note: patients are excluded if only having encounters during run-in period but not during follow up
    4) Keep encounters with GPs, and of the final cohort members
    5) indicate whether the encounter was for complete medical examination encounters (CME)
*/
data _null_;run;

/*VXB0a. perepared source data*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\vxa.zip),
        srcFile=%str(vxa.sas7bdat)
    );
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_msb.zip),
        srcFile=%str(master_msb.sas7bdat)
);

/*VXB0b. get msb claims within lookback and follow up (i.e. +/- 365 days around entryDate) of the cohort members in VXA*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_msb,
    t2=vxa,
    target=vxb0b,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.entryDate),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    filters=%str(t1.dos between t2.EntryDate-&runindays and t2.EntryDate +&followdays-1)
);

/*VXB1 get patient-physician-date-spec specific encounters with PCPs (GPs)*/
/*VXB1a. from above, get eligible service claims (see appendix 2)*/
data vxb1a;
    set vxb0b;
    where
        num_srv ne 0
        and
        LOS NOT in ('B','2','K','9')
        and
        MODE ne 'Z'
    ;
run;

/*VXB1b. excluding claims without doc number, or by slush doc codes, anyway these claims are difficult to calculate encounter episodes*/
data vxb1b;
    set vxb1a;
    where key_doc_num ne '' and DocSlushCode = 'N';
run;

/*VXB1C. get the number of encounter episode (a distinct patient-doc-dos is an Encounter), get distinct patient doc dos and spec*/
%distinct(data=vxb1b, target=vxb1c, vars=%str(key_hsn, entryDate, key_doc_num, dos, spec), orderby=%str(key_hsn,key_doc_num, dos, spec));
/*The above may have the same doc as diff SPEC on the same date. Only encounters with physcians claimed as PCPs(GPs) will be kept*/

/*VXB1d. determine whether the encounter episodes are with a PCP (GP), SCP (SP, a specialist who treated statin related conditions),
or others (appendix 3 and 4). */
data VXB1;
    set vxb1c;
    if spec in:('B') then do;
        ProviderType_DateSpecific = 'GP'; /*Family physician or primary care provider*/
    end;
    else do;
        if spec in ('CL','DL') then do;
            ProviderType_DateSpecific = 'SCP'; /*Specialist*/
        end;
        else ProviderType_DateSpecific = 'OTH'; /*Other*/
    end;

run;
/*%freq(data=vxb1, table=ProviderType_DateSpecific);*/
/*vxb1 contains all encounters, the provider indicated as PCP, SCP, or OTH*/

/*VXB2. Keep encounters with PCPs (GPs)
Note that the data vxb1 allowsthe flexibility for analyses including non-GP physicians. In this study however, only GP will be kept starting from here
*/

/*VXB2a. From VXB1, keep encounters indicated as with 'GP' */
Data VXB2a;
    set VXB1;
    if ProviderType_DateSpecific= 'GP';
    drop spec;
run;
/*in the above there might be encounters of the same physician as of different SPEC value of the B class (e.g., B1, B3)*/

/*VXB2b, keep distinct encounters with 'GP'*/
%distinct(data=VXB2a, target=VXB2, vars=*);

/*
VXB3. determine the final cohort (those having encounters with GP during follow up)
Note: patients are excluded if only having encounters during run-in period but not during follow up
*/
/*VXB3a. Get a distinct list of patients who had encounters with GP during followup*/
%distinct(data=VXB2, target=VXB3a, vars=key_hsn, filters=%str(dos between entryDate and entrydate + &followdays -1));

/*VXB3b. from VXA, keep those appearing in VXB3a. The result is the final cohort, i.e., eligible new users of statin medication,
    and having one GP encounter during followup*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=vxA,
    t2=vxb3a,
    target=VXB_pt,
    vars=t1.*,
    distinct=1,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXB_pt.zip,
    srcFile=VXB_pt.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);


/*VXB4. Keep encounters with GPs, and of the final cohort members
    Note: these encounters occured in run-in period, or in follow up (the records in run-in period is for future sensitivity analysis)
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=vxb2,
    t2=VXB_pt,
    target=VXB4,
    vars=t1.*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);


/*VXB5. indicate CME encounters, FSC code in Appendix 5*/
/*VXB5a. From vxb1b (claims with a non-slush physician), select claims indicated as CMEs*/
data vxb5a;
    set vxb1b;
    if fsc in ('B003','B064','B052', 'B004');
run;

/*VXB5b. get distinct CME claims by patient, provider, and date)*/
%distinct(data=vxb5a, target=vxb5b, vars=%str(key_hsn, key_doc_num, dos));

/*VXB5c. link vxb5b to vxb4 to indicate the CME episodes*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=vxb4,
    t2=vxb5b,
    target=VXB,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.key_hsn='', 0,1) as CME),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn dos key_doc_num
);
/*%freq(data=vxb, table=cme*ProviderType_DateSpecific);*/
/*!!! VXB contains all encounter episodes with PCPs, indicated whether or not being a CME within runin and follow up period*/
/*however don't get confused!
    A doctors can be both a CMEP, or not;
    These classifications are encounter-specific (i.e., patient and service date specific)
*/
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXB.zip,
    srcFile=VXB.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);

%exportvars(data=VXB);


s///
t///

children.name: VXB_V validate GP whose SPEC starts B
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXB_V:
    Validate that SPEC starting with 'B' represents family physicians (FP)
*/

data _null_;run;

/*The idea is to check who ever wrote a reference to a specialist.
    Theoretically, only GPs would write references to a specialist. So the claims indicated as writing a referal should be from a GP.
    In the service billing claims, such referals billed by a GP is with an FSC code of 'B055'.
*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_msb.zip),
        srcFile=%str(master_msb.sas7bdat)
);
/*From msb claims, get claims indicated as a referal from a GP (FSC= 'B055'), and list out the SPECs of the physicians who wrote these referals */
proc freq data=master_msb;
    where FSC="B055";
    table spec * fsc /nocol norow nopct;
run;
/*Bingo!
    In the above, all claims with 'B055' are from a SPEC starting with 'B'.
    It proves that spec starting with a 'B' are GPs.
*/




/*other attempts    

    The idea is that both FP and SP will have the save service codes, but
    1). The charge of a subsequent service by SP is higher

    Let's just use the MSB services of the statin cohort as an example
*/

/*1. Get service claims of the patients in the statin cohort*/
/*%print(data=master_msb);*/
/*2. does the amount of charge (amt_app) the same for
    different
    spec, fsc?
*/
%distinct(data=master_msb, target=ZXA1,
vars=%str(fsc, amt_app, diag, ifc(substr(strip(spec),1,1) = 'B', 'GP', SPEC) as SP length=2),
orderby=%str(fsc, amt_app, diag, SP));
/*the result shows that even for same GP same FSC, the charge is different
*/
data ZXA2a1;
    set master_msb;
    CalendarYr= year(dos);
    if month(dos) < 4 then FiscalYr=year(dos)-1;
    else FiscalYr=year(dos);
        format SPEC2 $2.;
    if spec in: ("B") then SPEC2="GP";
    else SPEC2="SP";
run;
%beep;
data ZXA2a2;
    set ZXA2a1;
    if FSC="A073";
run;
/*is it true that by fiscal year the charge is the same for the same SPEC and the same FSC*/
%distinct(data=ZXA2a2, target=ZXA2b1,
vars=%str(fsc, amt_app, ifc(substr(strip(spec),1,1) = 'B', 'GP', SPEC) as SP length=2, FiscalYr),
orderby=%str(fsc, amt_app, FiscalYr, SP));
/*Nope. e.g., in CY 2015, for GP, the charge for A037 could be 56.8 or 57.9*/
%distinct(data=ZXA2a2, target=ZXA2b2,
vars=%str(fsc, amt_app, ifc(substr(strip(spec),1,1) = 'B', 'GP', SPEC) as SP length=2, CalendarYr),
orderby=%str(fsc, amt_app, CalendarYr, SP));
/*Nope. e.g., again in FY 2015, for GP, the charge for A037 could be 56.8 or 57.9*/
/*get the claims by GP in FY or CY 2015*/
data ZXA2b3;
    set ZXA2a2;
    if CalendarYr=2015 or FiscalYr=2015;
run;
/*it seems that the charge increased in FY 2015, but sometimes services in Apr (although in FY2015) were yet charged by the rate
    of the previous year
    Hmm.... If that is true, then the services in the second half year should be of the same charge for GPs
*/
data ZXA2b4;
    set ZXA2a1;
    if spec in: ("B") and month(dos) > 5;
run;
%distinct(data=ZXA2b4, target=ZXA2b5,
vars=%str(fsc, amt_app, ifc(substr(strip(spec),1,1) = 'B', 'GP', SPEC) as SP length=2, FiscalYr),
orderby=%str(fsc, amt_app, FiscalYr, SP));
/*still have claims of different charges
e.g.
A056    13.2 or 13.5 by    GP    in FY 2015
but maybe it is good enough, as the deviation in the same year is not that big
*/
/*another way,
what is the mean sd of charges by GP/SP by fsc fiscal years
*/
%GetMeanStats(
    data=ZXA2a1,
    where=,
    theVar=amt_app,
    groupVars= fiscalyr fsc spec2,
    theStats=mean sd,
    target=ZXA3a,
    debug=1,
    personID=
);
/*Just to hypothesis, could it be that
    the means of charge are sig dif between GP and SP
    (by fiscal year, by fsc)
*/
/*
does it make sense to let charge predict SPEC?
is that a conditional log model (paired by fsc)
*/
proc genmod data=ZXA2a1;
    where fsc='A110';
    class key_doc_num key_hsn
     fiscalyr (ref='2006') /param=reference;
    model SPEC2 (ref='GP') = amt_app fiscalyr;
    repeated subject=key_doc_num ( key_hsn) /covb;
run;







s///
t///

children.name: VXC_F_UPCIndex in Followup UCPF
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXC_F determine the upc index during follow up for all the encounterd GPs during follow up*/
data _null_;run;


/*VXC_F0, perepared source data*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\vxb.zip),
        srcFile=%str(vxb.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\vxb_pt.zip),
        srcFile=%str(vxb_pt.sas7bdat)
);
%vbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\Master_MSB_DocInfo.zip),
    srcFile=%str(Master_MSB_DocInfo.sas7bdat)
);

/*VXC_F1, From vxb, get claims with follow up, i.e., 365 days since to the index(entryDate) */
data VXC_F1;
    set vxb;
    where DOS between entryDate and entryDate + &followdays -1;
run;

/*calculate the UPC index from encounter episodes in follow up*/
/*the macro getUPCIndex works for MSB claim data, and other data
    for claimTYpe = '', MSB claim data, the LOS, MODE, SPEC, and NUM_SRV must be provided
        the excluding LOC, excluding MODE, and including SPEC must be provided
    for cliamtype=others: other data (like in this case, the episodes have been prepared, or like prescription data)
        specify the claimType as others, and do not need to specify LOS,MODE exclusion, and SPEC
    By default, the target file contains the doc with the max UPCIndex
    but this is not what is wanted here.
    For this analysis, it is expected to keep all docs, each doc having a UPC index
    so the interested data set is not the target, but the tmp5 file created by the macro    
*/
%getUPCIndex(
    data=VXC_F1,
    target=notInterested,
    claimType=others,
    debug=1
);


/*VXC_F2. for each patient, sort by UPC index*/
%sort(data= getUPC_tmp5, target=VXC_F2, sorter=%str(key_hsn descending UPCIndex));

/*VXC_F3. Keep physician(s) with the highest UPC index for each cohort patient*/
/*VXC_F3a, determine the highest UPC index of each patient */
data VXC_F3a;
    set VXC_F2;
    by key_hsn descending UPCIndex;
    if first.key_hsn;
    keep key_hsn UPCIndex;
run;
/*VXC_F3b1, link the patient and highest UPC index back to VXC_F2, and keep patient-physician pairs with the highest UPC index
(there could be multiple physicians with tie index values for a single patient)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXC_F2,
    t2=VXC_F3a,
    target=VXC_F3b1,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars= key_hsn upcindex,
    orderby=%str(key_hsn)
);

/*VXC_F3b2, insert a step here to exclude patients who had only one UCP, and the UCP
    cannot be found in the mobility file (the UCP does not have age/sex, ... info)
*/
/*VXC_F3b2. Clean up the doc properties
    The original file is quite messy:
    1) It does not seems to be time specific
    2) For the same docID, the field values (e.g., sex) can be missing in some records.
*/

/*VXC_F3b2a have a distinct list of doc from F3b (the physicians ever had encounters with cohort patients*/
%distinct(data=VXC_F3b1, target=VXC_F3b2, vars=key_doc_num);
/*VXC_F3b1b keep records in which sex, age, ... is not missing*/
%macro cleanDoc(docVar=);
    %local docVar;
    Data VXC_F3b2b;
        set Master_MSB_DocInfo;
        if &docVar ne '';
        if report_end =. then report_end=today();
        keep key_doc_num &docVar report_end;
    run;
    /*VXC_F3b1b sort and keep the lastest record of a doc*/
    %sort(data=VXC_F3b2b, sorter=key_doc_num report_end);
    data VXC_F3b2c;
        set VXC_F3b2b;
        by key_doc_num report_end;
        if last.key_doc_num;
    run;
    /*VXC_F3b2c, attach the selected property to the docs in VXJ_A1*/
    %sqljoinv2(
        t1=VXC_F3b2,
        t2=VXC_F3b2c,
        target=VXC_F3b2,
        vars=%str(t1.*, t2.&docVar as Doc&docVar),
        jtype=inner,
        jvars=key_doc_num
    );
/*    %freq(data=VXC_F3b2, table=Doc&docVar);*/
%mend cleanDoc;
%cleanDoc(docVar=Sex);
%cleanDoc(docVar=BIRTH_YEAR);
%cleanDoc(docVar=grad_year);
%cleanDoc(docVar=GRAD_GEO_COUNTRY);
/*the above results in a list of physicians with complete info of age, sex, grad year, and grad country*/

/*Link VXC_F3b2 to VXC_F3b1, select patients whose physician are in F3b2
    In F3b2, physicians are not missing for age, sex, grad year and grad country
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXC_F3b1,
    t2=VXC_F3b2,
    target=VXC_F3b,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars= key_doc_num,
    orderby=%str(key_hsn, upcindex desc)
);


/*VXC_F3c. determine the UCPF. In case of tie, getUCPF1,UCPF2, ....
     in case of tie, there will be multipleUCPFs. DocNumer, Nvisits, UPCindex, these are all specific by eachUCPF
    and we'll need these values for eachUCPF.
    Following is a smart idea:
    1) putting values of these doc-specifc variables into a string (theStr), with the dlmt ";"
    2) make a tag of UCPF1, 2, etc
*/
data VXC_F3c;
    set VXC_F3b;
    format UPCIndex 6.2;
    by key_hsn ;
    if first.key_hsn then do;
        i =1;
        UCPF='UCPF' || strip(i);    
    end;
    else do;
        i+1;
        UCPF='UCPF' || strip(i);
    end;
    drop i;
    /*combine the var values together*/
    length theStr $50.;
    theStr = catx(':', key_doc_num, N_Visits, put(UPCIndex, 6.2));
    rename T_visits=T_visitsF N_visits = NMax_VisitsPerDocF UPCIndex=UPCIndexF;
run;
/*VXC_F3d. Now we can transpose the string in theStr into columsn of UCPF1, 2, ...
    The values will stay there. Later we can use scan(var, # of word, dlmt) to get the values
    (i.e., scan(UCPF1, 1, ":") is the key_doc_num of UCPF1, scan(UCPF1, 2, ";") is the n_visits of UCPF1, etc
    Quetions: Why it has to be like this?
    The # of visits, the UPC index will always be the same for UCPs of the same doctor...
*/
%transpose(data = VXC_F3c, target=VXC_F3,
    rowhead =key_hsn NMax_VisitsPerDocF T_VisitsF UPCIndexF ,
    colhead=UCPF,
    contents= theStr
);
/*example to get upcindex of UCPF1*/
/*
data test;
    set VXC_F3 (obs=1);
    UPCIndex_UCPF1= scan(UCPF1, 3, ':');
run;
*/


/*VXC_F4. The docs in VXC_F3 are UCPFs, link them back to vxb_pt(the cohort)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=vxb_pt,
    t2=VXC_F3,
    target=VXC_F,
    vars=*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXC_F.zip,
    srcFile=VXC_F.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*how many patients had multiple UCPs*/
/*data test;*/
/*    set VXC_F;*/
/*    MultipleUCPFs=0;*/
/*    if UCPF2 ne '' then MultipleUCPFs=1;*/
/*run;*/
/*%freq(data=test, table = MultipleUCPFs);*/
%exportvars(data=VXC_F);

children.name: QVXC_F
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*
[to do]
1. Why the file is so small? VXC_F is only 1k?!!!!!! need to rerun it

1. Why the UPC Index is so high (25% percentile =60%, median =77%)
Need to validate by comparing some patients with their previous run data on Z drive

2. How many patients are with 1 encounter?
    What if taking out those with 1 encounter, how does the percentile median of UPC index change

3. How is the distribution of 2 year UPC index
*/
/*settings*/
%include "S:\Collaborative_researchers\Shenzhen\My Project\Projects\DoNotDelete Common Macros\MyMacros.sas" /LRECL=32767;

%let oldLocalT = Z:\My Project\Projects\PhD Thesis\StatinCohort\Output\Result data;
libname oLocalT "&oldLocalT";
/*the path with old UPCIndex data
    i.e. VXD_F.zip in Z:\My Project\Projects\PhD Thesis\StatinCohort\Output\Result data
*/

%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&oldLocalT.\VXD_F.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXD_F.sas7bdat)
);
data UPCI_Old;
    set VXD_F;
run;

%let newLocalT = P:\Physician_Impact_Pro(SYao)_Bio14-143\Output\Result data;
libname nLocalT "&newLocalT";
/*the path with new UPCIndex data
    i.e. VXC_F.zip in Z:\My Project\Projects\PhD Thesis\StatinCohort\Output\Result data
*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&newLocalT.\VXC_F.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXC_F.sas7bdat)
);
data UPCI_New;
    set VXC_F;
run;

%print(data=UPCI_old);
%print(data=UPCI_new);

/*patients appeared in both old and new cohort*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=UPCI_old,
    t2=UPCI_new,
    target=test1,
    vars=t1.key_hsn,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*more questions!!!!! why there were patients in new cohort, but NOT in old cohort? */

/*For patients in test1, from the old data, get the entry date, UPC index, Total encounters, and the UCPs*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=UPCI_old,
    t2=test1,
    target=test2a,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, t1.entryDate, t1.T_visitsF, t1.UPCPF1),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    orderby =key_hsn
);
data test3a;
    set test2a;
    length docID $11.;
    docID = scan(UPCPF1, 1, ":");
    N_VisitsF = input(scan(UPCPF1, 2, ":"), 8.);
    Index1= input(scan(UPCPF1, 4, ":"), 8.2);
    UPCIndex=round((N_VisitsF/T_VisitsF) * 100, '.01');
    if Index1=UPCIndex;
run;

/*For patients in test1, from the new data, get the entry date, UPC index, Total encounters, and the UCPs*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=UPCI_new,
    t2=test1,
    target=test2b,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, t1.entryDate,t1.NMax_VisitsPerDocF, t1.UpcIndexF, t1.T_visitsF, t1.ucpf1),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    orderby =key_hsn
);
data test3b;
    set test2b;
    length docID $11.;
    docID = scan(ucpf1, 1, ":");
    N_VisitsF = NMax_VisitsPerDocF;
    Index1=round(UPCIndexF, '.01');
    UPCIndex=round((N_VisitsF/T_VisitsF) * 100, '.01');
    if index1 = UPCIndex;
run;

/*from the above test3a and b, make a head to head comparison set for each var*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=test3a,
    t2=test3b,
    target=test4,
    vars=%str(
        t1.key_hsn,
        t1.entryDate as entryDate_old,
        t2.entryDate as entryDate_new,
        t1.DocID as DocID_old,
        t2.DocID as DocID_new,
        t1.N_VisitsF as N_VisitsF_old,
        t2.N_VisitsF as N_VisitsF_new,
        t1.T_VisitsF as T_VisitsF_old,
        t2.T_VisitsF as T_VisitsF_new,
        t1.UPCIndex as UPCIndex_old,
        t2.UPCIndex as UPCIndex_new
    ),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);

/*check those not having the same N_VisitsF*/
data test5;
    set test4;
    if entryDate_old ne entryDate_new;
run;
/*none*/

/*the T_VisitsF sounds different
    1) ? Was it because SPEC visits were included in the old data
    2) ? Was it because sometimes a the UCP (as GP) was acting as SP, and the visits as SP is also accounted
*/
/*get the first patient in test4*/
Data test6;
    set test4 (obs=1);
run;
/*get the patients msb claims within follow up*/
%let newDataPath = P:\Physician_Impact_Pro(SYao)_Bio14-143\Data;
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&newDataPath.\master_msb.zip),
        srcFile=%str(master_msb.sas7bdat)
);
/*%minmax(data=master_msb, var=dos, format=date9., target=xxx, m=min);*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_msb,
    t2=test6,
    target=test7a,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.entrydate_new),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
data test7b;
    set test7a;
    where dos between entrydate_new and entrydate_new + 365-1;
run;
/*further remove records that are not eligible*/
data test7c;
    set test7b;
    where
        num_srv ne 0
        and
        LOS NOT in ('B','2','K','9')
        and
        MODE ne 'Z'
        and
        DocSlushCode = 'N'
;
run;
/*from above, get distinct records by patient doc spec and date*/
%distinct(data=test7c, target=test7d, vars=%str(key_hsn, key_doc_num, spec, dos), orderby=key_doc_num);
/*Yep, in the old data, T_visits included encounters to SPs*/

/*So, for UPC index calculation, what constructs the proper denominator? with or without encounters to SPs?
    check the comment in the proposal file in dropbox:
    continuity ofphysician care patterns 20191205.docx. Page 21 comments
    
    The denomintor should be to all family physicians (supported by Provost, and CiHI's paper). However, both of the paper
    limited to those having at least twice visits to GPs.
    In Provost's cohort, within 2 years, the % with UPC index . 75% is 37.5%
    In CIHI report, the 'average' (mean? median?) of UPC index in SK (2007-2012) is 0.56
    (of what period?, )
    what is the quintile distribution look like?
    For all the provinces (not SK specific), "approximately one-quater of patients were in the low (<0.4) and high(0.8) category"
    (page 7).
*/

proc means data=VXC_F mean median q1 q3;
    var UPCIndexF;
run;

/*how many patients with only 1 T_visitsF*/
data test8;
    set VXC_F;
    TVF_Cat='>1';
    if T_visitsF =1 then TVF_Cat='1';
run;
%freq(data=test8, table = TVF_Cat);
/*excluding those with only 1 T_visitsF?*/
proc means data=VXC_F mean median q1 q3;
    where T_visitsF>1;
    var UPCIndexF;
run;
proc univariate data=VXC_F ;
    where T_visitsF>1;
    histogram UPCIndexF / normal;
run;
/*Similar !*/

/*whose index is 100%*/
data test9;    
    set VXC_F;
    if UPCIndexF=100;
run;
/*among those UPCIndex=100, how many only had 1 visits*/
data test9;
    set VXC_F;
    TVF_Cat='>1';
    if T_visitsF =1 then TVF_Cat='1';
run;
%freq(data=test9, table = TVF_Cat);
/*Not a lot at all*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_msb,
    t2=test9,
    target=test12a,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.entrydate),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    orderby=%str(key_hsn, entryDate)
);
data test12b;
    set test12a;
    where dos between entrydate and entrydate + 365-1;
run;
/*further remove records that are not eligible*/
data test12c;
    set test12b;
    where
        num_srv ne 0
        and
        LOS NOT in ('B','2','K','9')
        and
        MODE ne 'Z'
        and
        DocSlushCode = 'N'
;
run;
/*from above, get distinct records by patient doc spec and date*/
%distinct(data=test12c, target=test12d, vars=%str(key_hsn, key_doc_num, spec, dos), orderby=key_doc_num);


/*How is the distribution of 2 year UPC index*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&newLocalT.\VXF_FS.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXF_FS.sas7bdat)
);
%print(data=VXF_FS);
proc means data=VXF_FS mean median q1 q3;
    var UPCIndexW;
run;
proc means data=VXF_FS mean median q1 q3;
    where T_visitsW>1;
    var UPCIndexW;
run;
/*better. The UPCIndex level lowered*/

);
data test7b;
    set test7a;
    where dos between entrydate_new and entrydate_new + 365-1;
run;
/*further remove records that are not eligible*/
data test7c;
    set test7b;
    where
        num_srv ne 0
        and
        LOS NOT in ('B','2','K','9')
        and
        MODE ne 'Z'
        and
        DocSlushCode = 'N'
;
run;
/*from above, get distinct records by patient doc spec and date*/
%distinct(data=test7c, target=test7d, vars=%str(key_hsn, key_doc_num, spec, dos), orderby=key_doc_num);
/*Yep, in the old data, T_visits included encounters to SPs*/

/*So, for UPC index calculation, what constructs the proper denominator? with or without encounters to SPs?
    check the comment in the proposal file in dropbox:
    continuity ofphysician care patterns 20191205.docx. Page 21 comments
    
    The denomintor should be to all family physicians (supported by Provost, and CiHI's paper). However, both of the paper
    limited to those having at least twice visits to GPs.
    In Provost's cohort, within 2 years, the % with UPC index . 75% is 37.5%
    In CIHI report, the 'average' (mean? median?) of UPC index in SK (2007-2012) is 0.56
    (of what period?, )
    what is the quintile distribution look like?
    For all the provinces (not SK specific), "approximately one-quater of patients were in the low (<0.4) and high(0.8) category"
    (page 7).
*/

proc means data=VXC_F mean median q1 q3;
    var UPCIndexF;
run;

/*how many patients with only 1 T_visitsF*/
data test8;
    set VXC_F;
    TVF_Cat='>1';
    if T_visitsF =1 then TVF_Cat='1';
run;
%freq(data=test8, table = TVF_Cat);
/*excluding those with only 1 T_visitsF?*/
proc means data=VXC_F mean median q1 q3;
    where T_visitsF>1;
    var UPCIndexF;
run;
proc univariate data=VXC_F ;
    where T_visitsF>1;
    histogram UPCIndexF / normal;
run;
/*Similar !*/

/*whose index is 100%*/
data test9;    
    set VXC_F;
    if UPCIndexF=100;
run;
/*among those UPCIndex=100, how many only had 1 visits*/
data test9;
    set VXC_F;
    TVF_Cat='>1';
    if T_visitsF =1 then TVF_Cat='1';
run;
%freq(data=test9, table = TVF_Cat);
/*Not a lot at all*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_msb,
    t2=test9,
    target=test12a,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.entrydate),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    orderby=%str(key_hsn, entryDate)
);
data test12b;
    set test12a;
    where dos between entrydate and entrydate + 365-1;
run;
/*further remove records that are not eligible*/
data test12c;
    set test12b;
    where
        num_srv ne 0
        and
        LOS NOT in ('B','2','K','9')
        and
        MODE ne 'Z'
        and
        DocSlushCode = 'N'
;
run;
/*from above, get distinct records by patient doc spec and date*/
%distinct(data=test12c, target=test12d, vars=%str(key_hsn, key_doc_num, spec, dos), orderby=key_doc_num);




/*How is the distribution of 2 year UPC index*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&newLocalT.\VXF_FS.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXF_FS.sas7bdat)
);
%print(data=VXF_FS);
proc means data=VXF_FS mean median q1 q3;
    var UPCIndexW;
run;
proc means data=VXF_FS mean median q1 q3;
    where T_visitsW>1;
    var UPCIndexW;
run;

/*PHYSICIAN PRACTICE REPORTS*/
/*

if key_doc_num in:(&slush) then delete
if spec not in: ('B','C','WB') then delete
if substr(spec,1,1)='C' and ~(substr(fsc,1,1) not in ('B','C')) then delete
if mode in:(&mode_exc) then delete
*/
%let mode_exc = 'Z';*NEW - April 2017;

*Slush codes are added from clean.Physician #s for Slush codes (new).txt;
%let slush='76925314678' '36825374671' '52825354677' '66925324672' '38825384673' '52825354672' '35925334677' '00825374673' '32825384674' '79825354677' '42925314672' '14925324671'
'74825384673' '95825354670' '86825364672' '95925344676' '03925304670' '59925304677' '96925314677' '36925314674' '96925314672' '62825364671' '28925304679' '82825394672'
'43925314674' '13825364672' '31925324677' '48925314670' '05825364678' '17825354674' '13925304670' '82825384679' '27825354670' '19825374671' '45925304670' '07925304677'
'05925344673' '64925344674' '25925304675' '95925314671' '05825354679' '64925304678' '26925334671' '80925334670' '87925304678' '53825394678' '17825344678' '52925304678'
'61825384670' '17825374676' '31825374679' '29825354679' '41925304676' '01825374674' '24825364678'
'11345384672' '91925324677' '87825394671' '81925304678' '74925304674' '78925334671' '01825354674' '58825374670' '83925324670' '34825364677' '58925324670' '53825384670'
'27825344678' '48925314676' '37825364674' '31925324675' '56925304672' '95925344670' '02825384671' '81825354676' '22925304670' '51825394672' '95925304677' '84825354674'
'74925314673'
'06825384675' '39825344678' '99825374677' '35925304676' '73825364675' '14925304678' '14825354671' '14925314673' '76825364676' '88925314677' '76825374677' '23825374672'
'74825384670' '07925334671' '71825364676' '24925304677' '11925324678' '49925334678' '31925324674' '80925314677' '91825364675' '11825374679' '55925324679' '99925304678'
'35825374676' '10925314671' '22825394677' '93825394679' '26925314679' '59825344671' '27825384672' '12925304677' '42925304671' '16825364671' '24925304679' '82925314676'
'17925314671' '04825394674' '16825344676' '33925344675' '01825394671' '28925314674' '18825354679' '25925344671' '01825354670' '93925304677' '47925334678' '37925334676'
'01825364673' '75925324675' '85925314673' '35925334678' '24825364679' '90925304671' '73925324677' '76825374671' '83825354675' '74825374672' '77925314672' '50925324674'
'05925324670' '20925304670' '06825354674' '42825364678' '88825354673' '81825364678' '23925314673' '24925334677' '99825394677' '94825374674' '08825374674' '87925324675'
'06925304678' '84825384672' '19825344672' '28825394679' '53925334671' '05925334676' '81925314671' '64825354676' '28825394673' '22925314674' '38825394679' '57925324671'
'46925334672' '92925334678';

/*vaheguru ji Extract MSB data*/
%include '/SAS_data/dw0/HQC_share/Clean/library_dw0.sas';
%include '/SAS_data/dw0/HQC_Data_Lab/Macros/DataManip/demog_assign.sas';
%include '/SAS_data/dw0/HQC_Data_Lab/Macros/DataManip/coverage_days.sas';
libname ppr '/SAS_data/dw0/HQC_share/nsidhu/PPR/data_MS';
%INCLUDE '/SAS_data/dw0/HQC_Data_Lab/Macros/DataManip/Extract_MSB.sas';    
%Extract_MSB(xtrc_start_dt='31Mar2012'd,
xtrc_end_dt='26Mar2018'd,
excl_xtrc_dt=,
ds_out=temp_msb,
ds_out_hsn_only=,
hsn_list=,
hsn_file=,
MDnumber=,
diagcode=,
              diag_file=,
dostart='01Apr2013'd,
dosend='31Mar2018'd,
fscode=,
loscode=,
othercondition=,
othernumber=,
kept_vars=KEY_HSN KEY_DOC_NUM SPEC MG DIAG FSC NUM_SRV LOS CONTACTS AMT_APP MODE,
debug=N);    
data ppr.temp_msb1;
set temp_msb;
SPEC1=trim(left(upcase(substr(SPEC, 1,1))));
if SPEC1='B' then SPEC_flag=1; else SPEC_flag=0;
run;

/*
Quality Checks: Check below for the chosen 4 physicians,
Proc freq variable SPEC and LOS
Check the earliest dos_1 for each of 4 physicians
Extract the data of these 4 physicians from the physician mobility file to check the practice start dates
*/
proc freq data=ppr.temp_msb1;
table spec los;
run;

/*Exclusions mention above in notes*/
data temp_msb2;/*332003786 out of 54983036*/
set ppr.temp_msb1;
/*
if key_doc_num in ('51925304676' '42925324679' '27925304675' '63825354679' '05825374675' '73925324675')
then key_doc_num='00123456789';
*/

if key_hsn='' then delete;
if num_srv=0 then delete;
*if los in:(&in_patient) then delete;/*we decided to include hospital physician visits April 26*/
if key_doc_num in:(&slush) then delete;
if spec not in: ('B') then delete;
if mode in:(&mode_exc) then delete;
if substr(spec,1,1)='C' and ~(substr(fsc,1,1) not in ('B','C')) then delete;
run;
proc freq data=temp_msb2;
tables spec; run;
/*Step 4 removing same day, same doctor visits:
NOTE: There were 32003786 observations read from the data set WORK.TEMP_MSB2.
NOTE: 5942281 observations with duplicate key values were deleted.
NOTE: The data set PPR.TEMP_MSB2 has 26061505 observations and 14 variables.
*/
data ppr.temp_msb1x;
set temp_msb2;
if FSC in ('B003' 'B064' 'B052' 'B004' ) then physical_flag=1; else physical_flag=0;
run;

proc sort data=ppr.temp_msb1x;
by key_hsn key_doc_num dos_1 descending physical_flag;
run;
proc sort data=ppr.temp_msb1x out=ppr.temp_msb2 nodupkey;
by key_hsn key_doc_num dos_1;
run;
/*
NOTE: There were 26061505 observations read from the data set PPR.TEMP_MSB2.
NOTE: The data set WORK.TEMP_MSB_3YEAR has 15783671 observations and 14 variables.
*/
data temp_msb_3year;
set ppr.temp_msb2;
where ('01Apr2015'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2018'd);

if ('01Apr2015'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2016'd) then FY='201516';
else if ('01Apr2016'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2017'd) then FY='201617';
else if ('01Apr2017'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2018'd) then FY='201718';
else if ('01Apr2018'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2019'd) then FY='201819';
run;


/*checking coverage on Mar 31, 2018*/
data temp_msb_3year;
set temp_msb_3year;
cover_dt1='1Dec2017'd;
cover_dt='31Dec2017'd; /*change these dates to 31Mar 2018 when data comes*/
format cover_dt date9. cover_dt1 date9.;
run;

%coverage_days(xtrc_dt='02JAN2018'd,
    ds_in=temp_msb_3year,
    ds_out=temp_msb_3year_covered,
    strt_dt_var=cover_dt,
    end_dt_var=cover_dt,
    def_strt_dt=07DEC1994,
    def_end_dt=&sysdate9,
    cvrg_strt_dt_var=eff_date,
    cvrg_end_dt_var=exp_date);
proc freq data=temp_msb_3year_covered;
table cvgdays;
run;
/*keeping if covered on last day of month*/
data temp_msb_3yearx;
set temp_msb_3year_covered;
if cvgdays=1;
run;

proc sort data=temp_msb_3yearx out=tt nodupkey; by key_doc_num; run;/*1548*/
proc sql noprint;
create table temp_msb_3year1 as
select *, count(dos_1) as total_visits3
from temp_msb_3yearx
group by key_hsn
order by key_hsn;
run;
proc sort data=temp_msb_3year1 nodupkey out=checkz; by key_hsn; run;
proc freq data=checkz;table total_visits3;run;

proc sql noprint;
create table temp_msb_3year2 as
select *, count(dos_1) as total_visits_phy3
from temp_msb_3year1
group by key_hsn, key_doc_num
order by key_hsn, key_doc_num;
run;

data ppr.visits_by_phy_3year;/*14943391 visits*/
retain key_hsn key_doc_num total_visits_phy3 total_visits3 upc3;
set temp_msb_3year2;
upc3=(total_visits_phy3/total_visits3)*100;
format upc3 6.2;
run;
proc sort data=ppr.visits_by_phy_3year out=tt nodupkey; by key_doc_num; run;/*1548*/

/*Single provider*/
data sole_visits ppr.after_sole_visits;/*sole=921798 1061676+rest left out=14861873=Total of 15783671*/
set ppr.visits_by_phy_3year;
if upc3=100 then output sole_visits;
else output ppr.after_sole_visits;
run;
proc sort data=sole_visits;/*sorting this way? Idea is to keep the last visit date*/
by key_hsn descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=sole_visits nodupkey out=ppr.sole_visits;/*729502 accounting for 921798 visits*/
by key_hsn key_doc_num;
run;
data ppr.sole_visits;
set ppr.sole_visits;
step=1;
run;

/*192296 individuals keys are alloted physician based on sole provider*/
proc sort data=ppr.sole_visits out=check1 nodupkey;
by key_hsn;
run;

/*14861873 observations (or 938099 unique individuals) has to allocated doctor based on criteria below*/
proc sort data=ppr.after_sole_visits out=check nodupkey;
by key_hsn;
run;
/*
2. Majority Provider;
3. if tie then PHYSICAL EXAM(3B), CDM(64B), SUPPORTIVE CARE(52B), WELL BABY(4B) takes prority;
4. if no physical then date of service takes priority
*/
data after_sole_visitsx;
retain key_hsn upc3 FSC physical_flag dos_1 key_doc_num;
set ppr.after_sole_visits;
/*if FSC in ('B003' 'B064' 'B052' 'B004' ) then physical_flag=1; else physical_flag=0;*/
run;
proc freq data=after_sole_visitsx; tables physical_flag; run;
proc sort data=after_sole_visitsx;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=after_sole_visitsx out=after_sole_visitsxz nodupkey; /*904902 accounting for 14084916 visits*/
by key_hsn;
run;

/*to add which step contributed, i changed code as under and we get same result*/
/*Here starts setp 2*/
proc sort data=after_sole_visitsx out=step2A nodupkey;
by key_hsn upc3 key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=step2A;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc freq data=step2A;
tables total_visits3;
run;

data step2B;
_n_ ++ 1;
if _n_ LE n then do;
set step2A point=_n_;
leadupc3=upc3;
end;
set step2A nobs=n end=end;
by key_hsn;
if end then leadupc3=.;
run;
data step2C;
set step2B;
by key_hsn;
if last.key_hsn then do;
leadupc3=.;
end;
run;
data step2D;
set step2C;
by key_hsn;
if first.key_hsn then do;
if upc3 GT leadupc3 then step=2;
     else step=9;
     end;
run;
proc freq data=step2D;
tables step;
run;
data step2E;/*741493 unique people got alloted in step 2*/
set step2D;
if step=2;
run;
proc sort data=step2E out=check nodupkey; by key_hsn; run;

/* Dec2019
just checking who got allotted in step 2 and what is there next highest ups3*/
data test22;
set step2A;
keep key_hsn key_doc_num upc3 total_phys;
run;
proc sort data=test22;
by KEY_HSN descending upc3;
run;
data test23;
set test22;
by KEY_HSN descending upc3;
if first.key_hsn then do;
    docN=1;
    cumuUPC3=UPC3;
End;
else do;
    docN+1;
    cumuUPC3 + UPc3;
end;
run;
data test24;
set test23;
if docN =1
or
(docN=2 and cumuUPC3 ge 75 and (cumuUPC3 - upc3) le 50);
run;

data test24only2nd;
    set test23;
    if (docN=2 and cumuUPC3 ge 75 and (cumuUPC3 - upc3) le 50);
run;





















/*Here starts setp 3*/
Proc sql;/*start with 1030476 observations*/
create table step3 as select * from after_sole_visitsx
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from step2E);
quit;
proc sort data=step3 out=step3A nodupkey;/*704108*/
by key_hsn physical_flag key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=step3A;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
data step3B;
_n_ ++ 1;
if _n_ LE n then do;
set step3A point=_n_;
leadphysical_flag=physical_flag;
end;
set step3A nobs=n end=end;
by key_hsn;
if end then leadphysical_flag=.;
run;
data step3C;
set step3B;
by key_hsn;
if last.key_hsn then do;
leadphysical_flag=.;
end;
run;
data step3D;
set step3C;
by key_hsn;
if first.key_hsn then do;
if physical_flag GT leadphysical_flag then step=3;
     else step=9;
     end;
run;
proc freq data=step3D;
tables step;
run;
data step3E;/*25078 unique people got alloted in step 2*/
set step3D;
if step=3;
run;
proc sort data=step3E out=check nodupkey; by key_hsn; run;

/*Here starts setp 4*/
Proc sql;/*start with 822472 observations*/
create table step4 as select * from step3
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from step3E);
quit;
proc sort data=step4 out=step4A nodupkey;/*822472*/
by key_hsn dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=step4A;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
data step4B;
_n_ ++ 1;
if _n_ LE n then do;
set step4A point=_n_;
leaddos_1=dos_1;
end;
set step4A nobs=n end=end;
by key_hsn;
if end then leaddos_1=.;
run;
data step4C;
set step4B;
by key_hsn;
if last.key_hsn then do;
leaddos_1=.;
end;
run;
data step4D;
set step4C;
by key_hsn;
if first.key_hsn then do;
if dos_1 GT leaddos_1 then step=4;
     else step=9;
     end;
run;
proc freq data=step4D;
tables step;
run;
data step4E;/*136652 unique people got alloted in step 2*/
set step4D;
if step=4;
run;
proc sort data=step4E out=check nodupkey; by key_hsn; run;

/*left out in all above steps assigned randomly*/
Proc sql;/*start with 6161 observations, these are going to different doctor but same date and same upc and same physical flag*/
create table step5 as select * from step4
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from step4E);
quit;

proc sort data=step5 out=step5A nodupkey;/*6161*/
by key_hsn dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=step5A out=FSCtest nodupkey;/*130 unique FSC*/
by fsc;
run;
proc print data=FSCtest noobs;
var FSC;
run;

data step5A;
set step5A;
random_number=rand('uniform');
run;
proc sort data=step5A;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 random_number;
run;
proc sort data=step5A out=step5B nodupkey;/*1679 got allotted based on lower key_doc_num*/
by key_hsn;
run;
data step5B;
set step5B;
step=4; /*we still call it step 4*/
run;

/*combining steps 2 to 5*/
data steps2to5;
set step2E step3E step4E step5B;
drop leadupc3 leadphysical_flag leaddos_1;
run;
proc freq data=steps2to5;
table step;
run;

/*
combining sole provider and step 2, 3 and 4
NOTE: There were 938099 observations read from the data set WORK.AFTER_SOLE_VISITSXZ.
NOTE: There were 192296 observations read from the data set PPR.SOLE_VISITS.
NOTE: The data set WORK.TOGETHER has 1130395 observations and 18 variables.
*/
data together;
retain key_hsn key_doc_num total_visits_phy3 total_visits3 upc3 step;
set
steps2to5 /*old way was this data: after_sole_visitsxz*/
ppr.sole_visits;
run;
proc sort data=together;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc freq data=together; table step; run;

/*how many physicians are there?*/
proc sort data=together out=tt1 nodupkey; by key_doc_num; run;/*1511*/
proc freq data=together order=freq;
tables key_doc_num upc3;
run;
proc sql noprint;
create table patients1 as
select *, count(key_hsn) as total_patients
from together
group by key_doc_num
order by key_doc_num;
run;
data unique_phy_patients;
retain key_doc_num key_hsn total_patients total_visits_phy3 total_visits3 upc3 spec spec1 spec_flag FSC physical_flag step;
set patients1;
if physical_flag=. then physical_flag=9;
keep FY key_doc_num key_hsn total_patients total_visits_phy3 total_visits3 upc3 spec spec1 spec_flag FSC physical_flag dos_1 step;
run;
proc freq data=unique_phy_patients; tables spec spec1 physical_flag; run;
proc sort data=unique_phy_patients out=dr nodupkey; by key_doc_num; run;/*1511 unique physician total*/
proc sort data=unique_phy_patients; by key_doc_num descending upc3; run;

/*Getting Demographic Information*/
%demog_assign(prs_xtrc_dt='02JAN2018'd,
ds_in=unique_phy_patients,
ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog,
strt_dt_var=dos_1,    
end_dt_var=dos_1,
geo_file=clean17.phrs_pers_resc_4_jas17_01dec2017,
incl_full_info=N);
data unique_phy_patients_demog;
set unique_phy_patients_demog;
age_dt='31Mar2018'd;
format age_dt date9.;
run;
%include '/SAS_data/dw0/HQC_share/nsidhu/PPR/sas code/calc_age_discr.sas';
%calc_age_discr(ds_in=unique_phy_patients_demog,ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog1,refday_var=age_dt,agevar=age);

/*addition of two other ages*/
data unique_phy_patients_demog1;
set unique_phy_patients_demog1;
age_dt1='31Mar2016'd;
format age_dt1 date9.;
age_dt2='31Mar2017'd;
format age_dt2 date9.;
run;
%calc_age_discr(ds_in=unique_phy_patients_demog1,ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog2,refday_var=age_dt1,agevar=age1);
%calc_age_discr(ds_in=unique_phy_patients_demog2,ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog3,refday_var=age_dt2,agevar=age2);

/*end of age*/
data ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog;
retain key_doc_num key_hsn age sex_desc rha urb_rur;
set unique_phy_patients_demog3;
drop age_dt tot_days mindiff_RHA RHAdays RHAdiff mindiff_Urb_Rur URdays URdiff INCQTL mindiff_INCQTL INCQTLdays INCQTLdiff NATV_STAT_FLAG;
run;
proc freq data=ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog;
table sex_desc rha urb_rur;
run;
proc sort data=ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog; by key_doc_num; run;

/*just creating missing physician data. In data but NOT in our panel data*/
Proc sql;
create table missing_dr as select * from ppr.temp_msb1
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog);
quit;
proc sort data=missing_dr out=missing_dr1 nodupkey;
by key_doc_num;
run;
data ppr.missing_dr;
set missing_dr1;
keep key_doc_num;
run;

/************************specialist data****************************/
data specialist;
length section $50;
set ppr.temp_msb1;
where ('01Apr2015'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2018'd);
if key_hsn='' then delete;
if num_srv=0 then delete;
if key_doc_num in:(&slush) then delete;
if mode in:(&mode_exc) then delete;

if ('01Apr2015'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2016'd) then FY='201516';
else if ('01Apr2016'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2017'd) then FY='201617';
else if ('01Apr2017'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2018'd) then FY='201718';
else if ('01Apr2018'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2019'd) then FY='201819';

if substr(spec,1,1)="B" then section = "General Practice";
if substr(spec,1,1)="C" then section = "Paediatrics";

if substr(spec,1,2)="DK" then section = "Neurology";
if substr(spec,1,2)="DL" then section = "Cardiology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="D" and spec not in ('DK', 'DL') then section = "Internal Medicine";

if substr(spec,1,1)="E" then section = "Psychiatry";
if substr(spec,1,1)="F" then section = "Dermatology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="G" then section = "Medical Genetics";
if substr(spec,1,1)="H" then section = "Anaesthesia";
if substr(spec,1,1)="I" then section = "Physical Medicine";
if substr(spec,1,1)="K" then section = "NeuroSurgery";

if substr(spec,1,2)="LB" then section = "General Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,2)="LL" then section = "Cardiac Surgery";

if substr(spec,1,1)="M" then section = "Orthopaedic Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,1)="N" then section = "Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,1)="P" then section = "Obstetrics & Gynaecology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="R" then section = "Urological Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,1)="S" then section = "Ophthalmology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="T" then section = "Otolaryngology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="X" then section = "Diagnostic Radiology & Radiology Oncology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="Y" then section = "Therapeutic Radiology & Nuclear Medicine";
if substr(spec,1,1)="V" then section = "Laboratory Specialties";
if substr(spec,1,1)="W" then section = "Others (NP, RN,etc.)";

if section NE "General Practice";
run;
proc sort data=specialist out=ppr.specialist nodupkey; by key_hsn key_doc_num dos_1; run;

proc freq data=ppr.specialist;
table SPEC_flag spec*section;
run;

data check;
set ppr.specialist;
if section = "General Practice";
run;

/*May 21, 2019*/
/*Cretating artifical data*/
proc freq data=ppr.UNIQUE_PHY_PATIENTS_DEMOG;
tables step;
run;


proc freq data=randomdataMay21;
where dr=2;
tables step sex upc;
run;

t///

children.name: UPCINdex Cross Check
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*Check the UPC index calculation*/

/*1. Get a list of patients who had 100% UPC Index from the statin cohort*/

%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXC_F.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXC_F.sas7bdat)
);
data ptFile;
    set vxc_f;
    keep key_hsn key_doc_num entryDate UPCIndexF N_VisitsF T_visitsF UCPF1;
    key_doc_num = scan(UCPF1, 1, ':');
    N_VisitsF= input(scan(UCPF1, 2, ':'), 8.);
    if UPCIndexF=100;
    If Year(entryDate) = 2015 and month(entryDate)=6;
    /*get patients of june 2015*/
run;

/* T_VisitsF :8. UpcIndexF :8.2 key_doc_num :$11. N_VisitsF:8.0 ;*/
data _tmp2;
    input key_hsn $11. @13 EntryDate $8. @22 key_doc_num $11. T_VisitsF;
    datalines;

data temp_msb1;
    set localt.temp_msb;
    SPEC1=trim(left(upcase(substr(SPEC, 1,1))));
    if SPEC1='B' then SPEC_flag=1; else SPEC_flag=0;
    if key_hsn='15035314639' and dos_1 >= '08jun2015'd and dos_1 <='08jun2015'd +364;
run;


/*Exclusions mention above in notes*/
data temp_msb2;/*332003786 out of 54983036*/
    set temp_msb1;

    if key_hsn='' then delete;
    if num_srv=0 then delete;
    *if los in:(&in_patient) then delete;/*we decided to include hospital physician visits April 26*/
    if key_doc_num in:(&slush) then delete;
    if spec not in: ('B') then delete;
    if mode in:(&mode_exc) then delete;
    if substr(spec,1,1)='C' and ~(substr(fsc,1,1) not in ('B','C')) then delete;
run;

data temp_msb1x;

if FSC in ('B003' 'B064' 'B052' 'B004' ) then physical_flag=1; else physical_flag=0;
run;

proc sort data=temp_msb1x;
by key_hsn key_doc_num dos_1 descending physical_flag;
run;
proc sort data=temp_msb1x out=temp_msb2 nodupkey;
by key_hsn key_doc_num dos_1;
run;



%sqljoinv2(
    t1=temp_msb2,
    t2=PTFILE,
    target=temp_msb_1year,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.entryDate),
    filters=%str(t1.dos_1 between t2.entryDate and t2.entryDate +364),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);




proc sort data=temp_msb_1year out=tt nodupkey; by key_doc_num; run;/*1548*/

proc sql noprint;
create table temp_msb_1year1 as
select *, count(dos_1) as total_visits1
from temp_msb_1year
group by key_hsn
order by key_hsn;
run;
proc sort data=temp_msb_1year1 nodupkey out=checkz; by key_hsn; run;


proc sql noprint;
create table temp_msb_1year2 as
select *, count(dos_1) as total_visits_phy1
from temp_msb_1year1
group by key_hsn, key_doc_num
order by key_hsn, key_doc_num;
run;

data visits_by_phy_1year;/*14943391 visits*/
retain key_hsn key_doc_num total_visits_phy1 total_visits1 upc1;
set temp_msb_1year2;
upc1=(total_visits_phy1/total_visits1)*100;
format upc1 6.2;
run;

/*so what is the UPC by patient-doc*/
%distinct(
    data=visits_by_phy_1year,
    target= test1,
    vars=%str(key_hsn, key_doc_num, upc1,total_visits_phy1, total_visits1 ),
    orderby=%str(key_hsn, upc1 desc)
);
data test2;
    set test1;
    by key_hsn descending upc1;
    if first.key_hsn;
run;

    where key_hsn ='15035314639';
run;
proc sort data=test10;
where dos between '08jun2015'd and '08jun2015'd +364 ;
by key_hsn dos;run;


data test11;/*332003786 out of 54983036*/
    set test10;

    if key_hsn='' then delete;
    if num_srv=0 then delete;
    *if los in:(&in_patient) then delete;/*we decided to include hospital physician visits April 26*/
    if key_doc_num in:(&slush) then delete;
    if spec not in: ('B') then delete;
    if mode in:(&mode_exc) then delete;
    if substr(spec,1,1)='C' and ~(substr(fsc,1,1) not in ('B','C')) then delete;
run;

data test12;
    set VXC_F1;
    if key_hsn = '15035314639';
run;

%getUPCIndex(

    debug=1
);

















/*Here starts setp 3*/
Proc sql;/*start with 1030476 observations*/
create table step3 as select * from after_sole_visitsx
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from step2E);
quit;
proc sort data=step3 out=step3A nodupkey;/*704108*/
by key_hsn physical_flag key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=step3A;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
data step3B;
_n_ ++ 1;
if _n_ LE n then do;
set step3A point=_n_;
leadphysical_flag=physical_flag;
end;
set step3A nobs=n end=end;
by key_hsn;
if end then leadphysical_flag=.;
run;
data step3C;
set step3B;
by key_hsn;
if last.key_hsn then do;
leadphysical_flag=.;
end;
run;
data step3D;
set step3C;
by key_hsn;
if first.key_hsn then do;
if physical_flag GT leadphysical_flag then step=3;
     else step=9;
     end;
run;
proc freq data=step3D;
tables step;
run;
data step3E;/*25078 unique people got alloted in step 2*/
set step3D;
if step=3;
run;
proc sort data=step3E out=check nodupkey; by key_hsn; run;

/*Here starts setp 4*/
Proc sql;/*start with 822472 observations*/
create table step4 as select * from step3
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from step3E);
quit;
proc sort data=step4 out=step4A nodupkey;/*822472*/
by key_hsn dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=step4A;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
data step4B;
_n_ ++ 1;
if _n_ LE n then do;
set step4A point=_n_;
leaddos_1=dos_1;
end;
set step4A nobs=n end=end;
by key_hsn;
if end then leaddos_1=.;
run;
data step4C;
set step4B;
by key_hsn;
if last.key_hsn then do;
leaddos_1=.;
end;
run;
data step4D;
set step4C;
by key_hsn;
if first.key_hsn then do;
if dos_1 GT leaddos_1 then step=4;
     else step=9;
     end;
run;
proc freq data=step4D;
tables step;
run;
data step4E;/*136652 unique people got alloted in step 2*/
set step4D;
if step=4;
run;
proc sort data=step4E out=check nodupkey; by key_hsn; run;

/*left out in all above steps assigned randomly*/
Proc sql;/*start with 6161 observations, these are going to different doctor but same date and same upc and same physical flag*/
create table step5 as select * from step4
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from step4E);
quit;

proc sort data=step5 out=step5A nodupkey;/*6161*/
by key_hsn dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc sort data=step5A out=FSCtest nodupkey;/*130 unique FSC*/
by fsc;
run;
proc print data=FSCtest noobs;
var FSC;
run;

data step5A;
set step5A;
random_number=rand('uniform');
run;
proc sort data=step5A;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 random_number;
run;
proc sort data=step5A out=step5B nodupkey;/*1679 got allotted based on lower key_doc_num*/
by key_hsn;
run;
data step5B;
set step5B;
step=4; /*we still call it step 4*/
run;

/*combining steps 2 to 5*/
data steps2to5;
set step2E step3E step4E step5B;
drop leadupc3 leadphysical_flag leaddos_1;
run;
proc freq data=steps2to5;
table step;
run;

/*
combining sole provider and step 2, 3 and 4
NOTE: There were 938099 observations read from the data set WORK.AFTER_SOLE_VISITSXZ.
NOTE: There were 192296 observations read from the data set PPR.SOLE_VISITS.
NOTE: The data set WORK.TOGETHER has 1130395 observations and 18 variables.
*/
data together;
retain key_hsn key_doc_num total_visits_phy3 total_visits3 upc3 step;
set
steps2to5 /*old way was this data: after_sole_visitsxz*/
ppr.sole_visits;
run;
proc sort data=together;
by key_hsn descending upc3 descending physical_flag descending dos_1 key_doc_num;
run;
proc freq data=together; table step; run;

/*how many physicians are there?*/
proc sort data=together out=tt1 nodupkey; by key_doc_num; run;/*1511*/
proc freq data=together order=freq;
tables key_doc_num upc3;
run;
proc sql noprint;
create table patients1 as
select *, count(key_hsn) as total_patients
from together
group by key_doc_num
order by key_doc_num;
run;
data unique_phy_patients;
retain key_doc_num key_hsn total_patients total_visits_phy3 total_visits3 upc3 spec spec1 spec_flag FSC physical_flag step;
set patients1;
if physical_flag=. then physical_flag=9;
keep FY key_doc_num key_hsn total_patients total_visits_phy3 total_visits3 upc3 spec spec1 spec_flag FSC physical_flag dos_1 step;
run;
proc freq data=unique_phy_patients; tables spec spec1 physical_flag; run;
proc sort data=unique_phy_patients out=dr nodupkey; by key_doc_num; run;/*1511 unique physician total*/
proc sort data=unique_phy_patients; by key_doc_num descending upc3; run;

/*Getting Demographic Information*/
%demog_assign(prs_xtrc_dt='02JAN2018'd,
ds_in=unique_phy_patients,
ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog,
strt_dt_var=dos_1,    
end_dt_var=dos_1,
geo_file=clean17.phrs_pers_resc_4_jas17_01dec2017,
incl_full_info=N);
data unique_phy_patients_demog;
set unique_phy_patients_demog;
age_dt='31Mar2018'd;
format age_dt date9.;
run;
%include '/SAS_data/dw0/HQC_share/nsidhu/PPR/sas code/calc_age_discr.sas';
%calc_age_discr(ds_in=unique_phy_patients_demog,ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog1,refday_var=age_dt,agevar=age);

/*addition of two other ages*/
data unique_phy_patients_demog1;
set unique_phy_patients_demog1;
age_dt1='31Mar2016'd;
format age_dt1 date9.;
age_dt2='31Mar2017'd;
format age_dt2 date9.;
run;
%calc_age_discr(ds_in=unique_phy_patients_demog1,ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog2,refday_var=age_dt1,agevar=age1);
%calc_age_discr(ds_in=unique_phy_patients_demog2,ds_out=unique_phy_patients_demog3,refday_var=age_dt2,agevar=age2);

/*end of age*/
data ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog;
retain key_doc_num key_hsn age sex_desc rha urb_rur;
set unique_phy_patients_demog3;
drop age_dt tot_days mindiff_RHA RHAdays RHAdiff mindiff_Urb_Rur URdays URdiff INCQTL mindiff_INCQTL INCQTLdays INCQTLdiff NATV_STAT_FLAG;
run;
proc freq data=ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog;
table sex_desc rha urb_rur;
run;
proc sort data=ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog; by key_doc_num; run;

/*just creating missing physician data. In data but NOT in our panel data*/
Proc sql;
create table missing_dr as select * from ppr.temp_msb1
where key_hsn not in
(select key_hsn from ppr.unique_phy_patients_demog);
quit;
proc sort data=missing_dr out=missing_dr1 nodupkey;
by key_doc_num;
run;
data ppr.missing_dr;
set missing_dr1;
keep key_doc_num;
run;

/************************specialist data****************************/
data specialist;
length section $50;
set ppr.temp_msb1;
where ('01Apr2015'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2018'd);
if key_hsn='' then delete;
if num_srv=0 then delete;
if key_doc_num in:(&slush) then delete;
if mode in:(&mode_exc) then delete;

if ('01Apr2015'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2016'd) then FY='201516';
else if ('01Apr2016'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2017'd) then FY='201617';
else if ('01Apr2017'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2018'd) then FY='201718';
else if ('01Apr2018'd LE dos_1 LE '31Mar2019'd) then FY='201819';

if substr(spec,1,1)="B" then section = "General Practice";
if substr(spec,1,1)="C" then section = "Paediatrics";

if substr(spec,1,2)="DK" then section = "Neurology";
if substr(spec,1,2)="DL" then section = "Cardiology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="D" and spec not in ('DK', 'DL') then section = "Internal Medicine";

if substr(spec,1,1)="E" then section = "Psychiatry";
if substr(spec,1,1)="F" then section = "Dermatology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="G" then section = "Medical Genetics";
if substr(spec,1,1)="H" then section = "Anaesthesia";
if substr(spec,1,1)="I" then section = "Physical Medicine";
if substr(spec,1,1)="K" then section = "NeuroSurgery";

if substr(spec,1,2)="LB" then section = "General Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,2)="LL" then section = "Cardiac Surgery";

if substr(spec,1,1)="M" then section = "Orthopaedic Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,1)="N" then section = "Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,1)="P" then section = "Obstetrics & Gynaecology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="R" then section = "Urological Surgery";
if substr(spec,1,1)="S" then section = "Ophthalmology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="T" then section = "Otolaryngology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="X" then section = "Diagnostic Radiology & Radiology Oncology";
if substr(spec,1,1)="Y" then section = "Therapeutic Radiology & Nuclear Medicine";
if substr(spec,1,1)="V" then section = "Laboratory Specialties";
if substr(spec,1,1)="W" then section = "Others (NP, RN,etc.)";

if section NE "General Practice";
run;
proc sort data=specialist out=ppr.specialist nodupkey; by key_hsn key_doc_num dos_1; run;

proc freq data=ppr.specialist;
table SPEC_flag spec*section;
run;

data check;
set ppr.specialist;
if section = "General Practice";
run;

/*Cretating artifical data*/
proc freq data=ppr.UNIQUE_PHY_PATIENTS_DEMOG;
tables step;
run;


proc freq data=randomdataMay21;
where dr=2;
tables step sex upc;
run;

///t

/*VXC_R: Table 1. patient flow*/
/*The report in &localReportPath\Analytical Report.xlsx contains the primary patient flow*/
data _null_;run;


/*VXC_R1, get existing patient flow from the report generated when preparing data*/
Proc import datafile="&localReportPath.\Analytical Report.xlsx"
    dbms=excel
    out=VXC_R1a
    replace;
    getnames=no;
    sheet= "Patient flow";
run;
data VXC_R1b;
    set VXC_R1a;
    keep F1 f3 obs;
    if f1 ne '';
run;
data VXC_R1;
    length F1 $500.;
    set VXC_R1b;
    if _n_ = 2 then F1 = "Received statin medications between Jan 1,2012 and Dec 31, 2017" ;
    if _n_ = 3 then F1 = "Excluding those missing age/sex information " ;
    if _n_ = 5 then F1 = "Excluding those le 18 on cohort entry " ;
    if _n_ = 7 then F1 = "Excluding those not continuously registered for healthcare service within the washout period of 1825 days, or a follow-up period of 365 days " ;
    if _n_ = 9 then F1 = "Excluding those receiving statin medications within the washout period";
    if _n_ in (1,2,3,5,7,9);
    rename F1=Steps F3 = Remaining;
run;

/*VXC_R2. Note: there could be persons continuously covered until the 365th day since entry, but died
    on the 365th day. These patients, if exist, should be excluded*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.VXA1,
    target=VXC_R2,
    vars=%str(
        "Excluding those deceased within washout,or follow-up period " as Steps length=500,
        count (key_hsn) as Remaining
    )
);


/*VXC_R3. Adding the flow info after excluding those stayed in LTC during washout or follow-up*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.VXA2,
    target=VXC_R3,
    vars=%str(
        "Excluding those admitted to long term care facilities within washout,or follow-up period " as Steps length=500,
        count (key_hsn) as Remaining
    )
);

/*VXC_R4 Adding the flow info after excluding those stayed in an out province facility*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.VXA3,
    target=VXC_R4,
    vars=%str(
        "Excluding those unable to obtain sufficient data for analysis (e.g. stayed in an out-out-province facility for acute care during follow-up " as Steps length=500,
        count (key_hsn) as Remaining
    )
);

/*VXC_R5 Adding the flow info after excluding those pregnant during run-in or followup*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXA,
    target=VXC_R5,
    vars=%str(
        "Excluding those pregnant during run-in or followup " as Steps length=500,
        count (key_hsn) as Remaining
    )
);


/*VXC_R6. Adding the flow info after excluding those not have encounters with a GP during followup */
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXB_pt,
    target=VXC_R6,
    vars=%str(
        "Excluding those not having encounters with a GP during follow up " as Steps length=500,
        count (key_hsn) as Remaining
    )
);

/*VXC_R7. Adding the flow info after excluding those whose GP missing age, sex, grad year, grad country info */
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXC_F,
    target=VXC_R7,
    vars=%str(
        "Excluding patients whose usual care provider missing age, sex, grad year, grad country info " as Steps length=500,
        count (key_hsn) as Remaining
    )
);


/*VXC_R8. Putting all steps together */
data VXC_R8;
    obs=_n_;
    set VXC_R1-VXC_R7;
run;


data localt.VXC_R;
    set VXC_R8;
    if obs >0 then     Excluded = lag(Remaining)-Remaining;
    Project = &_clientprojectname;
    Program = &_clienttasklabel;
    CreateDate = date();
    format CreateDate date9.;
    rename Remaining = NPatients_remaining;
run;

/*proc export data=localt.VXC_R*/
/*    dbms=xlsx*/
/*    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"*/
/*    replace;*/
/*    sheet= "T1.Patient Flow";    */
/*;*/
/*run;*/
    


s///
t///

children.name: VXC_W_UPCIndx in whole period UCPW
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXC_W. determine the upc index during running through followup for all the encounterd GPs during running through followup,
    and the UCP of the whole period*/
data _null_;run;


/*VXC_W0, perepared source data*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\vxb.zip),
        srcFile=%str(vxb.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXB_F.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXB_F.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXC_F.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXC_F.sas7bdat)
);

/*VXC_W1, From vxb, get claims with running through followup, i.e., 365 days since to the index(entryDate) */
data VXC_W1;
    set vxb;
    where DOS between entryDate - &runindays and entryDate + &followdays -1;
run;

/*calculate the UPC index from encounter episodes in running through followup*/
/*the macro getUPCIndex works for MSB claim data, and other data
    for claimTYpe = '', MSB claim data, the LOS, MODE, SPEC, and NUM_SRV must be provided
        the excluding LOC, excluding MODE, and including SPEC must be provided
    for cliamtype=others: other data (like in this case, the episodes have been prepared, or like prescription data)
        specify the claimType as others, and do not need to specify LOS,MODE exclusion, and SPEC
    By default, the target file contains the doc with the max UPCIndex
    but this is not what is wanted here.
    For this analysis, it is expected to keep all docs, each doc having a UPC index
    so the interested data set is not the target, but the tmp5 file created by the macro    
*/
%getUPCIndex(
    data=VXC_W1,
    target=notInterested,
    claimType=others,
    debug=1
);


/*VXC_W2. for each patient, sort by UPC index*/
%sort(data= getUPC_tmp5, target=VXC_W2, sorter=%str(key_hsn descending UPCIndex));

/*VXC_W3. Keep physician(s) with the highest UPC index for each cohort patient*/
/*VXC_W3a, determine the highest UPC index of each patient */
data VXC_W3a;
    set VXC_W2;
    by key_hsn descending UPCIndex;
    if first.key_hsn;
    keep key_hsn UPCIndex;
run;
/*VXC_W3b, link the patient and highest UPC index back to VXC_W2, and keep patient-physician pairs with the highest UPC index
(there could be multiple physicians with tie index values for a single patient)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXC_W2,
    t2=VXC_W3a,
    target=VXC_W3b1,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars= key_hsn upcindex,
    orderby=%str(key_hsn)
);



/*VXC_W3b2, insert a step here to exclude patients who had only one UCP, and the UCP
    cannot be found in the mobility file (the UCP does not have age/sex, ... info)
*/
/*VXC_W3b2. Clean up the doc properties
    The original file is quite messy:
    1) It does not seems to be time specific
    2) For the same docID, the field values (e.g., sex) can be missing in some records.
*/

/*VXC_W3b2a have a distinct list of doc from F3b (the physicians ever had encounters with cohort patients*/
%distinct(data=VXC_W3b1, target=VXC_W3b2, vars=key_doc_num);
/*VXC_W3b1b keep records in which sex, age, ... is not missing*/
%macro cleanDoc(docVar=);
    %local docVar;
    Data VXC_W3b2b;
        set Master_MSB_DocInfo;
        if &docVar ne '';
        if report_end =. then report_end=today();
        keep key_doc_num &docVar report_end;
    run;
    /*VXC_W3b1b sort and keep the lastest record of a doc*/
    %sort(data=VXC_W3b2b, sorter=key_doc_num report_end);
    data VXC_W3b2c;
        set VXC_W3b2b;
        by key_doc_num report_end;
        if last.key_doc_num;
    run;
    /*VXC_W3b2c, attach the selected property to the docs in VXJ_A1*/
    %sqljoinv2(
        t1=VXC_W3b2,
        t2=VXC_W3b2c,
        target=VXC_W3b2,
        vars=%str(t1.*, t2.&docVar as Doc&docVar),
        jtype=inner,
        jvars=key_doc_num
    );
/*    %freq(data=VXC_W3b2, table=Doc&docVar);*/
%mend cleanDoc;
%cleanDoc(docVar=Sex);
%cleanDoc(docVar=BIRTH_YEAR);
%cleanDoc(docVar=grad_year);
%cleanDoc(docVar=GRAD_GEO_COUNTRY);
/*the above results in a list of physicians with complete info of age, sex, grad year, and grad country*/

/*Link VXC_W3b2 to VXC_W3b1, select patients whose physician are in F3b2
    In F3b2, physicians are not missing for age, sex, grad year and grad country
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXC_W3b1,
    t2=VXC_W3b2,
    target=VXC_W3b,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars= key_doc_num,
    orderby=%str(key_hsn, upcindex desc)
);





/*VXC_W3c. determine the UCPW. In case of tie, getUCPW1,UCPW2, ....
     in case of tie, there will be multipleUCPWs. DocNumer, Nvisits, UPCindex, these are all specific by eachUCPW
    and we'll need these values for eachUCPW.
    Following is a smart idea:
    1) putting values of these doc-specifc variables into a string (theStr), with the dlmt ";"
    2) make a tag of UCPW1, 2, etc
*/
data VXC_W3c;
    set VXC_W3b;
    format UPCIndex 6.2;
    by key_hsn ;
    if first.key_hsn then do;
        i =1;
        UCPW='UCPW' || strip(i);    
    end;
    else do;
        i+1;
        UCPW='UCPW' || strip(i);
    end;
    drop i;
    /*combine the var values together*/
    length theStr $50.;
    theStr = catx(':', key_doc_num, N_Visits, put(UPCIndex, 6.2));
    rename T_visits=T_visitsW N_visits = NMax_VisitsPerDocW UPCIndex=UPCIndexW;
run;
/*VXC_W3d. Now we can transpose the string in theStr into columsn of UCPW1, 2, ...
    The values will stay there. Later we can use scan(var, # of word, dlmt) to get the values
    (i.e., scan(UCPW1, 1, ":") is the key_doc_num of UCPW1, scan(UCPW1, 2, ";") is the n_visits of UCPW1, etc
    Quetions: Why it has to be like this?
    The # of visits, the UPC index will always be the same for UCPs of the same doctor...
*/
%transpose(data = VXC_W3c, target=VXC_W3,
    rowhead =key_hsn NMax_VisitsPerDocW T_VisitsW UPCIndexW ,
    colhead=UCPW,
    contents= theStr
);
/*example to get upcindex of UCPW1*/
/*
data test;
    set VXC_W3 (obs=1);
    UPCIndex_UCPW1= scan(UCPW1, 3, ':');
run;
*/


/*VXC_W4. The docs in VXC_W3 are UCPWs, link them back to VXB_finalcohort(the cohort)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXC_F,
    t2=VXC_W3,
    target=VXC_W,
    vars=*,
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXC_W.zip,
    srcFile=VXC_W.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*how many patients had multiple UCPs*/
/*data test;*/
/*    set VXC_W;*/
/*    MultipleUCPWs=0;*/
/*    if UCPW2 ne '' then MultipleUCPWs=1;*/
/*run;*/
/*%freq(data=test, table = MultipleUCPWs);*/

%exportvars(data=VXC_W);
