children.name: VXL_FS UCPIndexF predictors -Logistic
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*localt.VXL_FS. UPC Index predictors*/

data _null_;run;

%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXJ_C.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXL_FS1.sas7bdat)
);

/*Univariate models betwen VXJ_C and a factor
    a more complete macro for poission/netbin model can be found in VHF of the ultrasound program
    that one can handle mean of estimations.
*/
/*Add doc related covariates*/

data VXL_FS1;
    set VXJ_C;
/*add doc related factors*/
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
Run;


/*create an empty set to hold results*/
data localt.VXL_FS; length Level1 $50. parameter $50. outcomeVar $50. CutOffVar $50.; delete;run;
%macro UniLogistic(data=, Outcome=, CutOffVar=, theVar=, classref=, target=, debug=);
    %local data theVar Outcome CutOffVar classref DispersionWaldCLSign model;
    /*Start from negbin*/
    %let model=logistic;

    data UniLogistic_tmp0;
        set &data;
        Outcome=0;
        if &Outcome >= &CutOffVar then Outcome =1;
    run;

    %if &debug ne 1 %then %do; ods results off; %end;
    proc genmod data = UniLogistic_tmp0 desc;
        %if %length(&classref) ne 0 %then %do;
            class &theVar (ref=&classRef) /param=reference;
        %end;
        model Outcome = &theVar /dist=bin link=logit type3 ;
        ods output ParameterEstimates = UniLogistic_tmp1 ;
    run;
    %if &debug ne 1 %then %do; ods results on;%end;

    /*from UniLogistic_tmp1, get the estimate (beta) of the var*/
    data UniLogistic_tmp3;
        set UniLogistic_tmp1 (firstobs=2 obs=2);
        OR = Exp(Estimate);
        ORL= Exp(LowerWaldCL);
        ORU=Exp(UpperWaldCL);
        /*the parameter from the ods table is truncated to the max length of 20, therefore is incomplete. Replace it by theVar*/
        Parameter = upcase(symget('theVar'));
        length model $10.;
        model = symget('model');
        Project=&_clientProjectName;
        Program=&_clientTaskLabel;
        createDate=Date();
        format createDate date9.;
        outcomeVar = upcase(strip(symget('Outcome')));
        cutoffVar = upcase(strip(symget('cutoffVar')));
    run;
    
    data ⌖
        set &target UniLogistic_tmp3;
    run;

    %if &debug ne 1 %then %do;
        proc datasets nolist;
            delete UniLogistic_tmp:;
        run;
    %end;

%mend UniLogistic;

%macro UniLogistic_batchVars(OutcomeVar =, cutoffVar=);
    %local outcomeVar cutoffvar;

    %UniLogistic(data=VXL_FS1, Outcome=&OutcomeVar, cutoffVar=&cutoffVar, theVar=sex_Desc, classref=%str('M'), target=localt.VXL_FS, debug=1);
    %UniLogistic(data=VXL_FS1, Outcome=&OutcomeVar, cutoffVar=&cutoffVar, theVar=age, classref=, target=localt.VXL_FS);

    %UniLogistic(data=VXL_FS1, Outcome=&OutcomeVar, cutoffVar=&cutoffVar, theVar=NVisits_GP_Post365, target=localt.VXL_FS);

    %UniLogistic(data=VXL_FS1, Outcome=&OutcomeVar, cutoffVar=&cutoffVar, theVar=NVisits_ER_Post365, target=localt.VXL_FS);

    %UniLogistic(data=VXL_FS1, Outcome=&OutcomeVar, cutoffVar=&cutoffVar, theVar=CAMH_NPD_Pre365, target=localt.VXL_FS);

children.name: ! VXK_FS MultiV
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXLR/KR multivariate analysis about UPC index? Repeat!*/
s///
t///

children.name: Obj1b. UPC Index not cover # visits, USP, and CMEP
children.NodeDescription:
///t

t///

///h

  1. UPC index does not reflect # of visits (i.e., patients could have a high UPC index, yet the # of visits is low (1b1)
  2. High UPC index does not predict USP or CMEP. (i.e., patients could have a high UPC index, yet it does not suggest that the patient has the same doc as USP, or CMEP, or COMPCOC)

h///

children.name: VXH_FS Same Doc (comp coc)
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXH_FS. UCPF = USPF, UCPF=CMEPF*/

data _null_;run;

/*VXH_FS0. prepare source data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXG.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VXG.sas7bdat)
);
%print(data=VXG);


/*VXH_FS1. indicate whether UCPF is the same doc as USPF, or CMEPF*/
%let thePatten =CompFS_Pattern;
%let theUCPUSP=UCPFUSPF;
%let theUCPCMEP=UCPFCMEPF;
data VXH_FS1;
    set VXG;
    length _tmp1 $100. ;
    /*split the pattern into 3 substrings, each for UCPF, USPF, and CMEPF
        then select the desired combination*/
    /*UCPF and USPF*/
    same_&theUCPUSP=0;
    _tmp1='';
    do i =1 , 2 ;
        _tmp1= strip(_tmp1) || ';' || strip(scan(&thePatten, i, ";"));
        /*The following is like counting 2As, 2Bs, ..., 2Zs. If any of them is matched, UCPF and USPF are the same doc*/
        do j = 1 to 26;
            if count(_tmp1, byte(j+63)) =2 then do;
                same_&theUCPUSP=1;
                leave;
            end;
        end;
    end;
    /*UCPF and CMEPF*/
    same_&theUCPCMEP=0;
    _tmp1='';
    do i =1 , 3 ;
        _tmp1= strip(_tmp1) || ';' || strip(scan(&thePatten, i, ";"));
        do j = 1 to 26;
            if count(_tmp1, byte(j+63)) =2 then do;
                same_&theUCPCMEP=1;
                leave;
            end;
        end;
    end;
    drop _tmp: i j;
run;


/*VXH_FS2. Determine the 25% and 75% percentile category of UPCIndexF */
proc means data = VXH_FS1 noprint;
    var UPCIndexF;
    output out=VXH_FS2a mean=mean median=median p25 = p25 p75=p75 ;
run;
/*In VXH_FS1, indicate the category by UPCIndexF*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXH_FS1,
    t2=VXH_FS2a,
    target=VXH_FS2,
    vars=%str(
        t1.*,
        t2.p25 as UPCIndexFP25,
        t2.median as UPCIndexFP50,
        t2.p75 as UPCIndexFP75,
        (case
            when t1.UPCIndexF < t2.p25 then cat('_0L_', '(<', round(t2.p25, 1), ')')
            when t1.UPCIndexF >= t2.p25 and t1.UPCIndexF < t2.p75 then cat('_1M_', '(', round(t2.p25, 1), ' to ', round(t2.p75, 1)-1, ')')
            when t1.UPCIndexF >= t2.p75 then cat('_2H_', '(>=', round(t2.p75,1), ')')
            else 'Wrong'
            end ) as UPCIndexF_Cat
    ),
    jtype=cross
);
%freq(data=VXH_FS2, table=UPCIndexF_Cat);


/*VXH_FS3. Determine the 25% and 75% percentile category of # visits to the most visited GP */
proc means data = VXH_FS2 noprint;
    var NMax_VisitsPerDocF;
    output out=VXH_FS3a mean=mean median=median p25 = p25 p75=p75 min=min max=max ;
run;
/*In VXH_FS1, indicate the category by UPCIndexF*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXH_FS2,
    t2=VXH_FS3a,
    target=VXH_FS,
    vars=%str(
        t1.*,
        t2.p25 as NMax_VisitsPerDocF25,
        t2.median as NMax_VisitsPerDocF50,
        t2.p75 as NMax_VisitsPerDocF75,
        (case
            when t1.NMax_VisitsPerDocF < t2.p25 then cat('_0L_', '(<', t2.p25, ')')
            when t1.NMax_VisitsPerDocF >= t2.p25 and t1.NMax_VisitsPerDocF < t2.p75 then cat('_1M_', '(', t2.p25, ' to ', t2.p75-1, ')')
            when t1.NMax_VisitsPerDocF >= t2.p75 then cat('_2H_', '(>=', t2.p75, ')')
            else 'Wrong'
            end ) length = 20 as NMax_VisitsPerDocF_Cat
    ),
    jtype=cross
);
%freq(data=VXH_FS, table=UPCIndexF_Cat * NMax_VisitsPerDocF_Cat );
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXH_FS.zip,
    srcFile=VXH_FS.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);

%exportvars(data=VXH_FS);

t///

children.name: VXH_RT6a(FS) Table 6A
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VXH_RT6A_ Report of Table 6A (UCPF, USPF, CMEPF)*/

data _null_;run;
/*%freq(data=VXH_FS, table=UPCIndexF_Cat * NMax_VisitsPerDocF_Cat );*/

children.name: VZA Period specific UCPs
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*
VZA: get period specific pairs of patient-physician, and entrydate
*/

data _null_;run;

%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXM_FS.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXM_FS.sas7bdat)
);

%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_patientidmap_pop.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_patientidmap_pop.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_docidmap_pop.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_docidmap_pop.sas7bdat)
);

/*VZA1, from VXM_FS, get the patient id, doc id, and the entrydate*/
data VZA1;
    set VXM_FS;
    length key_doc_num $11.;
    keep key_hsn entrydate UCPF1 key_doc_num;
    key_doc_num = scan(UCPF1,1,":");
run;

/*VZA2, add the compressed patient id*/
%print(data=master_docidmap_pop);
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZA1,
    t2=master_patientidmap_pop,
    target=VZA2,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.key_hsnC),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*all patients are found in the map_pop file*/

/*VZA3, add the compressed doc id*/
%print(data=master_patientidmap_pop);
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZA2,
    t2=master_docidmap_pop,
    target=localt.VZA,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.key_doc_numC),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_doc_num
);
/*%print(data=localt.VZA);*/
/*all docs are found in the map_pop file*/
/*
    Note: in VZA, the patients are statin cohort members
    the entrydates are entrydate of a statin cohort member
    the doc ids are UCPs of the statin cohort member during the followup defined by the entrydate
*/
s///
t///

children.name: VZE encounters to UCPs by statin users receiving statin during followup
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZE
    the statin user who visited the UCP of the cohort member during the follow up period.
    Yes, it is that complicated
    1) the patients in VZE must be a statin user, i.e., patient in VZC must be in VZD
        That will greatly reduce the # of records!
    2) the docs in VZE must be in VZA (i.e., the MSB claims are with the UCP of the cohort member)
    3) the patient in VZE must received statin during the entry specific follow up period (this is different from
        1) in that in 1) patients are those ever received a statin; in 3) patients must receive a statin during the follow up
*/
data _null_;run;

/*VZE0. Prepare study data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZC.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZC.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZD.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZD.sas7bdat)
);

/*VZE1. From VZD, get a list of distinct patient id. These are statin users (prevalent users, new users, all of them)*/
%distinct(data=VZD, target=VZE1, vars=key_hsnc);

/*VZE2. From VZC (encounters to GPs), keep records where the patient ids are in VZE1. These are MSB encounters to GPs
    of statin users*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZC,
    target=VZE2,
    vars=*,
    filters=%str(t1.key_hsnc in (select key_hsnc from VZE1))
);

/*VZE3, from VZE2, prepare distinct list of statin user-physician-entrydate
    for which the claim in VZE2 occured withing the follow up period specified by the entryDate.
    Note: here the statin users are not cohort memeber. They are patients (who received statin at any time) and
    visited the doctor (who is a UCP of a cohort member) during the entrydate specified followup.
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZE2,
    t2=localt.VZA,
    vars=%str(t2.key_doc_numc, t2.entryDate, t1.key_hsnc),
    target=VZE3,
    distinct=1,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=%str(key_doc_numc),
    filters=%str(t1.dos between t2.entryDate and t2.entryDate + &Followdays -1)
);

/*VZE4. From VZE3, keep records of which the patient received statin during followup.
    Note: in VZE3, although patients were statin users, they may not received statin during followup.
        In the following, those who did not receive statin medications during follow up are excluded.
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZE3,
    t2=VZD,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    target=VZE,
    distinct=1,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=%str(key_hsnc),
    filters=%str(t2.RX_DDDDD between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate + &Followdays -1)
);
/*the following generates the same data as the above. However, it took way longer*/
/*%sqljoinv2(*/
/*    t1=VZE3,*/
/*    t2=VZD,*/
/*    vars=%str(t1.*),*/
/*    target=VZE4a, */
/*    distinct=1,*/
/*    jtype=inner,*/
/*    jterm=%str(t1.key_hsnc = t2.key_hsnc and t2.RX_DDDDD between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate + &Followdays -1)*/
/*);*/
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZE.zip,
    srcFile=VZE.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*Note: in VZE,
    the patients are panel statin users (majority are not statin cohort members) who received statin during followup
            (the followup is defined for the pair of the statin cohort member and the member's UCP)
    the entrydates are entrydate of a statin cohort member
    the doc ids are UCPs of the statin cohort member during the followup defined by the entrydate
*/




s///
t///

children.name: VZF exclude patients having hosp, preg, or not fully covered in followup
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZF
    VZE, contains statin users who received statin during a specified period, and visited a UCP during that period.
    Now, from VZE, exclude those:
    1. hospitalized during the specified follow up
    2. not fully covered by health insurance during follow up
    3. pregnant during follow up
*/


/*VZE0. Prepare study data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZE.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZE.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_hosp_pop_slim.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_hosp_pop_slim.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_msb_pop_slim.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_msb_pop_slim.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_phrs_cov_pop.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_phrs_cov_pop.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_patientidmap_pop.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_patientidmap_pop.sas7bdat)
);


/*VZF1. From VZE, get a list of disticnt patient-entrydate*/
%distinct(data=VZE, target=VZF1, vars=%str(key_hsnc, entryDate, monotonic() as n));

/*VZF2. From VZE, get a list of disticnt patient-entrydate (this step was skipped)*/
/*%distinct(data=VZE, target=VZF2, vars=%str(key_hsnc));*/

/*VZE3. for patients in VZE5, exclude those ever hospitalized during the specified followup period*/
/*VZE3a. From master_hosp_pop_slim, get in patient hospitalizations*/
data VZF3a;
    set master_hosp_pop_slim;
    where ds_ip = 'IP';
    keep Key_HSNC adm_date dschg_date;
run;
/*VZE3b. Link VZE3a to VZF1,
    get records in VZF1 if there is hospitalization events within followup*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF1,
    t2=VZF3a,
    target=VZF3b,
    distinct=1,
    vars=t1.*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc,
    filters=%str(
        t2.adm_date between t1.entrydate and t1.entrydate +&followdays -1
        or
        t2.dschg_date between t1.entrydate and t1.entrydate +&followdays -1
        or
        (t2.adm_date < t1.entrydate and t2.dschg_date > t1.entrydate +&followdays -1)    
    )
);
/*VZF3c. In VZF1, exclude those having hospital events (as in VZF3b)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF1,
    target=VZF3,
    vars=t1.*,
    filters=%str(n not in (select n from VZF3b ))
);


/*VZF4. Exlcude those pregant during followup*/
%let pregCodes=%str('641', '642', '643', '644', '645', '646', '647', '648', '649', '650', '651', '652', '653', '654',
'655', '656', '657', '658', '659', '660', '661', '662', '663', '664', '665', '666', '667', '668', '669', '670', '671', '672',
'673', '674', '675', '676', 'V27', 'O10', 'O11', 'O12', 'O13', 'O14', 'O15', 'O16', 'O17', 'O18', 'O19', 'O21', 'O22', 'O23',
'O24', 'O25', 'O26', 'O27', 'O28', 'O29', 'O30', 'O31', 'O32', 'O33', 'O34', 'O35', 'O36', 'O37', 'O38', 'O39', 'O40',
'O41', 'O42', 'O43', 'O44', 'O45', 'O46', 'O47', 'O48', 'O49', 'O50', 'O51', 'O52', 'O53', 'O54', 'O55', 'O56', 'O57',
'O58', 'O59', 'O60', 'O61', 'O62', 'O63', 'O64', 'O65', 'O66', 'O67', 'O68', 'O69', 'O70', 'O71', 'O72', 'O73', 'O74', 'O75',
'O76', 'O77', 'O78', 'O79', 'O80', 'O81', 'O82', 'O83', 'O84', 'O85', 'O86', 'O87', 'O88', 'O89', 'O90', 'O91', 'O92', 'O93',
'O94', 'O95', 'O98', 'O99', 'Z37');
/*VZF4a. get hospitalization records related to pregnant*/
data VZF4a;
    set master_hosp_pop_slim;
    src='hp';
    array dxs $ dx_code_1 - dx_code_25;
    array cdxs $ conv_dx_code_1 - conv_dx_code_25;
    format type $5.;
    format code $10.;
    do i = 1 to 25;
            if dxs(i) in: (&pregCodes) then do;
                output;
                leave;
            end;
            if cdxs(i) in: (&pregCodes) then do;
                output;
                leave;
            end;
    end;
    keep key_hsnc adm_date dschg_date src;
run;
/*VZF4b. get MSB records related to pregnant*/
%print(data=master_msb_pop_slim);
data VZF4b;
    set master_msb_pop_slim;
    src='mb';
    adm_date=dos;
    dschg_date=dos;
    if diag in:(&pregCodes) then output;
    keep key_hsnc adm_date dschg_date src;
run;
/*VZF4c. merge pregnant records in hosp and in MSB*/
data VZF4c;
    set VZF4a VZF4b;
run;
/*VZF4d. for records in VZF3, find those having pregnant hosp/MSB events during followup*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF3,
    t2=VZF4c,
    target=VZF4d,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc,
    filters=%str(        t2.adm_date between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate + &followdays -1
                                    or
                                    t2.dschg_date between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate + &followdays -1
                                    or
                                    t2.adm_date < t1.entryDate and t2.dschg_date > t1.entryDate + &followdays -1
            )
);
/*VZF4e. In VZF3, exclude those having preg events (as in VZF4d)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF3,
    target=VZF4,
    distinct=1,
    vars=t1.*,
    filters=%str(n not in (select n from VZF4d ))
);


/*VZF5. From VZF4, exclude those not continuously covered within followup*/
/*VZF5a. From the covereage file, calculate the coverage gaps*/
data VZF5a1;
    set master_phrs_cov_pop;
    report_start=eff_date;
    report_end = rexp_date;
    rename rexp_date=exp_date;
/*    if eff_date ne '01oct2019'd;*/
/*    &cover_Xtrc_date;*/
run;
%distinct(data=master_phrs_cov_pop, target=VZF5a2, vars=key_hsn);
%getCoverGAPs(
    rawfile=VZF5a1,
    ptFile=VZF5a2,
    theCovXtrc=,
    keyDateCol=,
    start='01jan2011'd,
    end= '31dec2018'd,
    target=VZF5a,
    cohortgroup=,
    debug=
);
/*VZF5b. From VZF5a, select records with gaps >0.*/
data VZF5b;
    set VZF5a;
    where gaps > 0;
    keep key_hsn coverStart coverEnd;
    rename coverStart=gapStart coverEnd=gapEnd;
run;
/*VZF5c. The coverage file does not have compressed key_hsn. Attach VZF5b to master_patientidmap_pop to get
    the compressed key_hsn*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF5b,
    t2=master_patientidmap_pop,
    target=VZF5c,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.key_hsnc),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*VZF5d. */
/*VZF5d. for records in VZF4, find those having coverage gaps followup*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF4,
    t2=VZF5c,
    target=VZF5d,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc,
    filters=%str(        t2.gapstart between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate + &followdays -1
                                    or
                                    t2.gapend between t1.entryDate and t1.entryDate + &followdays -1
                                    or
                                    t2.gapstart < t1.entryDate and t2.gapend > t1.entryDate + &followdays -1
            )
);
/*VZF5e. In VZF4, exclude those having preg events (as in VZF5d)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF4,
    target=VZF5,
    distinct=1,
    vars=t1.*,
    filters=%str(n not in (select n from VZF5d ))
);

/*VZF6.
    NOTE! Till now, the file VZF5 only contains patient id and entrydate. It should be linked to VZE
    to have a list of distinct patientID-docId-entryDate.
    Note: the linked doc ID from VZE are UCPs of the statin cohort members during follow up.
        VZF shows that for each UCP in a specific follow up period, the panel statin users ever visited that UCP.
    Note:
    in VZF, the patients are panel statin users (majority are not statin cohort members)
    the entrydates are entrydate of a statin cohort member
    the doc ids are UCPs of the statin cohort member during the followup defined by the entrydate
    VZF has the same structure and columns as VZE. It just contains fewer records, as those hospitalized, pregnant, not
        fully covered during followup were excluded
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZE,
    t2=VZF5,
    target=VZF,
    distinct=1,
    vars=t1.*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc entrydate
);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZF.zip,
    srcFile=VZF.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
%beep;

s///
t///

children.NodeDescription:

/*The cov_pop file is weird, having rexp_date, but not exp_date*/

children.name: VZC eligible MSB encounters to GPs
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZC encounters (distinct visits per patient-doc-date to GPs (SPEC in: 'B', and eligible for num_srv, LOS, etc.)*/

/*VZC0. prepare data.*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_msb_pop_slim.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_msb_pop_slim.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_patientidmap_pop.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_patientidmap_pop.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_docidmap_pop.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_docidmap_pop.sas7bdat)
);

/*VZC1. in master_msb_pop_slim, keep the eligible claims*/
data VZC1;
    set master_msb_pop_slim;
    where
            num_srv ne 0
            and
            LOS NOT in ('B','2','K','9')
            and
            MODE ne 'Z'
            and
            SPEC in: ('B')
    ;
    keep key_doc_numc Key_HSNC dos;
run;

/*VZC2. From above, have distinct records*/
%distinct(
    data=VZC1,
    target=VZC,
    vars=*
);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZC.zip,
    srcFile=VZC.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*
    Note: in VZD, the patients are SK residents (These are neither statin cohort members, nor panel statin patients)
    the dos are visiting dates
    the doc ids are care providers to that residents (These may Not be UCPs of a statin cohort member, nor UCPs of
        a panel patients)
*/
%beep;

t///

children.name: VZD statin user claims
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZD
    from MSB encounters from VZC, keep those of patients ever receiving statin.
    Note:
    the patients in VZD can be prevalent users.

/*VZD0. Preparing data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_patientidmap_pop.zip),

);
%VbsUnzip(

%VbsUnzip(

/*VZD1. For statin medications, map the compressed din*/
/*%print(data=master_DINmap_pop);*/
%sqljoinv2(

/*all statin dins in locald.statindins are mapped*/

%print(data=master_dp_benefit_pop_slim);

/*VZD2 from the master files, select statin claims into distinct claims by patient, doc, din, and date*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_dp_benefit_pop_slim,
    t2=VZD1,

    vars=%str(t1.*),

    t1=master_dp_nonbenefit_pop_slim,
    t2=VZD1,
    target=VZD2b,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=dinstr
);
data vzd2c;
    set vzd2a vzd2b;
run;
%distinct(data = VZD2c, target=VZD, vars=*);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZD.zip,
    srcFile=VZD.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
%beep;
/*%print(data=VZD);*/
/*
    Note: in VZD, the patients are statin users (These are neither statin cohort members, nor panel statin patients)
    dinstrs are DINs of statin medications
    the RXDDDDD are dates receiving a statin medication
    the doc ids are prescribers of the statin medication
*/


s///
t///

children.name: Determine UCP USP CMEP of panel patients
VZG UCP of panel patients
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZG The UCPs of panel statin users from VZF*/


/*VZG0. Prepare study data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZC.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZC.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZF.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZF.sas7bdat)
);

/*VZG1. For patients in VZF (panel statin users, can be repeated for different entry periods), count the distinct encounters with GPs (from VZC)
    within the followup period*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF,
    t2=VZC,
    target=VZG1,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsnc, t1.entrydate, t2.key_doc_numc, count(t2.dos) as N_Visits),
    groupby =%str(t1.key_hsnc, t1.entrydate, t2.key_doc_numc),
    orderby=%str(t1.key_hsnc, t1.entrydate, N_Visits),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc,
    filters=%str(t2.dos between t1.entrydate and t1.entryDate + &followdays-1)
);

/*VZG2. from above, determine the max N_Visits per key_hsn-entryDate*/
data VZG2;
    set VZG1;
    by key_hsnc entrydate N_visits;
    if first.entrydate then T_visits = N_visits;
    else T_visits+ N_visits;
    if last.entrydate;
run;

/*VZG3, link VZG2 back to VZG1, keep records of patient-entryDate for those with the max N_Visits*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZG1,
    t2=VZG2,
    target=VZG,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.T_visits),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc entryDate N_visits
);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZG.zip,
    srcFile=VZG.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*Note:
    In VZG:
    the patient ids are the panel statin users of a UCP of the statin cohort member
    the doc ids are UCPs of the panel statin patient during the follow up period.
        NOTE AGAIN!!! These UCPs may NOT be the same as the UCP of the satin cohort member (As in VZA VZE VZF)
    the entrydate is the entrydate of a statin cohort member
*/
%beep;

children.name: VZH CMEP of panel patients
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZH The UCPs of panel statin users from VZF*/


/*VZH0. Prepare study data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_msb_pop_slim.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_msb_pop_slim.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZF.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZF.sas7bdat)
);

/*VZH1. Prepare the CMEP claims
    (Why not using VZC?
        VZC is to determine the distinct visit, i.e., samePatient-sameDoc-sameDate.
        It does not have the column FSC for determining CMEP claims.
        If the col FSC were kept in VZC, the samePatient-sameDoc-sameDate may appear for multiple times, which
            would cause duplication in counting distinct visits
    )
*/
data VZH1;
    set master_msb_pop_slim;
    where
            FSC in ('B003','B064','B052', 'B004')
    ;
    keep key_doc_numc Key_HSNC dos;
run;


/*VZH2. For patients in VZF (panel statin users, can be repeated for different entry periods),
        count the distinct encounters with CMEPs(from VZH1) within the followup period
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF,
    t2=VZH1,
    target=VZH,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsnc, t1.entrydate, t2.key_doc_numc),
    orderby=%str(t1.key_hsnc, t1.entrydate),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc,
    filters=%str(t2.dos between t1.entrydate and t1.entryDate + &followdays-1)
);
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZH.zip,
    srcFile=VZH.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*Note:
    In VZH:
    the patient ids are the panel statin users of a UCP of the statin cohort member (the UCP's doc id is not in this table)
    the doc ids in this table are CMEPs of the panel statin patient during the follow up period.
        NOTE AGAIN!!! These CMEPs may NOT be the same as the UCP of the satin cohort member (As in VZA VZE VZF)
    the entrydate is the entrydate of a statin cohort member
*/
%beep;

/*VZI The USPs of panel statin users from VZF*/


/*VZI0. Prepare study data*/
%VbsUnzip(

%VbsUnzip(

/*VZI1. For patients in VZF (panel statin users, can be repeated for different entry periods),
    count the Rx of statins with prescribers (from VZD)    within the followup period
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF,

    groupby =%str(t1.key_hsnc, t1.entrydate, t2.key_doc_numc),
    orderby=%str(t1.key_hsnc, t1.entrydate, N_Rx),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsnc,
    filters=%str(t2.RX_DDDDD between t1.entrydate and t1.entryDate + &followdays-1)
);

/*VZI2. from above, determine the max N_Rx per key_hsn-entryDate*/
data VZI2;
    set VZI1;
    by key_hsnc entrydate N_Rx;
    if first.entrydate then T_Rx = N_Rx;
    else T_Rx+ N_Rx;
    if last.entrydate;
run;

/*VZI3, link VZI2 back to VZI1, keep records of patient-entryDate for those with the max N_Rx*/
%sqljoinv2(

*/

data _Test0;

    set VXM_FS;

    qaippeN = qaippe;

    resitypeN=1;

    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;

    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;


    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/

    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");

    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;

    else docSexN_FS=1;

    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");

    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));

    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);

    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;

    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/

    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");

    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;

    else do;

        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;

        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/

    end;

    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/

    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);

    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);

    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);

    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;

    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;

    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');

    docNPatients_FS100=docNPatients_FS/100;

    docN_Visits_FS100 =docN_Visits_FS/100;

run;

    length type $4.;

    docid=scan(UCPF1, 1, ":");

keep docid docPayType_FS entrydate ucpf1;

run;


%sort(data=_test1, sorter=docid entrydate docPayType_FS);

data _test2;

    set _test1;

    by docid entrydate docPayType_FS;

    length pattern $20.;

    retain pattern t;

    if first.docid then do;

        pattern=t;

    end;

    else do;

        if substr(docPayType_FS,1,1) ne t then do;

            pattern = strip(pattern) || t;

        end;

    end;

    if last.docid;

    if length(pattern) > 1;

run;


/*link these docs back to the cohort, keep cohort member whose doc showing diff paytype*/

%sqljoinv2(

    t1=_test0,

    jtype=inner,

);

                                /param=reference;

    strata docid;

    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') =CompFS docPayType_FS CompFS * docPayType_FS;

run;quit;

children.name: VZJ indicate for each panel patient for same UCP USP CMEP COMP
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZJ For patients from VZF (panel statin users), check whether the UCP', CMEP', USP', and comprehensive COC
    of the panel statin user was the same UCP of the cohort member     
*/

/*VZJ0. Prepare study data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZF.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZF.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZG.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZG.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZH.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZH.sas7bdat)
);
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZI.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZI.sas7bdat)
);


/*VZJ1. For patients in VZF (panel statin users), check whether that patient's UCP' (doc id from VZG) during
    the followup (defined by entrydate) is the same as the UCP of the cohort member (doc id from VZF)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZF,
    t2=VZG,
    target=VZJ1,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.key_doc_numc = '', 0, 1) as AsUCP),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsnc entrydate key_doc_numc
);
%beep;
%nobs(data=VZJ1);
/*same # of records in VZJ1 as in VZF*/

/*VZJ2. For patients in VZJ1 (panel statin users), check whether that patient's CMEP' (doc id from VZH) during
    the followup (defined by entrydate) is the same as the UCP of the cohort member (doc id from VZJ1)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZJ1,
    t2=VZH,
    target=VZJ2,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.key_doc_numc = '', 0, 1) as AsCMEP),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsnc entrydate key_doc_numc
);
%beep;
/*same # of records in VZJ2 as in VZJ1*/

/*VZJ3. For patients in VZJ2 (panel statin users), check whether that patient's USP' (doc id from VZI) during
    the followup (defined by entrydate) is the same as the UCP of the cohort member (doc id from VZJ2)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZJ2,
    t2=VZI,
    target=VZJ3,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.key_doc_numc = '', 0, 1) as AsUSP),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsnc entrydate key_doc_numc
);
/*same # of records in VZJ3 as in VZJ2*/

/*VZJ4. For patients in VZJ3 (panel statin users), check whether the comprehensive COC of the panel statin user
    was provided by the UCP of the cohort member (doc id in VZJ3)*/
data VZJ;
    set VZJ3;
    if AsUCP=1 and AsCMEP =1 and AsUSP=1 then AsComp =1;
    else AsComp=0;
run;
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZJ.zip,
    srcFile=VZJ.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*Note:
    In VZJ:
    the patient ids are the panel statin users of a UCP of the statin cohort member
    the doc ids in this table are UCP of the statin cohort member (the patient id of the statin cohort member is not in this table)
    The AsUCP indicates whether the panel statin user's UCP' is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
    The AsCMEP indicates whether the panel statin user's CMEP' is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
    The AsUSP indicates whether the panel statin user's USP' is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
    The AsComp indicates whether the panel statin user's comprehensive care provider
        (i.e., the same doc as UCP', CMEP', and USP') is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
*/
%beep;

s///
t///

children.name: Stats on cohort patient's UCP as panel patients UCP' CMEP' USP'
VZK Get Proportion as same UCP USP CMEP COMP
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*VZK For patients from VZJ (panel statin users),
    for each UCP of the cohort member (i.e., the doc id from VZK), determine the proportion of panel statin users
    for which the very doctor also act as UCP', CMEP', USP', and comprehensive provider of the panel statin user.
    Note: a doc may repeatedly be the UCP of different cohort members. Each time, there will be a panel. Each panel
        has different panel statin users.
        Average number of panel statin users will be determined for each UCP appeared in the cohort, taking
            the total count of panel statin users of all panels of the same UCP, divided by the # of times that the UCP appeared
            for different cohort members
*/

/*VZK0. Prepare study data*/
%VbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VZJ.zip),
    srcFile=%str(VZJ.sas7bdat)
);

/*VZK1. for each distinct UCP of cohort member, sum the total counts of panel statin users (statin users can repeat
        as for different follow up period), the counts panel statinusers for whom the very doctor act as UCP' USP' CMEP'
        and comprehensive continuity of care provider. */
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZJ,
    target=VZK1,
    vars=%str(
        key_doc_numc,
        count(key_hsnc) as totalPanelStatinUserCnt,
        sum(AsUCP) as totalAsUCPCnt,
        sum(AsCMEP) as totalAsCMEPCnt,
        sum(AsUSP) as totalAsUSPCnt,
        sum(AsCOMP) as totalAsCOMPCnt
    ),
    groupby= key_doc_numc
);

/*VZK2. for each distinct UCP of cohort member, count the freq that the UCP appears in the statin cohort*/
%distinct(data=VZJ, vars=%str(key_doc_numc, entryDate), target=VZK2a);
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZK2a,
    target=VZK2,
    vars=%str(key_doc_numc, count(key_doc_numc) as docFreq),
    groupby=key_doc_numc
);

/*VZK3. Merg VZK1 and 2. */
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VZk1,
    t2=VZK2,
    target=VZK3,
    vars=%str(
        t1.*, t2.docFreq
    ),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_doc_numc
);

/*VZK4. Calculate the average panel statin users, PCT as UCP', CMEP', USP', and comprehensive continuity of care
    provider*/
data VZK4;
    set VZK3;
    N_StatinUsers = totalPanelStatinUserCnt/docFreq;
    PCT_AsUCP = totalAsUCPCnt / totalPanelStatinUserCnt;
    PCT_AsCMEP = totalAsCMEPCnt / totalPanelStatinUserCnt;
    PCT_AsUSP = totalAsUSPCnt / totalPanelStatinUserCnt;
    PCT_AsCOMP = totalAsCOMPCnt / totalPanelStatinUserCnt;
    keep key_doc_numc N_StatinUsers PCT_: docFreq;
run;

/*VZK5. Link to VZA, to get the original doc id*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.VZA,
    t2=VZK4,
    target=VZK,
    vars=*,
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_doc_numc
);

%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localtargetPath,
    zipFile=VZK.zip,
    srcFile=VZK.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
/*Note:
    In VZK:
    the patient ids are statin cohort members
    the doc ids in this table are UCP of the statin cohort member (the patient id of the statin cohort member is not in this table)
    The PCT_AsUCP indicates the percentage that the panel statin user's UCP' is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
    The PCT_AsCMEP indicates the percentage that the panel statin user's CMEP' is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
    The PCT_AsUSP indicates the percentage that the panel statin user's USP' is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
    The PCT_AsComp indicates the percentage that the panel statin user's comprehensive care provider is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
    the DocFreq is the number of times the UCP appears in the statin cohort
        (i.e., the same doc as UCP', CMEP', and USP') is the same as the UCP of the statin cohort member
*/

data _null_;run;


/*VXM_FS, Adherence by PDC*/
/*the cohort*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXJ_C.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXJ_C.sas7bdat)
);
/*get statin claims*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXE_F.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXE_F.sas7bdat)
);




%let MPR80 =.8;
%let supplyDayCol=supplyDays;


data VXM_FS1;
    set VXE_F;
    supplyDays=Rx_Qty_Amt;
    drugclass='STATIN';
run;


%getAdherence(
        data=VXM_FS1,
        target=VXM_FS2,
        OptAdhCutOff =&MPR80,
        LenInterval =%eval(365),
        N_Intervals=1,
        class =DrugClass,
        followStart =EntryDate,
        supCol =&supplyDayCol,
        AllowedGap=1,
        takeStartCol =,
        takeEndCol =,
        intervalCol =,
        intervalStartCol =,
        intervalEndCol =,
        keepTMP=
);


/*link back to the cohort VXL_L*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=VXJ_C,
    t2=VXM_FS2,
    target=VXM_FS3,
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.DaysOnMed, t2.Adherence)
);

/*calculate the adjusted adherence by removing days in hopsital from both numerator and denominator*/
data VXM_FS;
    set VXM_FS3;
    PDC_Adjust = (daysonmed -HDays_Post365) / (365-HDays_Post365);
    Adherence_Adjust=0;
    if PDC_Adjust >= .8 then Adherence_Adjust =1;
run;
%freq(data=VXM_FS, table=Adherence_Adjust * Adherence);

%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXM_FS.zip,
    srcFile=VXM_FS.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);


%exportvars(data=VXM_FS);

/*VXT_FS1. Report distribution of UPC index*/
title "distribution of UPC Index";
proc means data=VXM_FS mean std median qrange q1 q3;
    var UPCIndexF;
    ods output summary=VXT_FS1a;
run;
title;
Data localt.VXT_FS1;
    set VXT_FS1a;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
/*proc export data=VXT_FS1*/

/*;*/
/*run;*/

/*VXT_FS2. Prepare study data*/
data VXT_FS2;
    set VXM_FS;
    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=0;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
    docNPatients_FS100=docNPatients_FS/100;
    docN_Visits_FS100 =docN_Visits_FS/100;
run;

/*check missing*/
proc means data=VXT_FS2 missing;
vars &covariates;run;

/*VXT_FS3. Check multicollinearity and report*/
ods trace on;
proc reg data=VXT_FS2;
    model adherence_adjust =UPCIndexF CompFS &covariates /tol vif;
    ods output ParameterEstimates = VXT_FS3a;
run;
ods trace off;
data localt.VXT_FS3;
    set VXT_FS3a;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
/*proc export data=VXT_FS3*/
/*    dbms=xlsx*/
/*    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"*/
/*    replace;*/
/*    sheet= "Table11a_MultiCollinearity_FS";    */
/*;*/
/*run;*/


/*VXT_FS5. Make an empty set to hold all statistic results from the regression models.*/
data VXT_FS5;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXT_FS5t;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXT_FS5v;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
/*data VXT_NRI; length m1 $200. m2 $200.;delete; run;*/
/*data VXT_CNRI; length m1 $200. m2 $200.;delete; run;*/
/*data VXT_IDI; length m1 $200. m2 $200.;delete; run;*/
/*loop for UPCCutOff, and COC measures, and for univ/multiv models*/
%macro LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff=);
    %local UPCCutOff;
        
        /*VXT_FS4. Make UPCIndex category*/
        data VXT_FS4;
            set VXT_FS2;
            UPCIndexF_Cat='L';/*low*/
            if UPCIndexF >= UPCIndexFP&UPCCutOff then UPCIndexF_Cat='H';/*high*/
            CombTerm_FS = strip(UPCIndexF_Cat) || strip(CompFS);
        run;

        /*prepare a data set to hold predict probs from multivariate models*/
        data VXT_m&UPCCutOff;
            set VXT_FS4;
            keep key_hsn Adherence_Adjust;
        run;

        /*VXT_FS5a. Regression Stage 1. Univariate Models*/
        %macro makeUniv(theXVar=);
            %local theXVar;
                Title "&theXVar";
                ods results off;
                proc logistic data=VXT_FS4 descending;
                    class UPCIndexF_Cat (ref='L') CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
                    qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                                                /param=reference truncate=200;
                    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar /scale=none aggregate;
                    %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
                        /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
                        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp cl;
                        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp cl;
                        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp cl;
                        estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp cl;
                        estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp cl;
                        estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp cl;
                    %end;
                    %else %do;
                        estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp cl;
                    %end;
                    ods output estimates =makeUniv_tmp1;
                    output out=localt.VXT_p&theXVar._u_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
                run;
                ods results on;

                data makeUniv_tmp2;
                    set makeUniv_tmp1;
                    Var = symget('theXVar');
                    UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                    Type='Univariate ';
                run;

                /*Attach results to the summary table*/
                data VXT_FS5;
                    set VXT_FS5 makeUniv_tmp2;            
                run;

                proc datasets nolist;
                    delete makeUniv_tmp:;
                run;

        %mend makeUniv;
        %makeUniv(theXVar = UPCIndexF_Cat); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeUniv(theXVar = CompFS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeUniv(theXVar = CombTerm_FS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/


        /*VXT_FS5b. multivariate models*/
        /*loop for vars*/
        /*loop for null, UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %macro makeMulti(theXVar=);
                %local theXVar;
                Title "&theXVar, + covariates ";
                ods results on;
                proc logistic data=VXT_FS4 descending;
                    class UPCIndexF_Cat (ref='L') CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
                    qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                        /param=reference;
                    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar &covariates /scale=none aggregate;
        /*            ROC 'M1: &theXVar + covariates' &theXVar &covariates;*/
        /*            ROC 'M2: covariates' &covariates;*/
        /*            roccontrast reference ('M2: covariates') /estimate;*/
                    %if %length(&theXVar) ne 0 %then %do;
                        %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
                            /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp cl;
                            estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp cl;
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp cl;
                            estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp cl;
                            estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp cl;
                            estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp cl;
                        %end;
                        %else %do;
                            estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp cl;
                        %end;
                        ods output estimates =makeMulti_tmp1 modelAnova = makeMulti_tmp1t parameterEstimates = makeMulti_tmp1v;
                    %end;
                    output out=localt.VXT_p&theXVar._m_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
                run;
                title;
                ods results on;
                %if %length(&theXVar) ne 0 %then %do;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2t;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1t;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2v;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1v;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    /*Attach results to the summary table*/
                    data VXT_FS5;
                        set VXT_FS5 makeMulti_tmp2;            
                    run;
                    data VXT_FS5t;
                        set VXT_FS5t makeMulti_tmp2t;            
                    run;
                    data VXT_FS5v;
                        set VXT_FS5v makeMulti_tmp2v;            
                    run;
                %end;

                /*merge the pred values*/
/*                %sqljoinv2(*/
/*                        t1=VXT_m&UPCCutOff,*/
/*                        t2=VXT_m&theXVar,*/
/*                        target=VXT_m&UPCCutOff, */
/*                        vars=%str(t1.*, t2.Prob_m&theXVar),*/
/*                        jtype=inner,*/
/*                        jvars=key_hsn*/
/*                    );*/

        %mend makeMulti;
        %makeMulti(theXVar =);
        %makeMulti(theXVar = UPCIndexF_Cat); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeMulti(theXVar = CompFS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeMulti(theXVar = CombTerm_FS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        
        /*do not calculate IDINRI*/
        %macro makeIDINRI(probterm1=, probterm2=);
            /*NRI*/
            %local probterm1 probterm2;
            %NRICAT(VXT_m&UPCCutOff, 1, adherence_adjust, &probterm1, &probterm2 , 2, .5);
            data makeIDINRI_tmp1;
                set _all_;
                m1=upcase(symget('probterm1'));
                m2=upcase(symget('probterm2'));    
                UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            run;
            data VXT_NRI;
                set VXT_NRI makeIDINRI_tmp1;
            run;
            /*Continuous NRI*/
            %CONTNRI(VXT_m&UPCCutOff,1,adherence_adjust,&probterm1, &probterm2 );
            data makeIDINRI_tmp2;
                set _all_;
                m1=upcase(symget('probterm1'));
                m2=upcase(symget('probterm2'));
                UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            run;
            data VXT_CNRI;
                set VXT_CNRI makeIDINRI_tmp2;                    
            run;
            /*IDI*/
            %IDIMacro(VXT_m&UPCCutOff, 1, adherence_adjust, &probterm1, &probterm2 );
            data makeIDINRI_tmp3;
                set _IDI_;
                m1=upcase(symget('probterm1'));
                m2=upcase(symget('probterm2'));
                UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            run;
            data VXT_IDI;
                set VXT_IDI makeIDINRI_tmp3;    
            run;
            proc datasets nolist;
                delete makeIDINRI_tmp:;
            run;
        %mend makeIDINRI;
        /*do not calculate IDINRI*/
/*        ods results off;*/
/*        %makeIDINRI(probterm1=Prob_m, probterm2=Prob_mUPCIndexF_Cat );*/
/*        %makeIDINRI(probterm1=Prob_m, probterm2=Prob_mCompFS );*/
/*        %makeIDINRI(probterm1=Prob_m, probterm2=Prob_mCombTerm_FS );*/
/*        %makeIDINRI(probterm1=Prob_mUPCIndexF_Cat, probterm2=Prob_mCompFS );*/
/*        %makeIDINRI(probterm1=Prob_mUPCIndexF_Cat, probterm2=Prob_mCombTerm_FS );*/
/*        %makeIDINRI(probterm1=Prob_mCompFS, probterm2=Prob_mCombTerm_FS );*/
/*        ods results on;*/
%mend LoopUPCCutOff;
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =25);
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =50);
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =75);
data localt.VXT_FS;
    set VXT_FS5;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXT_FSt;
    set VXT_FS5t;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXT_FSv;
    set VXT_FS5v;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;

/*data localt.VXT_NRI_FS;*/
/*    set VXT_NRI;*/
/*    project=&_clientProjectName;*/
/*    program=&_clientTaskLabel;*/
/*    createDate=date();*/
/*    format createDate date9.;*/
/*run;*/
/*data localt.VXT_CNRI_FS;*/
/*    set VXT_CNRI;*/
/*    project=&_clientProjectName;*/
/*    program=&_clientTaskLabel;*/
/*    createDate=date();*/
/*    format createDate date9.;*/
/*run;*/
/*data localt.VXT_IDI_FS;*/
/*    set VXT_IDI;*/
/*    project=&_clientProjectName;*/
/*    program=&_clientTaskLabel;*/
/*    createDate=date();*/
/*    format createDate date9.;*/
/*run;*/

%macro hold;

proc export data=localt.VXT_FS
    dbms=xlsx
    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"
    replace;
    sheet= "Table12a_OddRatio_FS";    
;
run;
proc export data=localt.VXT_NRI_FS
    dbms=xlsx
    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"
    replace;
    sheet= "Table13a_NRI_FS";    
;
run;

;
run;

    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"

;
run;
%mend hold;
%beep;

///t

/*VXTB_FS Unmatched logistic regression, Adherece_adjusted by COMPFS vs UPCIndxF vs CombTerm_FS
    interaction of main effect with rurality
*/

data _null_;run;

/*VXTB_FS0. Prepare source files.*/

%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXM_FS.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXM_FS.sas7bdat)
);
/*check the upc score*/
%print(data=VXM_FS);
/*Define covariates*/
%let covariates =     
        age Sex QAIPPEN
        RESITYPEN
        NDINS_PRE365
/*        NDINS_POST365*/

        HNIGHTS_PRE365

        NVISITS_GP_PRE365

/*        THIRDPARTYPAY_POST365*/

        BENZO_PRE365
        PSYCHO_PRE365
        ANTIDEP_PRE365
        ANTICHO_PRE365
/*        BENZO_POST365*/
/*        PSYCHO_POST365*/
/*        ANTIDEP_POST365*/
/*        ANTICHO_POST365*/
        CAMH_NPD_PRE365
        CAMH_SA_PRE365
        CAMH_PSY_PRE365
/*        CAMH_NPD_POST365*/
/*        CAMH_SA_POST365*/
/*        CAMH_PSY_POST365*/
        CHARLSON_INDEX
/*        CC_PRE365_ANXIETY_OLD*/
        CC_PRE365_DIABETES
        CC_PRE365_HTN
/*        CC_PRE365_MOOD_OLD*/
        CC_PRE365_NS_PS
        CC_PRE365_ASTHMA
        CC_PRE365_COPD
        CC_PRE365_HF
        CC_PRE365_AP_PS
        CC_PRE365_MOODANX
/*        CC_PRE365_MOODANXP*/
        CC_PRE365_OA
/*        CC_PRE365_OMH*/
        CC_PRE365_SUBABUSE_OLD
        CC_PRE365_AF_PS
        CC_PRE365_AMI
        CC_PRE365_CD_PS
        CC_PRE365_CV_PS
        CC_PRE365_HP_PS
        CC_PRE365_IHD
        CC_PRE365_STROKE_1POP
        CC_PRE365_WF_PS
        CC_PRE365_OSTEO_1POP
/*        CC_PRE365_OSTEO_OLD*/
        CC_PRE365_OB_PS
        CC_PRE365_CA_PS
        CC_PRE365_PV_PS
        CC_PRE365_DA_PS
        CC_PRE365_NONRA
        CC_PRE365_LB_PS
/*        CC_PRE365_OSTEO_2DRUG*/
/*        CC_PRE365_AK_PS*/
/*        CC_PRE365_RF_PS*/
        CC_PRE365_VTE_PS
        CC_PRE365_CO_PS
        CC_PRE365_STROKE_2HOSP
        CC_PRE365_IB_PS
        CC_PRE365_RA
        CC_PRE365_CK_PS
        CC_PRE365_LV_PS
        CC_PRE365_EPAD
        CC_PRE365_UB_PS
        CC_PRE365_AD
        CC_PRE365_SUICIDE_OLD
/*        CC_PRE365_SCHIZO*/
        CC_PRE365_SCHIZO_EVER
        CC_PRE365_PD
        CC_PRE365_MS
        CC_PRE365_EPJR
/*        CC_POST365_ANXIETY_OLD*/
/*        CC_POST365_DIABETES*/
/*        CC_POST365_HTN*/
/*        CC_POST365_MOOD_OLD*/
/*        CC_POST365_NS_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_MOODANX*/
/*        CC_POST365_MOODANXP*/
/*        CC_POST365_OMH*/
/*        CC_POST365_ASTHMA*/
/*        CC_POST365_COPD*/
/*        CC_POST365_HF*/
/*        CC_POST365_AP_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_IHD*/
/*        CC_POST365_OA*/
/*        CC_POST365_SUBABUSE_OLD*/
/*        CC_POST365_AF_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_AMI*/
/*        CC_POST365_CD_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_CV_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_HP_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_STROKE_1POP*/
/*        CC_POST365_WF_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_OSTEO_1POP*/
/*        CC_POST365_OSTEO_OLD*/
/*        CC_POST365_NONRA*/
/*        CC_POST365_OB_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_CA_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_CK_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_CO_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_DA_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_PV_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_OSTEO_2DRUG*/
/*        CC_POST365_LB_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_AK_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_RF_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_VTE_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_STROKE_2HOSP*/
/*        CC_POST365_IB_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_RA*/
/*        CC_POST365_LV_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_EPAD*/
/*        CC_POST365_UB_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_AD*/
/*        CC_POST365_SUICIDE_OLD*/
/*        CC_POST365_SCHIZO*/
/*        CC_POST365_SCHIZO_EVER*/
/*        CC_POST365_PD*/
/*        CC_POST365_MS*/
/*        CC_POST365_EPJR*/
/*        PRE365_PRSCR_STATINAHTNOH*/
/*        PRE365_MEDCLASS_STATINAHTNOH*/
/*        FOLLOWUP_PRSCR_STATINAHTNOH*/
/*        FOLLOWUP_MEDCLASS_STATINAHTNOH    */

/*practice/physician related factors*/
    docSexN_FS
    docAge_FS
    docServiceYr_FS
    docEdCountry_FS
    docPayTypeN_FS
    docN_Visits_FS
    docNPatients_FS
    docStatinRxPCT_FS
;


/*VXTB_FS1. Report distribution of UPC index*/
title "distribution of UPC Index";
proc means data=VXM_FS mean std median qrange q1 q3;
    var UPCIndexF;
    ods output summary=VXTB_FS1a;
run;
title;
Data localt.VXTB_FS1;
    set VXTB_FS1a;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
/*proc export data=VXTB_FS1*/
/*    dbms=xlsx*/
/*    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"*/
/*    replace;*/
/*    sheet= "Table11a_UPCIndexDist_FS";    */
/*;*/
/*run;*/

/*VXTB_FS2. Treat up the missing values.
    Note: two patients whose UCPF1 does not have doc covariates like age sex...
*/
data VXTB_FS2;
    set VXM_FS;
    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=0;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
run;

/*check missing*/
proc means data=VXTB_FS2 missing;
vars &covariates;run;

/*VXTB_FS3. Check multicollinearity and report*/
ods trace on;
proc reg data=VXTB_FS2;
    model adherence_adjust =UPCIndexF CompFS &covariates /tol vif;
    ods output ParameterEstimates = VXTB_FS3a;
run;
ods trace off;
data localt.VXTB_FS3;
    set VXTB_FS3a;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
/*proc export data=VXTB_FS3*/
/*    dbms=xlsx*/
/*    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"*/
/*    replace;*/
/*    sheet= "Table11a_MultiCollinearity_FS";    */
/*;*/
/*run;*/


/*VXTB_FS5. Make an empty set to hold all statistic results from the regression models.*/
data VXTB_FS5;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXTB_FS5t;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXTB_FS5v;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
/*data VXTB_NRI; length m1 $200. m2 $200.;delete; run;*/
/*data VXTB_CNRI; length m1 $200. m2 $200.;delete; run;*/
/*data VXTB_IDI; length m1 $200. m2 $200.;delete; run;*/
/*loop for UPCCutOff, and COC measures, and for univ/multiv models*/
%macro LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff=);
    %local UPCCutOff;
        
        /*VXTB_FS4. Make UPCIndex category*/
        data VXTB_FS4;
            set VXTB_FS2;
            UPCIndexF_Cat='L';/*low*/
            if UPCIndexF >= UPCIndexFP&UPCCutOff then UPCIndexF_Cat='H';/*high*/
            CombTerm_FS = strip(UPCIndexF_Cat) || strip(CompFS);
        run;

        /*VXTB_FS5b. multivariate models*/
        /*loop for vars*/
        /*loop for null, UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %macro makeMulti(theXVar=);
                %local theXVar;
                Title "&theXVar, + covariates ";
                ods results off;
                ods trace on;
                proc logistic data=VXTB_FS4 descending;
                    class UPCIndexF_Cat (ref='L') CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
                            qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                                                        /param=reference;
                    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar &covariates &theXVar*resitypeN /scale=none aggregate;
        /*            ROC 'M1: &theXVar + covariates' &theXVar &covariates;*/
        /*            ROC 'M2: covariates' &covariates;*/
        /*            roccontrast reference ('M2: covariates') /estimate;*/
                    %if %length(&theXVar) ne 0 %then %do;
                        %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
                            /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp cl;
                            estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp cl;
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp cl;
                            estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp cl;
                            estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp cl;
                            estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp cl;
                        %end;
                        %else %do;
                            estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1 /exp cl;
                        %end;
                        ods output estimates =makeMulti_tmp1 modelAnova = makeMulti_tmp1t parameterEstimates = makeMulti_tmp1v;
                    %end;
/*                    output out=VXTB_m&theXVar (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust prob_m&theXVar) p=prob_m&theXVar;*/
                    output out=localt.VXTB_p&theXVar._m_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
                run;
                title;
                ods trace off;
                ods results on;
                %if %length(&theXVar) ne 0 %then %do;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;

                    data makeMulti_tmp2t;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1t;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2v;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1v;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    /*Attach results to the summary table*/
                    data VXTB_FS5;
                        set VXTB_FS5 makeMulti_tmp2;            
                    run;
                    data VXTB_FS5t;
                        set VXTB_FS5t makeMulti_tmp2t;            
                    run;
                    data VXTB_FS5v;
                        set VXTB_FS5v makeMulti_tmp2v;            
                    run;
                %end;


        %mend makeMulti;
        %makeMulti(theXVar =);
        %makeMulti(theXVar = UPCIndexF_Cat); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeMulti(theXVar = CompFS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeMulti(theXVar = CombTerm_FS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        

%mend LoopUPCCutOff;
/*%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =25);*/
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =50);
/*%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =75);*/
data localt.VXTB_FS;
    set VXTB_FS5;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXTB_FSt;
    set VXTB_FS5t;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXTB_FSv;
    set VXTB_FS5v;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
%beep;

/*practice/physician related factors*/
    docSexN_FS

    docEdCountry_FS
    docPayTypeN_FS
    docN_Visits_FS100
    docNPatients_FS100

;


/*VXTR_FSR1. Report distribution of UPC index*/
title "distribution of UPC Index";
proc means data=VXM_FS mean std median qrange q1 q3;
    var UPCIndexF;
    ods output summary=VXTR_FSR1a;
run;
title;
Data localt.VXTR_FSR1;
    set VXTR_FSR1a;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
/*proc export data=VXTR_FSR1*/
/*    dbms=xlsx*/
/*    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"*/
/*    replace;*/
/*    sheet= "TableR11a_UPCIndexDist_FS";    */
/*;*/
/*run;*/

/*VXTR_FSR2. Treat up the missing values.
    Note: two patients whose UCPF1 does not have doc covariates like age sex...
*/
data VXTR_FSR2;
    set VXM_FS;
    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=0;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
    docN_Visits_FS100=docN_Visits_FS/100;
    docNPatients_FS100 = docNPatients_FS/100;
    DocRepeatID=scan(UCPF1, 1, ":");
run;

/*check missing*/
proc means data=VXTR_FSR2 missing;
vars &covariates;run;

/*VXTR_FSR3. Check multicollinearity and report*/
ods trace on;
proc reg data=VXTR_FSR2;
    model adherence_adjust =UPCIndexF CompFS &covariates /tol vif;
    ods output ParameterEstimates = VXTR_FSR3a;
run;
ods trace off;
data localt.VXTR_FSR3;
    set VXTR_FSR3a;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
/*proc export data=VXTR_FSR3*/

/*;*/
/*run;*/


/*VXTR_FSR5. Make an empty set to hold all statistic results from the regression models.*/
data VXTR_FSR5;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXTR_FSR5t;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXTR_FSR5v;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;

/*loop for UPCCutOff, and COC measures, and for univ/multiv models*/
%macro LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff=);
    %local UPCCutOff;
        
        /*VXTR_FSR4. Make UPCIndex category*/
        data VXTR_FSR4;
            set VXTR_FSR2;
            UPCIndexF_Cat='L';/*low*/
            if UPCIndexF >= UPCIndexFP&UPCCutOff then UPCIndexF_Cat='H';/*high*/
            CombTerm_FS = strip(UPCIndexF_Cat) || strip(CompFS);
        run;

        /*VXTR_FSR5a. Regression Stage 1. Univariate Models*/
        %macro makeUniv(theXVar=);
            %local theXVar;
                Title "&theXVar";
                ods results off;
                proc genmod data=VXTR_FSR4 descending;
                    class UPCIndexF_Cat (ref='L') CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
                    qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                    DocRepeatID /param=reference truncate=200;
                    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar / dist=binomial link=logit type3;
                    repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
                    %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
                        /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp ;
                            estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp ;
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp ;
                            estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp ;
                            estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp ;
                            estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp ;
                    %end;
                    %else %do;
                        estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp ;
                    %end;
                    ods output estimates =makeUniv_tmp1;
                    output out=localt.VXTR_p&theXVar._u_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
                run;
                ods results on;

                data makeUniv_tmp2;
                    set makeUniv_tmp1;
                    Var = symget('theXVar');
                    UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                    Type='Univariate ';
                run;

                /*Attach results to the summary table*/
                data VXTR_FSR5;
                    set VXTR_FSR5 makeUniv_tmp2;            
                run;

                proc datasets nolist;
                    delete makeUniv_tmp:;
                run;

        %mend makeUniv;
        %makeUniv(theXVar = UPCIndexF_Cat); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeUniv(theXVar = CompFS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeUniv(theXVar = CombTerm_FS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/


        /*VXTR_FSR5b. multivariate models*/
        /*loop for vars*/
        /*loop for null, UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %macro makeMulti(theXVar=);
                %local theXVar;
                Title "&theXVar, + covariates ";
                ods results on;
                proc genmod data=VXTR_FSR4 descending;
                    class UPCIndexF_Cat (ref='L') CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
                    qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                            DocRepeatID                            /param=reference;
                    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar &covariates / dist=binomial link=logit type3;
                    repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
        /*            ROC 'M1: &theXVar + covariates' &theXVar &covariates;*/
        /*            ROC 'M2: covariates' &covariates;*/
        /*            roccontrast reference ('M2: covariates') /estimate;*/
                    %if %length(&theXVar) ne 0 %then %do;
                        %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
                            /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp ;
                            estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp ;
                            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp ;
                            estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp ;
                            estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp ;
                            estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp ;
                        %end;
                        %else %do;
                            estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp ;
                        %end;
                        ods output estimates =makeMulti_tmp1 type3 = makeMulti_tmp1t GEEEmpPEst = makeMulti_tmp1v;
                    %end;
                    output out=localt.VXTR_p&theXVar._m_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
                run;
                title;
                ods results on;
                %if %length(&theXVar) ne 0 %then %do;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2t;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1t;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    data makeMulti_tmp2v;
                        set makeMulti_tmp1v;
                        Var = symget('theXVar');
                        UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
                        Type='Multivariate ';
                    run;
                    /*Attach results to the summary table*/
                    data VXTR_FSR5;
                        set VXTR_FSR5 makeMulti_tmp2;            
                    run;
                    data VXTR_FSR5t;
                        set VXTR_FSR5t makeMulti_tmp2t;            
                    run;
                    data VXTR_FSR5v;
                        set VXTR_FSR5v makeMulti_tmp2v;            
                    run;
                %end;

        %mend makeMulti;
        %makeMulti(theXVar =);
        %makeMulti(theXVar = UPCIndexF_Cat); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeMulti(theXVar = CompFS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
        %makeMulti(theXVar = CombTerm_FS); /*loop for UPCIndexF_Cat, COMPFS, and CombinedTerm_FS*/
%mend LoopUPCCutOff;
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =25);
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =50);
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =75);

data localt.VXTR_FSR;
    set VXTR_FSR5;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXTR_FSRt;
    set VXTR_FSR5t;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXTR_FSRv;
    set VXTR_FSR5v;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;

%beep;
