    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=0;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
    docN_Visits_FS100=docN_Visits_FS/100;
    docNPatients_FS100 = docNPatients_FS/100;
    DocRepeatID=scan(UCPF1, 1, ":");
    if docbirthyr_FS ne .;
run;

/*check missing*/
proc means data=VXTRI_FSRI2 missing;
vars &covariates;run;

/*VXTRI_FSRI3. Check multicollinearity and report*/
ods trace on;
proc reg data=VXTRI_FSRI2;
    model adherence_adjust =UPCIndexF CompFS &covariates /tol vif;
    ods output ParameterEstimates = VXTRI_FSRI3a;
run;
ods trace off;
data localt.VXTRI_FSRI3;
    set VXTRI_FSRI3a;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
/*proc export data=VXTRI_FSRI3*/
/*    dbms=xlsx*/
/*    outfile="&localReportPath.\reports.xlsx"*/
/*    replace;*/
/*    sheet= "TableR11a_MultiCollinearity_FS";    */
/*;*/
/*run;*/


/*VXTRI_FSRI5. Make an empty set to hold all statistic results from the regression models.*/
data VXTRI_FSRI5;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXTRI_FSRI5t;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
data VXTRI_FSRI5v;length Var $200. label $200.; delete;run;
/*loop for UPCCutOff, and COC measures, and for univ/multiv models*/
%macro LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff=);
    %local UPCCutOff;

/*    %let UPCCutOff=50;*/
        
        /*VXTRI_FSRI4. Make UPCIndex category*/
        data VXTRI_FSRI4;
            set VXTRI_FSRI2;
            UPCIndexF_CatN=0;/*low*/
            if UPCIndexF >= UPCIndexFP&UPCCutOff then UPCIndexF_CatN=1;/*high*/
        run;

        
        /*Univaraite, UPCIndex only*/
        Title "UPCIndexF_CatN";
        proc genmod data=VXTRI_FSRI4 ;
            class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0') CompFS (ref='0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
            qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                    DocRepeatID    /param = glm desc; /*hey, to introduce the 1 -1 pair, DO NOT specify param=, or let param=glm. (default is param=glm)
                                note: parma=effect is different from the default setting
                        */
            model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN /dist=binomial link=logit;
                /* UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS
                    1 1 , 1 0,     0 1, 0 0
                    so upc=1, compfs=1 vs upc=0, compfs=0: 1 0 0 -1
                */
                estimate "High UPCI vs Low UPCI, H vs L"
                            UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 / exp
                    ;
            repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
            ods output estimates =makeUniv_tmp1;
            output out=localt.VXTRI_pupc_u_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
        run;

        data makeUniv_tmp2;
            set makeUniv_tmp1;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Univariate ';
        run;

        /*Attach results to the summary table*/
        data VXTRI_FSRI5;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5 makeUniv_tmp2;            
        run;

        proc datasets nolist;
            delete makeUniv_tmp:;
        run;

        /*VXTRI_FSRI5b. multivariate models, UPC index only + covariates (without ComFS)*/
        Title "UPCIndexF_CatN , + covariates ";
        ods results on;
        proc genmod data=VXTRI_FSRI4 ;
            class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0') CompFS (ref='0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
            qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                    DocRepeatID    /param = glm desc; /*hey, to introduce the 1 -1 pair, DO NOT specify param=, or let param=glm. (default is param=glm)
                                note: parma=effect is different from the default setting */
            model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN &covariates / dist=binomial link=logit type3;
            repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
                /* UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS
                    1 1 , 1 0,     0 1, 0 0
                    so upc=1, compfs=1 vs upc=0, compfs=0: 1 0 0 -1
                */
            estimate "High UPCI vs Low UPCI , H vs L"
                        UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 / exp;
            ods output estimates =makeMulti_tmp1 type3 = makeMulti_tmp1t GEEEmpPEst = makeMulti_tmp1v;
            output out=localt.VXTRI_pUPC_m_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
        run;
        title;
        ods results on;

        data makeMulti_tmp2;
            set makeMulti_tmp1;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Multivariate ';
        run;
        data makeMulti_tmp2t;
            set makeMulti_tmp1t;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Multivariate ';
        run;
        data makeMulti_tmp2v;
            set makeMulti_tmp1v;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Multivariate ';
        run;
        /*Attach results to the summary table*/
        data VXTRI_FSRI5;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5 makeMulti_tmp2;            
        run;
        data VXTRI_FSRI5t;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5t makeMulti_tmp2t;            
        run;
        data VXTRI_FSRI5v;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5v makeMulti_tmp2v;            
        run;

        /*VXTRI_FSRI5a. Regression Stage 1. Univariate Models with interaction!*/
        Title "UPCIndexF_CatN * CombTerm_FS";
        proc genmod data=VXTRI_FSRI4 ;
            class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0') CompFS (ref='0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
                    DocRepeatID    /param = glm desc; /*hey, to introduce the 1 -1 pair, DO NOT specify param=, or let param=glm. (default is param=glm)
                                note: parma=effect is different from the default setting
                        */
            model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN CompFS UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS /dist=binomial link=logit;
                /* UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS
                    1 1 , 1 0,     0 1, 0 0
                    so upc=1, compfs=1 vs upc=0, compfs=0: 1 0 0 -1
                */
                estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0"
                            UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 0 -1 / exp
                    ;
                estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs High UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0"
                            UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 -1 0 0/exp ;
                estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0"
                            UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 0 1 -1 /exp ;
                estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI COMPCOC, H1 vs L1"
                            UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 -1 0/exp ;
                estimate "High UPCI, non COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H0 vs L0"
                            UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 1 0 -1 /exp ;
            repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
            ods output estimates =makeUniv_tmp1;
            output out=localt.VXTRI_pinteraction_u_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
        run;

        data makeUniv_tmp2;
            set makeUniv_tmp1;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN * CompFS';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Univariate ';
        run;

        /*Attach results to the summary table*/
        data VXTRI_FSRI5;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5 makeUniv_tmp2;            
        run;

        proc datasets nolist;
            delete makeUniv_tmp:;
        run;


        /*VXTRI_FSRI5b. multivariate models*/
        Title "UPCIndexF_CatN * CompFS, + covariates ";
        ods results on;
        proc genmod data=VXTRI_FSRI4 ;
            class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0') CompFS (ref='0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
                    DocRepeatID    /param = glm desc; /*hey, to introduce the 1 -1 pair, DO NOT specify param=, or let param=glm. (default is param=glm)
                                note: parma=effect is different from the default setting */
            model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN CompFS UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS &covariates / dist=binomial link=logit type3;
            repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
                /* UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS
                    1 1 , 1 0,     0 1, 0 0
                    so upc=1, compfs=1 vs upc=0, compfs=0: 1 0 0 -1
                */
            estimate "High UPCI vs Low UPCI , H vs L"
                        UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 / exp;
            estimate "COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, 1 vs 0"
                        CompFS 1 -1 / exp;
            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0"
                        UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 0 -1 / exp;
            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs High UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0"
                        UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 -1 0 0/exp ;
            estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0"
                        UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 0 1 -1 /exp ;
            estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI COMPCOC, H1 vs L1"
                        UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 -1 0/exp ;
            estimate "High UPCI, non COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H0 vs L0"
                        UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 1 0 -1 /exp ;
            ods output estimates =makeMulti_tmp1 type3 = makeMulti_tmp1t GEEEmpPEst = makeMulti_tmp1v;
            output out=localt.VXTRI_pinteraction_m_&UPCCutOff (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
        run;
        title;
        ods results on;

        data makeMulti_tmp2;
            set makeMulti_tmp1;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN * CompFS';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Multivariate ';
        run;
        data makeMulti_tmp2t;
            set makeMulti_tmp1t;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN * CompFS';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Multivariate ';
        run;
        data makeMulti_tmp2v;
            set makeMulti_tmp1v;
            Var = 'UPCIndexF_CatN * CompFS';
            UPCCutOff = &UPCCutOff;
            Type='Multivariate ';
        run;
        /*Attach results to the summary table*/
        data VXTRI_FSRI5;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5 makeMulti_tmp2;            
        run;
        data VXTRI_FSRI5t;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5t makeMulti_tmp2t;            
        run;
        data VXTRI_FSRI5v;
            set VXTRI_FSRI5v makeMulti_tmp2v;            
        run;

%mend LoopUPCCutOff;
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =25);
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =50);
%LoopUPCCutOff(UPCCutOff =75);



data localt.VXTRI_FSRI;
    set VXTRI_FSRI5;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXTRI_FSRIt;
    set VXTRI_FSRI5t;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;
data localt.VXTRI_FSRIv;
    set VXTRI_FSRI5v;
    project=&_clientProjectName;
    program=&_clientTaskLabel;
    createDate=date();
    format createDate date9.;
run;

%beep;

children.name: About Estimation Logistic Genmod
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*local*/

%freq(data=locald.eyestudy , table=carrot * lenses);
/*1. the following is an example from the UCLA website titled
https://stats.idre.ucla.edu/sas/faq/how-can-i-estimate-relative-risk-in-sas-using-proc-genmod-for-common-outcomes-in-cohort-studies/
*/
proc genmod data=locald.eyestudy desc ;
    class carrot ;
    model lenses = carrot /dist=binomial link=logit ;
    estimate "Beta"
                    carrot 1 -1 / exp
            ;
run;

%freq(data=VXTRI_FSRI4 , table=adherence_adjust * UPCIndexF_CatN);
/*The following copies the same settings as above.
    In the class statement, there is no specification for PARAM=.
        This is indeed to use the default setting, which is PARAM=GLM
        PARAM=GLM enables ref=-1
    Note: the reference level is not specified. SAS takes the ascending order, and use the largest value as the reference
*/
proc genmod data=VXTRI_FSRI4 desc ;
    class UPCIndexF_CatN ;
    model adherence_adjust = UPCIndexF_CatN /dist=binomial link=logit ;
    estimate "Beta"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN -1 1 / exp
            ;
run;

/*The following adds the specification for reference level (which is 0, the smallest)
    The result is the inverse to the above
*/
proc genmod data=VXTRI_FSRI4 desc;
    class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0')
            DocRepeatID;
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN /dist=binomial link=logit;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 / exp
            ;
run;


/*The following shows the OR by est statement using logistic regression model
    the PARAM is not specified (using default PARAM=GLM)
*/
proc logistic data=VXTRI_FSRI4 ;
    class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0') CompFS (ref='0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
            DocRepeatID    /param=glm desc; /*hey, to introduce the 1 -1 pair, DO NOT specify param=
                        note: parma=effect is different from not setting param at all
                */
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN CompFS UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS /link=logit;
        /* UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS
            1 1 , 1 0,     0 1, 0 0
            so upc=1, compfs=1 vs upc=0, compfs=0: 1 0 0 -1
        */
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 0 -1 / exp cl
            ;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs High UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 -1 0 0/exp cl ;
        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 0 1 -1 /exp cl;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI COMPCOC, H1 vs L1"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 -1 0/exp cl ;
        estimate "High UPCI, non COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H0 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 1 0 -1 /exp cl;
/*                    repeated subject=DocRepeatID;*/
/*                    ods output estimates =makeUniv_tmp1;*/
run;

/*
    The following is an alternative way, setting param=ref.
    As PARAM=ref, the reference level is omitted, in the estimate statement, there is no values for -1.
    The setting produces the same results as above    
*/
proc logistic data=VXTRI_FSRI4 ;
    class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0') CompFS (ref='0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
            DocRepeatID    /param=ref desc; /*hey, to introduce the 1 -1 pair, DO NOT specify param=
                        note: parma=effect is different from not setting param at all
                */
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN CompFS UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS /link=logit;
        /* UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS
            1 1 , 1 0,     0 1, 0 0
            so upc=1, compfs=1 vs upc=0, compfs=0: 1 0 0 -1
        */
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 CompFS 1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 / exp cl
            ;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs High UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 0 CompFS 1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 /exp cl ;
        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 0 CompFS 1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 /exp cl;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI COMPCOC, H1 vs L1"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 CompFS 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 /exp cl ;
        estimate "High UPCI, non COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H0 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 CompFS 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 /exp cl;


/*                    repeated subject=DocRepeatID;*/
/*                    ods output estimates =makeUniv_tmp1;*/
run;

/*The following is to use PROC genmod. The PARAM is not specified (using default PARAM=GLM, which allows setting reference as -1)
    It produces the same results as the above two instances.
*/
proc genmod data=VXTRI_FSRI4 ;
    class UPCIndexF_CatN (ref='0') CompFS (ref='0') sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')
            DocRepeatID    /param = glm desc; /*hey, to introduce the 1 -1 pair, DO NOT specify param=
                        note: parma=effect is different from not setting param at all
                */
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = UPCIndexF_CatN CompFS UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS /dist=binomial link=logit;
        /* UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS
            1 1 , 1 0,     0 1, 0 0
            so upc=1, compfs=1 vs upc=0, compfs=0: 1 0 0 -1
        */
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 0 -1 / exp
            ;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs High UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 -1 0 0/exp ;
        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 0 0 CompFS 1 -1 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 0 1 -1 /exp ;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Low UPCI COMPCOC, H1 vs L1"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 1 0 -1 0/exp ;
        estimate "High UPCI, non COMPCOC vs Low UPCI non COMPCOC, H0 vs L0"
                    UPCIndexF_CatN 1 -1 CompFS 0 0 UPCIndexF_CatN*CompFS 0 1 0 -1 /exp ;
/*                    repeated subject=DocRepeatID;*/
/*                    ods output estimates =makeUniv_tmp1;*/
run;

children.name: specsenYouden
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*specificity, sensitivity, etc
This program was copied from prog D_stats of
P:\MSValidation(EvansC)_Bio15-331\SAS code\MSValidation_20180611.egp
*/


%UnixUnZip(
    sPath=&remoteTargetPath,
    zip=c_dxall,
    zipped=c_dxall,
    tPath=,
    target=c_dxall
);

Data remotet.TheResults;
    format test $6.;
    delete;
run;

    /*1. determine the dxDate*/
    /*same doc same date dx count as one dx*/
    %distinct(source=c_dxall, target=D1,
        vars=%str(key_hsn, key_doc_num, dxDate, code, src, 'MS' as disease) );


%macro caseDef(Data=, subjectIDCol=, dxDateCol=, ndx=, dxyears=, target=, dQdateOrder=, debug= );

    %local NDX DXYears lagN Data target debug subjectIDCol DxDateCol dQdateOrder;

    /*by default, &dxYears=500*/
    %if %length(&dxyears) = 0 %then %do;
        %let dxyears =500;
    %end;
    /*by default, &subjectIDCol=Key_hsn*/
    %if %length(&subjectIDCol) = 0 %then %do;
        %let subjectIDCol =key_hsn;
    %end;
    /*by default, &dxDateCol=dxDate*/
    %if %length(&dxDateCol) = 0 %then %do;
        %let dxDateCol =dxDate;
    %end;
    /*by default, let the first dx date be the dqdate. If =last, let the late date be the diagnosis date*/
    %if %length(&dQdateOrder) = 0 %then %do;
        %let dQdateOrder =first;
    %end;


    %let lagN=%eval(&Ndx-1);

    /*1. Add patient-specific dxIndex for each dx record*/
        /*sort the data by patient id and by dxDate*/
        proc sort data=&data;
            by &subjectIDCol &dxDateCol;
        run;
        /*for each patient, add patient-specific dx index numbers*/
        data caseDef_tmp1;
            set &data;
            retain dxIndex;
            by &subjectIDCol &dxDateCol;
            if first.&subjectIDCol then dxIndex=1; else dxIndex+1;
        run;

        /*2. determine dx1/dx2 date, and dx1/dx2 patient id*/
        /*Sort records by patient, and by desceding order of dxIndex*/
        proc sort data=caseDef_tmp1;
            by &subjectIDCol descending dxIndex;
            /*sorting (descendingly) by dxIndex is better than sorting by &dxDateCol
                as patient might have 2 DX on the same &dxDateCol (e.g., by 2 diff physicians)
                In that case, records of the same &dxDateCol might randomly change order
                */
        run;
        /*determine the dates of the first dx (dx1_date), and the last (dx&ndx._date)
            also, determine the &subjectIDCol of the first dx, and the last*/
        data caseDef_tmp2;
            set caseDef_tmp1;
            dx1_date=&dxDateCol;
            dx1_&subjectIDCol=&subjectIDCol;
            dx&ndx._date = lag&lagN.(&dxDateCol);
            dx&ndx._&subjectIDCol=lag&lagN.(&subjectIDCol);
            format dx1_date date9. dx&ndx._date date9.;
        run;

        /*3. if the patientID of the first dx and last dx are not the same
            let the last &dxDateCol = . */
        data caseDef_tmp3;
            set caseDef_tmp2;
            if dx1_&subjectIDCol ne dx&ndx._&subjectIDCol then do;
                dx&ndx._date = .;
            end;
        run;

        /*4. exlcude those with a last &dxDateCol =.
            i.e., excluding records that on ward there were not n diagnoses*/
        data caseDef_tmp4;
            set caseDef_tmp3;
            if dx&ndx._date ne .;
            Days_&ndx.DXs = dx&ndx._date - dx1_date +1;
            run;

        /*5. only keep those records that having n DXs onward, and the days between the first and the last
                is within the required years (DxYears)*/
        data caseDef_tmp5;
            set caseDef_tmp4;
            if Days_&ndx.DXs <= 365*&DxYears;
        run;

        /*6. For each patient, kee the last record
            As it is sorted descendingly by DX dates, the last record is the earliest one
                which had n DXs onward, and the n DX all occured within the required years*/
        data caseDef_tmp6;
            set caseDef_tmp5;
            by &subjectIDCol descending dxIndex;
            if last.&subjectIDCol;
/*            if dQdateOrder=last, use the last dxdate in the serial as the diagnosis ate*/
            %if %sysfunc(lowcase(&dQdateOrder )) = last %then %do;
                dxdate = dx&ndx._date;
            %end;
        run;

        /*7. The final data set*/
        data ⌖
            set caseDef_tmp6;
            drop dx1_&subjectIDCol dx&ndx._&subjectIDCol dx1_Date dx&ndx._Date days_&ndx.DXS dxIndex;
        run;

        %if &debug ne 1 %then %do;
            %delData(source=caseDef_tmp1 caseDef_tmp2 caseDef_tmp3 caseDef_tmp4 caseDef_tmp5 caseDef_tmp6 caseDef_tmp7);
        %end;

%mend caseDef;


/*for MS , directly use the macro, to identify those with >=3 dxs (any from hospital, physician, or drug
claims), within UNLIMITED years. protocol May-17, page 2.
*/
*%caseDef(Data=d2, subjectIDCol=key_hsn, dxDateCol=dxDate, ndx=3, dxyears=, target=d3, debug=);/*in protocol dxYears=100*/

%macro dx_MS(
    HospDxDate=,
    theDisease=,
    nHDx=,
    nMSBDx=,
    nDPDx=,
    hDxYears=,
    MSBDxYears=,
    DPDxYears=,
    theAge=
);
    /*1. dschg_date
        2. earliest of the dxDates
        3. 1 H or 2 MSB with 1 year
        4. age 40+
    */
    %LOCAL HospDxDate theDisease nHDX nMSBDX theAge hDXYears MSBDxYears nDPDx DPDxYears theMark;

/*    %let HospDxDate = dschg_date;*/
/*    %let theDisease = MS;*/
/*    %LET nHDX=2;*/
/*    %LET nMSBDX=3;*/
/*    %let nDPDx=1;*/
/*    %LET theAge=;*/
/*    %let hDxYears=1;*/
/*    %let MSBDxYears=1;*/
/*    %let DPDxYears=1;*/



    /*A. for H claims
        identify patients withwith dx >1 in Hospital
    */
    %if %length(&nHDX) ne 0 %then %do;
        %distinct(source=d1, target=dx_tmp4,
            vars=%str(key_hsn, dxDate, Disease, src), filters=%str(src='hp'));
            %put >>> nHDx=&nHDX &hDxYears;
        %caseDef(Data=dx_tmp4, subjectIDCol=key_hsn,
            dxDateCol=dxDate, ndx=&nHDX, dxyears=&hDxYears, target=dx_tmp5, debug=);
            /*in protocol dxYears=100*/
    %end;
    %else %do;
        %let nHDx=0;%let HDxYears=0;
        data dx_tmp5;
            format key_hsn $11.;
            delete;
        run;
    %end;
    /*B. from MSB
    */
    %if %length(&nMSBDX) ne 0 %then %do;
        %distinct(source=d1, target=dx_tmp6,
            vars=%str(key_hsn, dxDate, Disease, src), filters=%str(src='mb'));
        /*use caseDef to determine the DxQdate according to non_Hospital file*/
        %caseDef(Data=dx_tmp6, subjectIDCol=key_hsn,
                dxDateCol=dxDate, ndx=&nMSBDX, dxyears=&MSBDxYears, target=dx_tmp7,
                dQdateOrder=last,
                debug=);
    %end;
    %else %do;
        %let nMSBDX=0;%let MSBDxYears=0;
        data dx_tmp7;
            format key_hsn $11.;
            delete;
        run;
    %end;
    /*C. from drug files*/
    %if %length(&nDPDx) ne 0 %then %do;
        %freq(data=d1, table=src);
        %distinct(source=d1, target=dx_tmp6a,
            vars=%str(key_hsn, dxDate, Disease, src), filters=%str(src='db' or src='dn'));
        /*use caseDef to determine the DxQdate according to non_Hospital file*/
        %caseDef(Data=dx_tmp6a, subjectIDCol=key_hsn,
                dxDateCol=dxDate, ndx=&nDPDx, dxyears=&DPDxYears, target=dx_tmp7a,
                dQdateOrder=first,
                debug=);
    %end;
    %else %do;
        %let nDPDx=0;%let DPDxYears=0;
        data dx_tmp7a;
            format key_hsn $11.;
            delete;
        run;
    %end;
    /*putting H, MSB, DP dx together, so as to determine which one comes the first*/
    data dx_tmp8;
        set dx_tmp5 dx_tmp7 dx_tmp7a;
    run;
    %caseDef(Data=dx_tmp8, subjectIDCol=key_hsn,
        dxDateCol=dxDate, ndx=1, dxyears=, target=dx_tmp9, debug=);/*in protocol dxYears=100*/

    /*count the combinations*/
    %sqljoinv2(
        t2=dx_tmp9,
        t1=remotes.a90_validationpts,
        target=dx_tmp10,
        vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, t1.trueMS,
                        ifn(t2.key_hsn='', 0, 1) as testMS),
        jtype=left,
        jvars=key_hsn
    );

    %freq(data=dx_tmp10, table=testMS * trueMS, option=%str(out=dx_tmp60a nopct norow nocol));
    /*get TP FP FN TN*/
    data dx_tmp60b;
        set dx_tmp60a;
        if testMS=1 and TrueMS=1 then do; theVar='TP'; obs=1;end;
        if testMS=1and TrueMS=0 then do; theVar='FP'; obs=2;end;
        if testMS=0 and TrueMS=1 then do; theVar='FN'; obs=3;end;
        if testMS=0 and TrueMS=0 then do; theVar='TN'; obs=4;end;
        keep theVar Count obs;
    run;
    %sort(data=    dx_tmp60b, sorter=obs);
    %transpose(data=dx_tmp60b, target=dx_tmp60, rowhead=,colhead=theVar, contents=count);

    /*ods results on;*/
    title "Sensitivity";
    proc freq data=dx_tmp10 ;
        where trueMS=1;
        tables testMS / binomial (level="1" all) ;
        ods output binomialProp = dx_tmp61a binomialCls =dx_tmp62a;
    run;
    data dx_tmp61;
        set dx_tmp61a (obs=1);
        rename nvalue1=Sensitivity;
        keep stat nvalue1;
    run;
    data dx_tmp62;
        set dx_tmp62a;
        keep LowerCL UpperCL;
        if type="Wald";
        rename lowerCL=lowSen upperCl =UpSen;
    run;
    data dx_tmp63;
        merge dx_tmp61 dx_tmp62;
    run;    

    title "Specificity";
    /*ods results on;*/
    proc freq data=dx_tmp10 ;
        where trueMS=0;
        tables testMS / binomial (level="0" all) ;
        ods output binomialProp = dx_tmp61a binomialCls = dx_tmp62a;
    run;
    data dx_tmp61;
        set dx_tmp61a (obs=1);
        rename nvalue1=Specificity;
        keep stat nvalue1;
    run;
    data dx_tmp62;
        set dx_tmp62a;
        keep LowerCL UpperCL;
        if type="Wald";        
        rename lowerCL=lowSpe upperCl =UpSpe;
    run;
    data dx_tmp64;
        merge dx_tmp61 dx_tmp62;
    run;


    title "PPV";
    /*ods results on;*/
    proc freq data=dx_tmp10 ;
        where testMS=1;
        tables trueMS / binomial (level="1" all) ;
        ods output binomialProp = dx_tmp61a binomialCls = dx_tmp62a;
    run;
    data dx_tmp61;
        set dx_tmp61a (obs=1);
        rename nvalue1=PPV;
        keep stat nvalue1;
    run;
    data dx_tmp62;
        set dx_tmp62a;
        keep LowerCL UpperCL;
        if type="Wald";        
        rename lowerCL=lowPPV upperCl =UpPPV;
    run;
    data dx_tmp65;
        merge dx_tmp61 dx_tmp62;
    run;

    title "NPV";
    /*ods results on;*/
    proc freq data=dx_tmp10 ;
        where testMS=0;
        tables trueMS / binomial (level="0" all) ;
        ods output binomialProp = dx_tmp61a binomialCls = dx_tmp62a;
    run;
    data dx_tmp61;
        set dx_tmp61a (obs=1);
        rename nvalue1=NPV;
        keep stat nvalue1;
    run;
    data dx_tmp62;
        set dx_tmp62a;
        keep LowerCL UpperCL;
        if type="Wald";        
        rename lowerCL=lowNPV upperCl =UpNPV;
    run;
    data dx_tmp66;
        merge dx_tmp61 dx_tmp62;
    run;

    /*ods results on;*/
    proc freq data=dx_tmp10 ;
        tables testMS *trueMS / agree noprint;
        test kappa;
        ods output simplekappa = dx_tmp61a;
    run;
    data dx_tmp61b;
        set dx_tmp61a (obs=1);
        rename nvalue1 = Kappa;
        keep nvalue1;
    run;
    data dx_tmp61c;
        set dx_tmp61a (firstobs=3 obs=3);
        rename nvalue1 = LowKappa;
        keep nvalue1;
    run;
    data dx_tmp61d;
        set dx_tmp61a (firstobs=4 obs=4);
        rename nvalue1 = HighKappa;
        keep nvalue1;
    run;

/*    The following also produces sensitivity table (ctable), but there is no 95%CI.*/
/*    proc logistic data=dx_tmp10;*/
/*        MODEL TrueMS (EVENT='1')=TestMS / ctable pprob= 0.5;*/
/*    run;*/


    /*Youden's J index*/
    data dx_tmp67;
        merge dx_tmp61b dx_tmp61c dx_tmp61d ;
    run;

    %let theMark=&nHDX.&nMSBDX.&nDPDx.&hDXYears.&MSBDxYears.&DPDxYears;
    %put >>> &theMark;

    data dx_tmp68;
        test =symget('theMark');
        merge dx_tmp60 dx_tmp63 dx_tmp64 dx_tmp65 dx_tmp66 dx_tmp67;
        Youden_J = Sensitivity + Specificity -1;
        Youden_J_Lower=lowSen + lowSpe -1;
        Youden_J_Upper=upSen+UpSpe-1;
        N_Patients=400;
    run;

    data remotet.TheResults;
        set remotet.TheResults dx_tmp68;
    run;

    proc datasets nolist;
        delete dx_tmp:;
    run;
    ods results on;



%mend dx_MS;

nHDx=2, nMSBDx=3, nDPDx=, hDxYears=1, MSBDxYears=1,    DPDxYears=);

data _null_;run;


/*VXN_FS0-1. Prepare data*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXM_FS.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXM_FS.sas7bdat)
);
data VXN_FS1;
    set VXM_FS;

    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=0;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
    docNPatients_FS100=docNPatients_FS/100;
    docN_Visits_FS100 =docN_Visits_FS/100;
run;
/*Define psVars*/
%let psVars =

/*practice/physician related factors*/

    docAge_FS
    docServiceYr_FS
    docEdCountry_FS
    docPayTypeN_FS
    docN_Visits_FS100
    docNPatients_FS100
    docStatinRxPCT_FS

/*VXN_FS2-3, propensity score matching. Changed, PS score based on exposure status, and match is based on exposure*/
/*VXN_FS1a, match by UPCIndexFS cutoff = 25*/
ods results on;




%let UPCCutOff=50;
data VXN_FS2_&UPCCutOff;
    set VXN_FS1;
    UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff=0;/*low*/
    if UPCIndexF >= UPCIndexFP&UPCCutOff then UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff=1;/*high*/
    CombTerm_FS = strip(UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff) || strip(CompFS);
run;

%let thisExposureVar =UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff;

%MatchByPS(
    data=VXN_FS2_&UPCCutOff,
    theExposureVar=&thisExposureVar,
    trimPCT=5,
    matchN=1,
    capliper=0.2,
    keepVarsForPart2 = key_hsn &thisExposureVar age sex_desc logit_ps entrydate,
    exposeCondition=%quote(&thisExposureVar = 1),
    ControlCondition=%quote(&thisExposureVar = 0),
    ConditionsForPart2 =%quote(
                                            abs(t1.age-t2.age) <=1
                                            |
                                            t1.sex_desc = t2.sex_desc
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.EntryDate-t2.EntryDate) <=365
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.logit_ps - t2.logit_ps) <= 0.2),
    psdiff=psdiff,
    psdiffTermForPart2=%quote(,abs(t1.logit_ps-t2.logit_ps) as psDiff),
    noreplaceForPart2=1,
    target=VXN_FS3_&thisExposureVar.,
    debug=1,
    thePSVars=&psVars             
);

data VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._DATA_EXP;
    set VXN_FS3_&thisExposureVar._DATA;
Run;
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._DATA_EXP.zip,
    srcFile=VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._DATA_EXP.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
data localt.VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._Rpt_EXP;
    set VXN_FS3_&thisExposureVar._Report;
Run;

/*VXV_FS2. Treat the missing values.*/
data VXV_FS2_EXP;
    set &thedata;
    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=6;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    if UPCIndexF_CatN50=1 then     CombTerm_FS = 'H' || strip(CompFS);
    if UPCIndexF_CatN50=0 then     CombTerm_FS = 'L' || strip(CompFS);

        /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
    DocRepeatID=scan(UCPF1, 1, ":");
run;

data VXV_FS2x_EXP;
    set VXV_FS2_EXP;
    keep key_hsn adherence_adjust UPCIndexF_CatN50 COMPFS CombTerm_FS &covariates match_Num DocRepeatID;
run;
%sort(data=VXV_FS2x_EXP, sorter=match_num descending adherence_adjust);

/*1.UPCIndex as theVar*/
%macro doUniv;
%let theXVar = UPCIndexF_CatN50;
ods results off;
proc logistic data=VXV_FS2x_EXP descending;
    class CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') /*sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')*/
                                /param=reference;
    strata match_Num;
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar ;
    %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
        /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp ;
        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp ;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp ;
        estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp ;
        estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp ;
        estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp ;
    %end;
    %else %do;
        estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp;
    %end;
/*    ods output estimates =localt.Est50EXP_U_UPC ;*/
    ods output estimates =localt.Est_50EXP_u_UPC modelAnova = localt.Type3_50EXP_u_UPC
            parameterEstimates = localt.Param_50EXP_u_UPC;
    output out=localt.m50EXP_U_UPC (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
run;
ods results on;
%mend doUniv;
%doUniv;


/*multi model theVar and covariates*/
%macro doMultiv;
%let theXVar = UPCIndexF_CatN50;
/*ods results off;*/
proc genmod data=VXV_FS2x_EXP desc;
    class DocRepeatID;
    strata match_Num;
    class CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') qaippeN(ref='1') resitypeN(ref='0')
                                /param=reference;
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar &covariates /maxiter=500 ;
    repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
    %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
        /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp;
        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp;
        estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp;
        estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp;
        estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp;
    %end;
    %else %do;
        estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp;
    %end;
/*    ods output estimates =localt.Est50EXP_M_UPC;*/
    ods output estimates =localt.Est_50EXP_M_UPC modelAnova = localt.Type3_50EXP_M_UPC
            parameterEstimates = localt.Param_50EXP_M_UPC;
/*    output out=localt.M50EXP_M_UPC (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;*/
run;
/*ods results on;*/
%mend doMultiv;
%doMultiv;



/*2.CompCOC as theVar*/
/*univ*/
%macro doUniv;
%let theXVar = COMPFS;
ods results off;
proc logistic data=VXV_FS2x_EXP descending;
    class CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') /*sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')*/
                                /param=reference;
    strata match_Num;
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar ;
    %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
        /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp;
        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp;
        estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp;
        estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp;
        estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp;
    %end;
    %else %do;
        estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp;
    %end;
/*    ods output estimates =localt.Est50EXP_U_CMP ;*/
    ods output estimates =localt.Est_50EXP_u_CMP modelAnova = localt.Type3_50EXP_u_CMP
            parameterEstimates = localt.Param_50EXP_u_CMP;
    output out=localt.m50EXP_U_CMP (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
run;
ods results on;
%mend doUniv;
%doUniv;


/*multi model theVar and covariates*/

children.name: Stat models for repeated conditional regression
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s

%let theXVar = UPCIndexF_CatN50;
proc genmod data=VXV_FSR2_EXP ;
    class CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') /*sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')*/
            DocRepeatID match_Num
                                /param=reference;
/*    strata match_Num;*/
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar docPayTypeN_FS /dist=binomial link=logit;
/*    exact &theXVar /estimate=both;*/
    estimate 'UPCindex' UPCIndexF_CatN50 1 /exp ;
/*    exact UPCIndexF_CatN50 /estimate=both;*/
    repeated subject=DocRepeatID;
run;

data VXV_FSR2x_EXP;
    set VXV_FSR2_EXP;
    if adherence_adjust = 1 then time=1;
    else time =2;
run;

/*check example 64.5 of SAS document Conditional Logistic Regression for m:n Match.
    The idea is to use proc phreg, with:
        1) a dummy time term (1 for outcome=1, 2 for outcome=0),
        2) a discrete logistic model (ties=discrete),
        and 3) a strata term (match_num)
*/
ods trace on;
ods exclude CensoredSummary;
proc phreg data=VXV_FSR2x_EXP;
    class DocRepeatID;
    model time*adherence_adjust(0) = &theXVar /ties=discrete;
    strata match_Num;
    hazardratio &theXVar /cl=both;
run;
ods trace off;
/*The above produces the same result as the logistic regression model with strata term*/



ods trace on;
ods exclude CensoredSummary;
proc phreg data=VXV_FSR2x_EXP;
    class DocRepeatID;
    model time*adherence_adjust(0) = &theXVar &covariates/ties=discrete;
    strata match_Num;
    hazardratio &theXVar /cl=both;
run;
ods trace off;
%beep;

/*As the physician characteristics are measured repeatedly, the following is a frailty model, adding the random term DocrepeatedID*/
ods trace on;
ods exclude CensoredSummary ClassLevelInfoR;
proc phreg data=VXV_FSR2x_EXP;
    class DocRepeatID;
    model time*adherence_adjust(0) = &theXVar &covariates /ties=discrete maxiter=100;
    strata match_Num;
    hazardratio &theXVar /cl=both;
    random DocRepeatID;
run;
ods trace off;
%beep;

children.name: VXN_FS_PS outcome Match outcome

///t
///s
/*VXN_FS_PropensityScoreMatching , PS by outcome, matching by outcome*/



data _null_;run;


/*VXN_FS0-1. Prepare data*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXM_FS.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXM_FS.sas7bdat)
);
data VXN_FS1;
    set VXM_FS;

    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=0;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
    docNPatients_FS100=docNPatients_FS/100;
    docN_Visits_FS100 =docN_Visits_FS/100;
run;
/*Define psVars*/
%let psVars =     
        QAIPPEN
        RESITYPEN
        NDINS_PRE365
/*        NDINS_POST365*/
/*        NHOSP_PRE365*/
/*        NHOSP_POST365*/
        HNIGHTS_PRE365
/*        HDAYS_PRE365*/
/*        HNIGHTS_POST365*/
/*        HDAYS_POST365*/
        NVISITS_GP_PRE365
        NVISITS_SP_PRE365
/*        NVISITS_GP_POST365*/
/*        NVISITS_SP_POST365*/
        NVISITS_ER_PRE365
/*        NVISITS_ER_POST365*/
/*        THIRDPARTYPAY_PRE365*/
/*        THIRDPARTYPAYPCT_PRE365*/
/*        THIRDPARTYPAY_POST365*/
/*        THIRDPARTYPAYPCT_POST365*/
        BENZO_PRE365
        PSYCHO_PRE365
        ANTIDEP_PRE365
        ANTICHO_PRE365
/*        BENZO_POST365*/
/*        PSYCHO_POST365*/
/*        ANTIDEP_POST365*/
/*        ANTICHO_POST365*/
        CAMH_NPD_PRE365
        CAMH_SA_PRE365
        CAMH_PSY_PRE365
/*        CAMH_NPD_POST365*/
/*        CAMH_SA_POST365*/
/*        CAMH_PSY_POST365*/
        CHARLSON_INDEX
/*        CC_PRE365_ANXIETY_OLD*/
        CC_PRE365_DIABETES
        CC_PRE365_HTN
/*        CC_PRE365_MOOD_OLD*/
        CC_PRE365_NS_PS
        CC_PRE365_ASTHMA
        CC_PRE365_COPD
        CC_PRE365_HF
        CC_PRE365_AP_PS
        CC_PRE365_MOODANX
/*        CC_PRE365_MOODANXP*/
        CC_PRE365_OA
/*        CC_PRE365_OMH*/

        CC_PRE365_AF_PS
        CC_PRE365_AMI
        CC_PRE365_CD_PS

/*        CC_PRE365_OSTEO_OLD*/

/*        CC_PRE365_OSTEO_2DRUG*/

        CC_PRE365_VTE_PS
        CC_PRE365_CO_PS
        CC_PRE365_STROKE_2HOSP
        CC_PRE365_IB_PS

/*        CC_PRE365_SCHIZO*/

        CC_PRE365_PD

        CC_PRE365_EPJR
/*        CC_POST365_ANXIETY_OLD*/

/*        CC_POST365_OA*/

/*        CC_POST365_AF_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_AMI*/
/*        CC_POST365_CD_PS*/

/*        CC_POST365_STROKE_1POP*/
/*        CC_POST365_WF_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_OSTEO_1POP*/
/*        CC_POST365_OSTEO_OLD*/
/*        CC_POST365_NONRA*/

/*        CC_POST365_LB_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_AK_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_RF_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_VTE_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_STROKE_2HOSP*/
/*        CC_POST365_IB_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_RA*/
/*        CC_POST365_LV_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_EPAD*/
/*        CC_POST365_UB_PS*/
/*        CC_POST365_AD*/
/*        CC_POST365_SUICIDE_OLD*/
/*        CC_POST365_SCHIZO*/
/*        CC_POST365_SCHIZO_EVER*/
/*        CC_POST365_PD*/
/*        CC_POST365_MS*/
/*        CC_POST365_EPJR*/
/*        PRE365_PRSCR_STATINAHTNOH*/
/*        PRE365_MEDCLASS_STATINAHTNOH*/
/*        FOLLOWUP_PRSCR_STATINAHTNOH*/
/*        FOLLOWUP_MEDCLASS_STATINAHTNOH    */

/*practice/physician related factors*/
    docSexN_FS
    docAge_FS
    docServiceYr_FS
    docEdCountry_FS
    docPayTypeN_FS
    docN_Visits_FS100
    docNPatients_FS100
    docStatinRxPCT_FS
;



/*VXN_FS2-3, propensity score matching. PS score not based on exposure status, but on adherence outcome!
    the match is based also on outcome*/
/*VXN_FS1a, match by UPCIndexFS cutoff = 50*/
ods results on;




%let UPCCutOff=50;
data VXN_FS2_&UPCCutOff;
    set VXN_FS1;
    UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff=0;/*low*/
    if UPCIndexF >= UPCIndexFP&UPCCutOff then UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff=1;/*high*/
    CombTerm_FS = strip(UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff) || strip(CompFS);
run;

%let thisExposureVar =adherence_adjust;

%MatchByPS(
    data=VXN_FS2_&UPCCutOff,
    theExposureVar=&thisExposureVar,
    trimPCT=5,
    matchN=1,
    capliper=0.2,
    keepVarsForPart2 = key_hsn &thisExposureVar age sex_desc logit_ps entrydate,
    exposeCondition=%quote(&thisExposureVar = 1),
    ControlCondition=%quote(&thisExposureVar = 0),
    ConditionsForPart2 =%quote(
                                            abs(t1.age-t2.age) <=1
                                            |
                                            t1.sex_desc = t2.sex_desc
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.EntryDate-t2.EntryDate) <=365
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.logit_ps - t2.logit_ps) <= 0.2),
    psdiff=psdiff,
    psdiffTermForPart2=%quote(,abs(t1.logit_ps-t2.logit_ps) as psDiff),
    noreplaceForPart2=1,
    target=VXN_FS3_ADH,
    debug=1,
    thePSVars=&psVars             
);

data VXN_FS_ADH_DATA_EXP;
    set VXN_FS3_ADH_DATA;
Run;
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXN_FS_ADH_DATA_EXP.zip,
    srcFile=VXN_FS_ADH_DATA_EXP.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
data localt.VXN_FS_ADH_Rpt_EXP;
    set VXN_FS3_ADH_Report;
Run;

/*VXV_FS2. Treat the missing values.*/
data VXV_FS2_ADH;
    set &thedata;
    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=6;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    if UPCIndexF_CatN50=1 then     CombTerm_FS = 'H' || strip(CompFS);
    if UPCIndexF_CatN50=0 then     CombTerm_FS = 'L' || strip(CompFS);

    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');

run;

data VXV_FS2x_ADH;
    set VXV_FS2_ADH;
    keep key_hsn adherence_adjust UPCIndexF_CatN50 COMPFS CombTerm_FS &covariates match_Num;
run;
%sort(data=VXV_FS2x_ADH, sorter=match_num descending adherence_adjust);

/*1.UPCIndex as theVar*/
%macro doUniv;
%let theXVar = UPCIndexF_CatN50;
ods results off;
proc logistic data=VXV_FS2x_ADH descending;
    class CombTerm_FS (ref='L0') /*sex_desc(ref='M') qaippe(ref='1') resitype(ref='URBAN')*/
                                /param=reference;
    strata match_Num;
    model adherence_adjust (ref='0') = &theXVar ;
    %if &theXVar = CombTerm_FS %then %do;
        /*H0=1 0 0, H1=0 1 0, L1=0 0 1 */
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs Lowe UPCI non COMPCOC, H1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 1 0 /exp cl;
        estimate "Low UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, L1 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 0 0 1/exp cl;
        estimate "High UPCI, COMPCOC vs non COMPCOC, H1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 1 0 /exp cl;
        estimate "COMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H1 vs L1" CombTerm_FS 0 1 -1 /exp cl;
        estimate "NonCOMPCOC, High UPCI vs low UPCI, H0 vs L0" CombTerm_FS 1 0 0 /exp cl;
        estimate "Low UPCI but COMPCOC vs High UPCI but non-COMPCOC , L1 vs H0" CombTerm_FS -1 0 1 /exp cl;
    %end;
    %else %do;
        estimate "&theXVar" &theXVar 1/exp cl;
    %end;
/*    ods output estimates =localt.Est50ADH_U_UPC ;*/
    ods output estimates =localt.Est_50ADH_U_UPC modelAnova = localt.Type3_50ADH_U_UPC
            parameterEstimates = localt.Param_50ADH_U_UPC;
    output out=localt.m50ADH_U_UPC (keep=key_hsn adherence_adjust p) p=p;
run;
ods results on;
%mend doUniv;
%doUniv;

/*multi model without theVar*/

/*ods results off;*/

run;

            parameterEstimates = localt.Param_50ADH_m_UPC;

///t
///s
/*VXN_FS_PropensityScoreMatching, , PS by outcome, matching by expsore*/

data _null_;run;


/*VXN_FS0-1. Prepare data*/
%VbsUnzip(
        tgtDir=,
        zipFile=%str(&localTargetPath.\VXM_FS.zip),
        srcFile=%str(VXM_FS.sas7bdat)
);
data VXN_FS1;
    set VXM_FS;

    Sex=1;
    if sex_desc='M' then sex=0;
    qaippeN = qaippe;
    if qaippe = . or qaippe = 9 then qaippeN=0;
    resitypeN=1;
    if resitype='URBAN' then resitypeN=0;
    if charlson_index=. then charlson_index=0;
    
    /*release the practice (doc) related covariates. Note, it is named _FS,but is indeed measured from runin through follow up (2 years)*/
    docSex_FS = scan(UCPF1, 4, ":");
    if docSex_FS='M' then docSexN_FS=0;
    else docSexN_FS=1;
    docBirthYr_FS= scan(UCPF1, 5, ":");
    docAge_FS=int(yrdif(mdy(6,30,docbirthyr_FS), entryDate, "age"));
    docGradYr_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 6, ":"), 8.);
    docServiceYr_FS= year(entryDate) - docGradYr_FS;
    docEdCountry_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 8, ":"), 8.); /*0 for foreign*/
    docPayType_FS = scan(UCPF1, 9, ":");
    if strip(docPayType_FS )='NFFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =1;
    else do;
        if strip(docPayType_FS )='FFS' then docPayTypeN_FS =0;
        else docPayTypeN_FS =2;/*unknown*/
    end;
    docN_Visits_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 10, ":"), 8.); /*N_Visits*/
    docNPatients_FS = input(scan(UCPF1, 11, ":"), 8.);
    docNRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 12, ":"), 8.);
    docNStatinRx_FS= input(scan(UCPF1, 13, ":"), 8.);
    if docNStatinRx_FS=. then docNStatinRx_FS=0;
    if docNRx_FS=. or docNRx_FS=0 or docNStatinRx_FS=0 then docStatinRxPCT_FS=0;
    else docStatinRxPCT_FS = round(docNStatinRx_FS/docNRx_FS*100, '0.01');
    docNPatients_FS100=docNPatients_FS/100;
    docN_Visits_FS100 =docN_Visits_FS/100;
run;
/*Define psVars*/
%let psVars =     
        QAIPPEN
        RESITYPEN
        NDINS_PRE365
/*        NDINS_POST365*/
/*        NHOSP_PRE365*/

/*        CC_PRE365_OMH*/

/*VXN_FS2-3, propensity score matching. Changed, PS score not based on exposure status, but on adherence outcome!
    However, the match is based on exposure*/
/*VXN_FS1a, match by UPCIndexFS cutoff = 25*/
ods results on;

%let UPCCutOff=50;
data VXN_FS2_&UPCCutOff;
    set VXN_FS1;
    UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff=0;/*low*/
    if UPCIndexF >= UPCIndexFP&UPCCutOff then UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff=1;/*high*/
    CombTerm_FS = strip(UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff) || strip(CompFS);
run;

%let thisExposureVar =UPCIndexF_CatN&UPCCutOff;

%MatchByOutcomePS(
    data=VXN_FS2_&UPCCutOff,
    theExposureVar=&thisExposureVar,
    theOutcomeVar=ADherence_adjust,
    trimPCT=5,
    matchN=1,
    capliper=0.2,
    keepVarsForPart2 = key_hsn ADherence_adjust &thisExposureVar age sex_desc logit_ps entrydate,
    exposeCondition=%quote(&thisExposureVar = 1),
    ControlCondition=%quote(&thisExposureVar = 0),
    ConditionsForPart2 =%quote(
                                            abs(t1.age-t2.age) <=1
                                            |
                                            t1.sex_desc = t2.sex_desc
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.EntryDate-t2.EntryDate) <=365
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.logit_ps - t2.logit_ps) <= 0.2),
    psdiff=psdiff,
    psdiffTermForPart2=%quote(,abs(t1.logit_ps-t2.logit_ps) as psDiff),
    noreplaceForPart2=1,
    target=VXN_FS3_&thisExposureVar.,
    debug=1,
    thePSVars=&psVars             
);

data VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._DATA_OCM;
    set VXN_FS3_&thisExposureVar._DATA;
Run;
%vbsZip(
    tgtDir=&localTargetPath,
    zipFile=VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._DATA_OCM.zip,
    srcFile=VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._DATA_OCM.sas7bdat,
    srcDir=
);
data localt.VXN_FS_&thisExposureVar._Rpt_OCM;
    set VXN_FS3_&thisExposureVar._Report;
Run;



s///
t///

children.name: MatchByPS_Outcome
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*
[to do]
copy MatchByOutcomePS, getPSScore_part1_outcome, and getPSSCore_Part3 to mymacros

*/

/*Propensity score matching, PS score by outcome
    this part is achieved by 3 macros, each as a step for PS matching
    step 1. calculate the propensity score (logit_ps, and ps). This part is done by a logistic model (%getPSScore_part1)
    step2. matching the expose/control group by certain vars, e.g., age within 1 year, same sex, entrydate within 1 year, ps score
        (%getPSScore_part2)
    step3. compare the standard diff of means between matched and unmatched method (%getPSScore_part3)
example:
%MatchByOutcomePS(
    data=VZD1,
    theExposureVar=var_CMEPF,
    trimPCT=5,

    matchN=5, (1 exposure matching 5 controls)
    capliper=0.2,
    keepVarsForPart2 = key_hsn var_CMEPF age sex_desc logit_ps entrydate,
    exposeCondition=%str(var_CMEPF = 1),
    ControlCondition=%str(var_CMEPF = 0),
    ConditionsForPart2 =%str(
                                            abs(t1.age-t2.age) <=1
                                            |
                                            t1.sex_desc = t2.sex_desc
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.EntryDate-t2.EntryDate) <=365
                                            |
                                            abs(t1.logit_ps - t2.logit_ps) <= &caliper
                                            ),
    psdiff=psdiff,
    psdiffTermForPart2=%str(,abs(t1.logit_ps-t2.logit_ps) as psDiff),
    noreplaceForPart2=1,

    target=VZD2,
    debug=1,
    thePSVars=
                CC_Pre365_DIABETES
                CC_Pre365_HTN
                CAMH_NPD_Pre365
                CAMH_SA_Pre365 CC_Pre365_ASTHMA
                CC_Pre365_COPD
                CC_Pre365_HF
                CC_Pre365_SUBABUSE_OLD
                CC_Pre365_AMI
                CC_Pre365_IHD
                CC_Pre365_OA
                CC_Pre365_STROKE_1POP
                CC_Pre365_OSTEO_1POP
                CC_Pre365_MOODANX
                CC_Pre365_AD
                CC_Pre365_EPAD
                CC_Pre365_RA
                CC_Pre365_SCHIZO
);


*/


%macro MatchByOutcomePS(
    data=,
    theExposureVar=,
    theOutcomeVar=,
    trimPCT=,
    matchN=,
    capliper=,
    keepVarsForPart2 = ,
    exposeCondition=,
    ControlCondition=,
    ConditionsForPart2 =,
    psdiff=,
    psdiffTermForPart2=,
    noreplaceForPart2=,
    target=,
    debug=,
    thePSVars=
);
    %local data theExposureVar trimPCT matchN capliper keepVarsForPart2 exposeCondition ControlCondition
    ConditionsForPart2 psdiff psdiffTermForPart2 noreplaceForPart2 target debug thePSVars theOutcomeVar
    ;

        %getPSScore_part1_outcome(
            data=&data,
            theExposureVar=&theExposureVar,
            theOutcomeVar=&theOutcomeVar,
            trimPCT=&trimPCT,
            thePSVars=&thePSVars,
            target=MatchByOutcomePS_tmp1,
            debug=&debug
        );


        %GetPSScore_Part2(
            data=MatchByOutcomePS_tmp1,
            target=&target._data,
            matchN=&matchN,
            capliper=&capliper,
            keep=&keepVarsForPart2,
            exposeCondition=&exposeCondition,
            ControlCondition=&ControlCondition,
            conditions=%str(&ConditionsForPart2),
            psdiff=&psdiff,
            psdiffTerm=%str(&psdiffTermForPart2),
            debug=&debug,
            noreplace=&noreplaceForPart2
        );


        %getPSSCore_Part3 (
            data=&target._data,
            exposeCondition=&exposeCondition,
            ControlCondition=&ControlCondition,
            theExposureVar=&theExposureVar,
            thePSVars=&thePSVars,
            target=&target._report,
            debug=&debug
        );

        %if &debug ne 1 %then %do;
            proc datasets nolist;
                delete MatchByOutcomePS_tmp:;
            run;
        %end;

%mend MatchByOutcomePS;




/*get propensity scrore by outcome, trim observations if at the upper/lower n percentile of ps score, or if the ps score does not overlap
    with the opposit group
example:
%getPSScore_part1(
    data=VZC3,
    theExposureVar=var_CMEPF,
    theOutcomeVar=adherence_adjust,
    trimPCT=5,
    thePSVars=
        CC_Pre365_DIABETES CC_Pre365_HTN CAMH_NPD_Pre365
        CAMH_SA_Pre365 CC_Pre365_ASTHMA
        CC_Pre365_COPD
        CC_Pre365_HF
        CC_Pre365_OMH
        CC_Pre365_SUBABUSE_OLD
        CC_Pre365_AMI
        CC_Pre365_IHD
        CC_Pre365_OA
        CC_Pre365_STROKE_1POP
        CC_Pre365_OSTEO_1POP
        CC_Pre365_MOODANX
        CC_Pre365_AD
        CC_Pre365_EPAD
        CC_Pre365_RA
        CC_Pre365_SCHIZO
);

*/
%macro getPSScore_part1_outcome(data=, theExposureVar=, theOutcomeVar=, trimPCT=, thePSVars=, target=, debug=);
            %local min_c1 max_c1 min_c0 max_c0 data theExposureVar trimPCT thePSVars
                    percent_trim_L percent_trim_u debug target;

                /*step1. Calculate the propensity score*/
                proc logistic data=&data descending;
                    model &theOutcomeVar = &thePSVars ;
                    output out= getPSScore_part1_tmp1 p=ps xbeta= logit_ps; /*get the probability and logit of probability*/
                run;

            /*step2. Grouped by the exposure status, sort the ps values in order.*/
                proc sort data=getPSScore_part1_tmp1 out=getPSScore_part1_tmp2a;
                    by &theExposureVar ps;
                run;
                data getPSScore_part1_tmp2;
                    set getPSScore_part1_tmp2a;
                    by &theExposureVar;
                    getPSScore_part1_orderN + 1;
                    if first.&theExposureVar then getPSScore_part1_orderN=1;
                    getPSScore_part1_colC='c' || strip (&theExposureVar);
                run;
                %transpose(data = getPSScore_part1_tmp2, target=getPSScore_part1_tmp2b,
                        rowhead=getPSScore_part1_orderN, colhead=getPSScore_part1_colC, contents=ps);
            
            /*make histograms on # of cases by exposure group*/
            ods results on;
            title "PS Core before match, before trimming";
            proc sgplot data=getPSScore_part1_tmp2b;
                    histogram c0 / transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=red)
                    legendlabel="&theExposureVar=0" scale=count binwidth=0.025;
                    histogram c1 / transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=blue)
                    legendlabel="&theExposureVar=1" scale=count binwidth=0.025;
                    xaxis label='propensity score' values=(0 to 1 by 0.1);
                    yaxis label='count' integer;
                    keylegend / location = outside position=bottom;
            run;
            ods results off;
            title;

            /*step3. trim the min and max n% of cases*/
            %let percent_trim_L=&trimPCT;
            %let percent_trim_u=%eval(99-&percent_trim_L);

            proc rank data=getPSScore_part1_tmp2 groups=100 out=getPSScore_part1_tmp3a;
                var ps;
                ranks ps_percentile;
            run;
            data getPSScore_part1_tmp3;
                set getPSScore_part1_tmp3a;
                where ps_percentile between &percent_trim_L and &percent_trim_u;
            run;

            /*step4. further trim those not in overlapping groups, i.e.,
                1) get the max ps value between the min ps of the exposure groups,
                2) get the min ps value between the max ps of the exposure groups,
                3) only keep those with a ps value within the ps range of 1) and 2)*/
            /*get the min and max*/
            proc univariate data=getPSScore_part1_tmp3 noprint;
                 by getPSScore_part1_colC;
                 var ps;
                 output out=getPSScore_part1_tmp4a min=min max=max;
            run;
            data _null_;
                set getPSScore_part1_tmp4a;
                if getPSScore_part1_colC='c1' then do;
                    call symput("min_c1",min);
                    call symput("max_c1",max);
                    end;
                    else do;
                    call symput("min_c0",min);
                    call symput("max_c0",max);
                    end;
            run;
            data getPSScore_part1_tmp5;
              set getPSScore_part1_tmp3;
              if ps >= max(&min_c1, &min_c0) and ps <= min(&max_c1, &max_c0);
         run;
         data ⌖
              set getPSScore_part1_tmp5;
                 drop getPSScore_part1_orderN getPSScore_part1_colC;
         run;

                     /*from tmp2b, get those with an getPSScore_part1_orderN in target*/
                     %sqljoinv2(
                        t1=getPSScore_part1_tmp2b,
                        t2=getPSScore_part1_tmp5,
                        distinction=1,
                        target=getPSScore_part1_tmp4b,
                        vars=%str(t1.*),
                        jtype=inner,
                        jvars=getPSScore_part1_orderN
                    );

                 /*make histograms again after trimming*/
                    ods results on;
                    title "PS Core before match, after trimming";
                    proc sgplot data=getPSScore_part1_tmp4b;
                            histogram c0 / transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=red)
                            legendlabel="&theExposureVar=0" scale=count binwidth=0.025;
                            histogram c1 / transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=blue)
                            legendlabel="&theExposureVar=1" scale=count binwidth=0.025;
                            xaxis label='propensity score' values=(0 to 1 by 0.1);
                            yaxis label='count' integer;
                            keylegend / location = outside position=bottom;
                    run;
                    ods results off;
                    title;

                %if &debug ne 1 %then %do;
                    proc datasets nolist;
                        delete getPSScore_part1_tmp:;
                    run;
                %end;
%mend getPSScore_part1_outcome;


/*
getPSSCore_Part3, compare the standard diff of PS var means by matched/unmatched method
example:

%getPSSCore_Part3 (
    data=test12,
    exposeCondition=%str(var_CMEPF = 1),
    ControlCondition=%str(var_CMEPF = 0),
    theExposureVar=var_CMEPF,
    thePSVars=CC_Pre365_DIABETES CC_Pre365_HTN CAMH_NPD_Pre365
        CAMH_SA_Pre365 CC_Pre365_ASTHMA
        CC_Pre365_COPD
        CC_Pre365_HF
        CC_Pre365_OMH
        CC_Pre365_SUBABUSE_OLD
        CC_Pre365_AMI
        CC_Pre365_IHD
        CC_Pre365_OA
        CC_Pre365_STROKE_1POP
        CC_Pre365_OSTEO_1POP
        CC_Pre365_MOODANX
        CC_Pre365_AD
        CC_Pre365_EPAD
        CC_Pre365_RA
        CC_Pre365_SCHIZO,
    target=test15,
    debug=
);

*/

%macro getPSSCore_Part3 (
        data=,
        exposeCondition=,
        ControlCondition=,
        theExposureVar=,
        thePSVars=,
        target=,
        debug=);
    %local data exposeCondition ControlCondition theExposureVar thePSVars target debug;


    /*make a histogram to compare the ps score in the exposed and matched group*/
    
            /*split the data into exposure and nonexposure*/
            data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a1 getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a2;
                set &data;
                if &theExposureVar = 1 then output getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a1;
                if &theExposureVar = 0 then output getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a2;
            run;
            %sort(data=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a1, sorter=ps);%sort(data=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a2, sorter=ps);
            data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a3;set getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a1;rename ps=ps1;keep ps;run;
            data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a4;set getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a2;rename ps=ps0;keep ps;run;
            data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a;
                merge getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a3 getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a4;
            run;

            /*make histograms on # of cases by exposure group*/
            ods results on;
            title "PS Core after match";
            proc sgplot data=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp0a;
                    histogram ps1 / transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=red)
                    legendlabel="&theExposureVar=0" scale=count binwidth=0.025;
                    histogram ps0 / transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=blue)
                    legendlabel="&theExposureVar=1" scale=count binwidth=0.025;
                    xaxis label='propensity score' values=(0 to 1 by 0.1);
                    yaxis label='count' integer;
                    keylegend / location = outside position=bottom;
            run;
            ods results off;
            title;

            /*check the ps difference and std before and after matching*/
                /*make an empty target set*/    
                data ⌖delete; run;

                /*Compare the balance in covariates between the exposed and the unexposed
                    in the matched group. Ref. Austin (2011)
                    Basically, the idea is to compare the standard difference between the exposed and the control group
                    the standard difference is about the mean of the PSVar.
                    the formulas involved in this macro only suite for vars (e.g., CC_Pre365_DIABETES) having a dichotomas
                            value (e.g., 1 or 0). For continuous variables, other formulas may apply (Ref. Austin 2011).                     
                */
                %put >>> 1. set weight for unmatched analysis;
                data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp1;
                     set &data;
                run;

                %put >>> 2. set weight for matched analysis;
                %put >>> 2a. counting the number of match_num;
                    %sqljoinv2(
                        t1=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp1,
                        target=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp2a,
                        vars=%str(match_num, count(Match_num)-1 as MatchCNT),
                        /*count(Match_num) includes the exposed case, which should be deducted */
                        Groupby=%str(Match_num)
                    );
                %put >>> 2b. attach the MatchCNT back to getPSSCore_Part3_tmp1. For exposed cases, weight_matched =1, otherwise = inverse of matched controls;
                    %sqljoinv2(
                        t1=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp1,
                        t2=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp2a,
                        target=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp2,
                        vars=%str(t1.*,
                            1 as Weight_unmatched,
                            ifn(%str(&exposeCondition), 1, 1/(t2.MatchCNT)) as Weight_matched),
                        jtype=left join,
                        jvars=Match_num
                    );

                %put >>> 3. estimate the stdDif;


                %let dlmt=;
                %let i=1;
                %do %until(
                    %length(%scan(&thePSVars, &i &dlmt))=0
                    );

                /*get the current element in the string*/
                %let thePSVar=%scan(&thePSVars, &i &dlmt);

                        %put >>> 3.a get means of &thePSVar by exposure group;
                        %sort(data=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp2, sorter= &theExposureVar);
                        /*Weight_matched*/
                        proc means mean data=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp2 noprint;
                            class &thePSVar;
                            var &thePSVar;
                            weight Weight_matched;                                
                            by &theExposureVar;
                            output out=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3a1a (keep= &theExposureVar mean) mean=mean;
                        run;
                        /*Weight_unmatched*/
                     proc means mean data=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp2 noprint;
                            class &thePSVar;
                            var &thePSVar;
                            weight Weight_unmatched;                                
                            by &theExposureVar;
                            output out=getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3a1b (keep= &theExposureVar mean) mean=mean;
                        run;
                        %put >>> 3.b put means of &theExposureVar exposure and control groups into separate sets;
                        /*Weight_matched*/
                        data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b1a;
                            set getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3a1a;
                            if &controlCondition;
                            mean_control=mean;
                            keep mean_control;
                        run;
                        /*Weight_unmatched*/
                        data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b1b;
                            set getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3a1b;
                            if &controlCondition;
                            mean_control=mean;
                            keep mean_control;
                        run;
                        /*Weight_matched*/
                        data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b2a;
                            set getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3a1a;
                            if &exposeCondition;
                            mean_expose=mean;
                            keep mean_expose;
                        run;
                        /*Weight_unmatched*/
                         data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b2b;
                            set getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3a1b;
                            if &exposeCondition;
                            mean_expose=mean;
                            keep mean_expose;
                        run;
                        /*Weight_matched*/
                        data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b3a;
                            length disease $40.;
                            merge getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b1a (obs=1) getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b2a (obs=1);
                            d_matched=(mean_expose - mean_control) / sqrt((mean_expose * (1-mean_expose) + mean_control * (1-mean_control)) /2 );
                            stdiff_matched=abs(d_matched);
                            disease=upcase(strip(symget('thePSVar')));
                            category='matched';
                            keep d_matched stdiff_matched disease ;
                        run;
                        /*Weight_unmatched*/
                        data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b3b;
                            length disease $40. ;
                            merge getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b1b (obs=1) getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b2b (obs=1);
                            d_unmatched=(mean_expose - mean_control) / sqrt((mean_expose * (1-mean_expose) + mean_control * (1-mean_control)) /2 );
                            stdiff_unmatched=abs(d_unmatched);
                            disease=upcase(strip(symget('thePSVar')));
                            keep d_unmatched stdiff_unmatched disease ;
                        run;
                        data getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b;
                            merge getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b3a getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b3b;
                            by disease;
                        run;

                        %put >>> 4. append stddiff of &thePSVar to the final table;
                        data ⌖
                            set &target getPSSCore_Part3_tmp3b;
                            if d_unmatched=. then d_unmatched=0;
                            if d_matched=. then d_matched=0;
                        run;

                %let i =%eval(&i+1);
            %end;
            
            %put >>> 5. Plot ps diff

            /*make histograms on # of cases by exposure group*/
            ods results on;
            title "PS Diff before and after match";
            proc sgplot data=⌖
                    hbar disease / response=d_unmatched transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=Blue)
                    legendlabel="unmatched"
                    categoryorder=respdesc;
                    hbar disease / response=d_matched transparency=0.75 fillattrs=(color=Red)
                    legendlabel="matched"
                        ;
                    xaxis label='propensity score' values=(-.3 to .3 by 0.1);
                    yaxis label='count' integer;
                    keylegend / location = outside position=bottom;
            run;
            ods results off;
            title;

            %if &debug ne 1 %then %do;
                proc datasets nolist;
                    delete getPSSCore_Part3_tmp:;
                run;
            %end;

%mend getPSSCore_Part3;

    docStatinRxPCT_FS
